summary: Layers of Fear: Masterpiece Edition includes both Layers of Fear and the Inheritance DLC in a single, horror-filled package.

name: Labyrinthine
summary:
LABYRINTHINE, a first-person, multiplayer cooperative horror game, offers an unforgettable journey into the realm of nightmares. With an emphasis on exploration, puzzle-solving, and atmospheric storytelling, it keeps you on the edge of your seat.

Team up with your friends and navigate through the intricate maze, solve cryptic puzzles, and uncover the maze’s dark secrets while staying one step ahead of the lurking terrors. Cooperative play is at the game’s core; you can play alone, but LABYRINTHINE encourages teamwork and voice communication between up to 8 players to face the darkness.

name: Labyrinth
summary: The aMAZEing Labyrinth now with a completely new look and at long last for PC: for more than 35 years, the simple and unique gameplay of the board game has inspired more than 20 million people worldwide.

name: La Foret De Pago 2: Souvenir de Glace
summary: The first role-playing video game to learn spelling. Warriors, mages, dwarves, dragons and many other creatures await you.

name: Lady in Midnight
summary:
“The moment I see you, I want to do this… slowly and deeply, feeling every embrace.”

After getting lost due to a carriage accident, I was led by a dangerous-looking man into a mansion…

“If you don’t want to be tormented every night, you’d better listen to me.”

name: Last Epoch
summary:
Uncover the Past, Reforge the Future.

Ascend into one of 15 mastery classes and explore dangerous dungeons, hunt epic loot, craft legendary weapons, and wield the power of over a hundred transformative skill trees. Last Epoch is being developed by a team of passionate Action RPG enthusiasts.

name: Langit Lupa: Office Wars
summary: A fast-paced MULTIPLAYER PARTY game of TAG set in an office, where you leap across desks, THROW STUFF, and PUSH COWORKERS. With over 20+ classic Filipino childhood games, this game is as FUNNY as it gets—perfect to PLAY WITH FRIENDS!

name: Laser Disco Defenders
summary:
Join the Laser Disco Defenders on their quest to defeat the evil Lord Monotone and prevent him from using the coveted Mirror Moon to force the galaxy into dancing along to his, and only his, tune. In this self-inflicted bullet hell you must stay on your toes as each laser beam fired ricochets off walls and can hit you too! Traverse randomly generated levels and face off Monotone’s various robotic machinations. Be it flamboyant flame sneakers or a cool rapid fire chrome suit - you decide how your favourite disco defender looks and plays based on what outfit you choose to wear. Time to save the galaxy and look like a cool cat!

• Thanks to randomly generated levels no play through is the same
• Choose your own look and play style with different characters and outfit combinations
• Online leader boards shows you the “master of the dance floor”
• Incredibly groovy 70’s disco style soundtrack

name: Ladder it Up!
summary: One guy, one ladder, and a tower you must get to the top of. Get ready for an unforgettable adventure to the top in a platformer that demands patience and precision, filled with diverse environments and various challenges!

name: Lazerbait
summary: Lazerbait is a free arcade strategy game set in virtual reality with one simple goal: capture all the planets to build more ships and destroy your enemies!

name: Latarnik
summary:
Latarnik is a Polish FPP open story game.
Live and work on a lighthouse. Take care of the facility, check the weather report, scout ships, file reports and order needed goods.

Experience changes from day to night and different weather such as storms, rain or fog

name: Last Farewell
summary: Last Farewell is a Survival Co-op game where you are tasked to work together with others (or solo) in order to ensure your own survival for as long as possible. Gather supplies and craft during the day in order to protect yourself and the sanctuary, the Town Hall, during the night.

name: Land of Ngoto
summary: Land of Ngoto is an atmospheric and immersive first person puzzle game. Enter a surreal african dreamworld and solve the logic puzzles blocking your way.

name: Labyrinth of Zangetsu
summary: Labyrinth of Zangetsu is new 3D dungeon RPG by Acquire. Its gameplay systems are a return to the "roots" of hack-and-slash. It is a title that emphasizes "wa" (the Japanese-style), which is Acquire’s specialty. It depicts a “deep” world view illustrated by ink painting brush strokes. And features a “mixture of wa” sound that channels the music of Japan’s various eras, from "gagaku" (traditional Japanese music and dance) to "noh" (traditional Japanese masked dance-drama). Labyrinth of Zangetsu is developed based on these four keywords.

name: Lambdarune
summary:
Lambdarune is a take on Deltarune by Zet. It's a Deltarune AU that includes original Chapters 3 to 7, with some subtle things in Chapters 1 and 2 being recontextualized. Lambdarune is Zet's main project and has been shown through animations, music, and mostly community posts… until now.

The game is structured into Chapters 3-7, with each chapter divided into 2-4 Installments.

name: Land of Zombies
summary: World is waiting for you! Save the world from those Zombies. Let's get started...

name: Lairchitect
summary: Build your own lair and protect your precious soul core from heroes that try to raid your dungeon. Distracting heroes and using the right minions to defeat them is key in winning this reverse dungeon crawler.

name: Last Labyrinth
summary:
"An escape-the-room adventure game that can only be experienced in VR, Last Labyrinth was created specifically for the VR age. Players must work to escape a mansion full of hidden dangers with a mysterious girl that appears before them.

Development of Last Labyrinth is being spearheaded by Hiromichi Takahashi, director and producer of the acclaimed Doko Demo Issyo (PlayStation 1999) series and co-creator of Toro (the Sony Cat). Working alongside Mr. Takahashi is a diverse team, many of whom are industry veterans with resumes featuring titles that are household names around the world.

Debuting at TOKYO GAME SHOW 2016, the Last Labyrinth preview demo created a lot of buzz, with a long line of attendees waiting to play. Media outlets from around Japan and abroad covered the announcement of the game, and 4Gamer.net nominated Last Labyrinth for the Tokyo Game Show 2016 Media Award in the Indie category.

The interest continued to grow at Laval Virtual 2017, where Last Labyrinth received the Best VR/AR Contents award.

Last Labyrinth will make its return to the TGS VR/AR Area at Tokyo Game Show 2018 with a special demo version.

And, in Spring of 2019, the full version of Last Labyrinth will receive a multi-platform, worldwide release."

name: Last Man Sitting
summary: A bunch of dudes sit in an office, all of them wearing black suits and white collared shirts. Everyone sits in the same lime green swivel chairs. For a video game, Last Man Sitting sounds really boring. Add shotguns and ragdoll physics, though, and you have a recipe for the only battle royale game left to make.

name: Last Call
summary: Last Call is an autobiographical poem-exploration game about love and violence. In the game, you explore an apartment that is partially packed for a move. You find and respond to pieces of a poem scattered throughout these boxes as you help pack up. It is based on the lived experience of the game designer, Nina Freeman.

name: Last Escort: Club Katze
summary: Last Escort: Club Katze is a Japanese PS2/PSP game.

name: L'Agence: The Hearts of Paris
summary: Incarnez une détective de l’amour. Marie de Saint-Marc, gérante d'une agence matrimoniale à Paris, doit percer les secrets de ses clients et clientes et de leurs partenaires potentielles pour faire prospérer son affaire. Chaque rencontre est conçue comme une petite énigme et chaque confidence devient la clé vers un mariage réussi. Le destin de l’agence dépend autant de votre sagacité que de votre patience.

name: Laid-Back Camp: Have a nice day! - Limited Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following:

- Laid-Back Camp: Have a nice day!
- Choro-Q pullback car toy of Rin Shima
- Original Soundtrack

name: Lands of Fire
summary:
Lands of Fire is a gay furry VN based on the cultures and oral traditions of pre-colonial Australia. It is rated R (or whatever equivalent you have) for sex and violence (and we do mean explicit sex and scenes with described gore, or both considering penile subincision is a thing).

Kubbadang, a Yuin thylacine, is tasked by his elders to bring warriors from Budj Bim in order to fight off the hordes of monsters sent by the Sun Woman, who seeks to devour all of humanity. Along for the ride are his sister Guddity, his childhood friends Winyu (a rakali) and Dhurra (a platypus), the Gamilaraay warrior Bangalaa (a sea eagle), the Arrernte kurdaitcha Perrurle (a kangaroo) and the mysterious medicine woman Bina (a goanna).

name: Lay a Beauty to Rest: The Darkness Peach Blossom Spring
summary: Love-suspense AVG with the theme of "The Peach Blossom Spring". The equinox flowers, bloom for one thousand years and wither for one thousand years. Eternal paradise. Do you choose to stay here, escape here, or bury everything here?

name: Lairchitect
summary: You are the renowned Lairchitect, designer of dungeons, creator of castles, and you've been hired Evil McVillain to build his Lair, unfortunately, like most villains, he fears that his secrets will get out if he lets you go free once you're finished. Lay traps for invading adventurers but be careful not to get trapped yourself as you escape from the dungeon you built!

name: Last Ninja 3
summary:
Real hatred is timeless.

Ninja 3 is here and ready to explode onto your screen with the most glorious display of graphics and animated fight sequences ever seen in this type of game.

With a massive introduction sequence, incredibly detailed '3D' background graphics and a more than generous helping of all-out action, Ninja 3 displays a degree of excellence never before experienced by even the most seasoned Ninja fan. Ninja 3- A game of epic proportions.

Feel the realism, allow yourself to witness the magical world of Ninjitsu spiritualism, experience the mystical atmosphere of the Tibetan Temples. Remember, always remain in control of your stealth and cunning as you do battle once again with the most treacherous purveyor of evil, Kunitoki.

name: Last Sentinel
summary: Set decades from now in a reconstructed Tokyo, you play as Hiromi Shoda in Last Sentinel, a narrative-focused, open-world action game from Lightspeed Studios.

name: Lara's Mysterious Restorations
summary: Lana Vassari restores well known paintings by finding and revealing mysterious objects hidden within layers of paint. Help her earn money to decorate her apartment.

name: Lakelight Elementary Incident 68
summary: Lakelight Elementary Incident 68 is a realistic urban exploration VHS Found Footage horror title where you unveil the past and afterlife through your camera.

name: Lander 8009 VR
summary:
PAY ATTENTION, HOMINID! The Icarus Program is looking for new pilots. Sign up and be the first one to master our experimental flying suit. 
Our engineers have designed more than 100 simulations to test your flying skills, your logical-deductive reasoning abilities, and your suicidal tendencies as well.

name: Labyrinth Trailblazer
summary: Turn-based dungeon crawler Rogue-like with strategic combat. Navigate through a uniquely generated map layout and encounter a variety of enemies and events. Build your party as you travel deeper into the dungeon and conquer the labyrinth through the decisions you make.

name: Lastronaut
summary: Lastronaut is a pixel-packed, adrenaline-fueled dash for your life as you run, jump, dodge and blast your way through the machine army, equipped with an arsenal of human and robotic weapons to cause mayhem with. At dawn, as the rest of humanity lifts off in the distance, it’s your mission to reach the last rocket ship leaving Earth. Your life depends on it.

name: La Casa del Taquero
summary: A Taquero, his tacos of dubious origin, and you, an office worker who left work late and avoids becoming dinner for a strange creature. A short Horror Game about solving puzzles and escape from the house of this “demonic chef” before you become his next ingredient.

name: Lamphead
summary: The protagonist of this game is a strange man who needs to breach out of the darkened and dangerous odd place at whatever cost.

name: Later Alligator
summary: Pat the alligator, a (mostly) harmless and (probably) innocent reptile is at the center of a conspiracy that could bring down the biggest, scariest family in Alligator New York City: his own! Explore the city, meet the Family, and try to save Pat before the clock runs out.

name: Last Epoch: Celestial Way
summary: Travel through time in style with the mysterious Celestial Way portal.

name: Last Course
summary: A turn-based tactical game that relies on teamwork. Form a squad and fight as survivors trying to escape - or as the infected making sure it’s their last course. Choose from unique characters with distinct gear or abilities, and outplay the enemy through strategy and coordination.

name: Late Stops
summary: Late Stops is a short indie horror experience where you play as Derek Adams, a man on a long, late-night road trip across the country. Somewhere along a quiet highway, his car runs out of gas. With just enough momentum, he rolls into a small convenience store that seems oddly untouched by time.

name: Layers of Fear
summary:
Layers of Fear is a psychedelic horror that will keep you on-edge for the reminder of the game. Delve deep into the mind of an insane painter and discover the secret of his madness, as you walk through a constantly shifting house.

Heavily inspired by the masterpiece paintings from the past centuries, and the architecture and décor from the XIX century. Layers of Fear is a truly unique experience, where each move of the camera can change your surroundings.

Layer by layer uncover the visions, fears and horrors that entwine the protagonist and finish the masterpiece he has strived so long to create.

name: Lamento: Beyond the Void
summary:
The game takes place in a fictional world inhabited by Ribika (who look like humans but have cat ears and tails). Their world has fallen into dark times -- a mysterious void has made some places (and even animals) impossible to touch, causing major food shortages. A strange and deadly disease that has killed off a large percentage of the female Ribika population is also spreading.

The hero, Konoe, exists in this miserable world, living alone in the starving village of Karou who have turned to cannibalism. The story begins with Konoe in Karou, where he suddenly begins to see horrible dreams and strange marks appear on his body. This is believed to be a curse so Konoe heads off to Ransen (the big city) in order to heal his body...

name: Lambda Fortress
summary: Lambda Fortress is the iconic mod that brings the Team Fortress 2 mercenaries into Half-Life 2 and other Source campaigns for singleplayer & co-op play. Now on Steam!

name: Lands of Havoc
summary: You have to find the magic items hidden throughout the land in order to defeat the evil Dark Lords.

name: Lair Land Story 2: Mist of Sea
summary: After traveling far to the southern end of Lair Land, seven knights have reached Chainch Bay. Settled in a small tropical fishing village surrounded by ruins, they will spend the next few years building a new life here while facing the most challenging quest they will ever meet.

name: Lakitu's Great Adventure 2
summary: A year after the events of Lakitu’s Great Adventure, Nidoking awakens, fiercer, stronger and more evil than ever. He begins to spread terror throughout the world because he wants to conquer it, but to do so, he must defeat Lakitu once and for all, ordering his soldiers, old and new, to find Lakitu and kill him. As soon as the news arrives, Lakitu is immediately alarmed and will venture into this new world, full of never-before-seen biomes, containing 12 long levels. It is up to Lakitu, along with Yoshi, to stop Nidoking, this time forever! This hack contains 12 long and not too easy levels.

name: Lamecraft
summary: Lamecraft, developed by Drakon, is a game revolved around building with cube blocks of all types. You can build huge castles, or you can build tiny huts, either way the world can all be edited all you want. Everyday Drakon's working hard to provide you all of the fun and joy you wish to and have and more!

name: Last Epoch: Ultimate Edition
summary:
The Last Epoch Ultimate Edition is the best way to join the fight, slay your way across Eterra in style, and support the development of the action RPG of the future! Absolutely packed full of rewards, the Last Epoch Ultimate Edition is here to bring you everything you need to get started and look good doing it.

- "Golden Guppy" the Baby Chronowyrm - Pre-Order Exclusive - Cosmetic Pet
- 100 Epoch Points (EP)
- Adolescent Chronowyrm - Cosmetic Pet*
- Fallen Ronin - Cosmetic Armor Set*
- Firefly’s Refuge - Cosmetic Portal*
- Temporal Guardian - Cosmetic Armor Set*
- Twilight Fox - Cosmetic Pet*
- Adult Chronowyrm - Cosmetic Pet*
- Celestial Way - Cosmetic Portal*
- Full Original Digital Soundtrack (OST)**

Cosmetic items require an online connection and are not available in offline mode.

*These items will unlock and become equipable at 1.0 (February 21st, 2024 - 11am CST)
**This item will be delivered at a later date following the release of patch 1.0

name: Lara Croft and the Temple of Osiris: Legend Pack
summary: The Legend pack features Tomb Raider: Legend themed skins including a golden pistol and a ring that gives your player health regeneration powers.

name: Landlord Go!
summary:
Landlord Go is the first tycoon game based on a real map of the United States and the world. It allows you to literally bring the gameplay into the real world. Buy, sell, and upgrade real buildings that you encounter every day on your way to work or school. From grand and famous landmarks to local shops and businesses.
Collect the best properties, combine them into collections, and invest wisely in their development.

name: Lambda Wars
summary: Lambda Wars is a free standalone multiplayer Source Engine modification set in the Half-Life 2 universe that brings the war between mankind and their brutal Combine overlords to a traditional real-time strategy (RTS) setting.

name: La Aventura Espacial
summary: A supercomputer has gone mad in the remotest part of a distant galaxy and threatens to destroy the planet. You are the Central Liaison of a Support Command and have been trained to eliminate this deranged machine. Your mission is to find your comrades, who are scattered throughout the universe, and together reach the central base of the Dark Menace - the bad guy. There, you will have to turn the computer into phosphatine. Hey, don't run away, it's an easy task and you are the last hope of humanity...

name: Late Ming Dynasty: The Realm of Abyss
summary: A simple soul like action dark adventure game, set on the far side of the moon during the turbulent late Ming Dynasty, where wars erupt and a mysterious plague gives birth to monster like creatures. Through various battles, they escape alive and immerse themselves in a gloomy and dark world.

name: Last Origin
summary: Last Origin is a strategy RPG mobile game with hero collecting mechanics standard to most games of its kind. The player takes the role of a newbie commander who is, as far as we know, the last remaining human being in a post-apocalyptic world ravaged by alien parasites known as Iron Worms.

name: Labyrinth of Refrain: Coven of Dusk
summary:
Labyrinth of Refrain: Coven of Dusk is a first-person dungeon-crawler RPG using a party of 5 characters chosen from 6 classes. Later it seems like you can have 5 groups of 3 characters acting as one party with a mix of classes together.

"Become the living book, Tractatus de Monstrum, and command a brigade of puppet soldiers as you navigate the twisting passageways of the Labyrinth of Refrain.

When at your base, prepare for your journey by upgrading your brigade! Create new puppet soldiers, assign them different squads and formations, synthesize better equipment, take requests from townsfolk, and get assistance from Dronya in the form of Witch Petitions.

Once you've entered the labyrinth, be sure to search every nook and cranny as you jump over barricades, solve puzzles, and smash your way through walls to delve further and further downward in search of treasure and rare artifacts. But be careful, the more riches you obtain, the more vicious the dungeon becomes. Can you survive long enough to bring your haul back?

Fight past terrifying monsters by giving orders to your puppet brigade. Change their formation, use special skills, or call for an all-out attack! The battles you face will be challenging, so your success depends on your preparation and your strategy."

name: Lala Hentai 2
summary: Cute puzzle game with hentai anime girls. Beautiful, erotic and juicy girls for every taste. Enjoy!

name: Lab Bio-Terror
summary: Lab Bio-Terror - In this shoot em all game, you are a special agent who was sent to clean up a secret laboratory. Scientists screwed up, and it's up to you to eliminate the consequences of the leak of a dangerous virus!

name: Lasagna Boy Classic
summary: A puzzle horror game with a gameboy aesthetic.

name: Lalulu Island Survival
summary: Survive, explore, and thrive on a mysterious island. Gather allies, build, survive, and find hidden treasures. Welcome to Lalulu Island Survival!

name: Labubu Games
summary: A collection of themed games based on the Labubu trend.

name: Last Hit Titan
summary: Strategically place turrets and build defenses to maximize your firepower against colossal Titans! Experiment with different setups, optimize your battlefield, and take down legendary creatures with the most efficient tactics. Every decision counts in this unique tower defense experience!

name: Lamia's Game Room
summary:
You are brought into a room by a mysterious woman named Lamia and forced to play games with people from different backgrounds.
You will learn the story as the game progresses. Find out your opponents' weakness during conversations, in order to defeat them.
Winning is the only way to leave the room...

name: Lawnmower Game: Racing
summary: Lanwmover Game: Racing is the newest addition to lawnmower game series. Now you can select your favorite lawnmower, 4 different options, and drive againts other ai opponents. 25 tracks with different themes, like racetracks, cities, snow, forest and lot of other themed tracks. Every level has starting point and finish line and you can cheat and take shortcuts, because you need go for every sparkling checkpoints. Can you be the king and world fastest lawnmower driver? Features: 4 different mowers to drive. 26 amazing tracks. Every level has easter eggs! 3 different ai opponents

name: Labyrinth of Touhou Rebirth
summary:
This is a mod of Labyrinth of Touhou by Ethan Silver.

The characters are expanded with new characters; PC-98 characters and future mainline Touhou characters from Touhou 12 onward, new skills, dialogue, and etc. Along with re-done dungeons and reduced encounter rate.

name: Landlord
summary: Ordinary people, ordinary problems, and among them you - the landlord who rents apartments to them... And unfortunately, these ordinary people’s problems automatically become your problems! Rent apartments, collect rent money, and be prepared! The life of a landlord won’t be easy!

name: La Storia della Arcana Famiglia
summary:
A japanese visual novel.

Arcana Famiglia is a self-appointed organization whose members have mysterious powers. They use these powers to protect a small Mediterranean island, Regalo, from pirates, foreign countries, and other threats. The members are all extremely loyal and devoted to the Family's leaders, being: Mondo, the boss, Sumire, his wife, and Felicità, the daughter and main heroine. The story is focused on the only daughter of the "Papà": Felicità, will be married to the next head of the family in two months — and the successor will be decided in a competition that Felicità herself will take part in.

name: Last Case of Benedict Fox: Definitive Edition
summary:
Take on the last case of Benedict Fox and dive into a twisted world of secret organizations, forbidden rituals, and cold-blooded murders. Explore the memories of deceased victims as you search for clues and fight demons in this fantastical Lovecraftian Metroidvania.

The Definitive Edition brings new animations and upgraded AI, topped by new stories to discover filled with brand-new puzzles.

name: La-Mulana EX
summary:
La-Mulana EX is an enhanced port of the PC remake for the PlayStation Vita. It adds a bestiary, reworks some item locations, rewords hints, changes puzzles slightly, moves hint tablets closer to the puzzles, and changes some graphics to make environmental clues more noticeable.

"A combination of classic 2D platforming, Metroidvania-style adventuring and challenging action gameplay, La-Mulana EX takes you deep into the ancient ruins of La-Mulana on a quest to discover not just valuable treasure, but the secret to life itself!

Fight monsters, uncover clues, collect items and weapons to enhance your abilities, spring traps and battle huge bosses as you try to solve the mystery of La-Mulana. But watch out! No-one who's entered the ruins before has come out alive… can you succeed where others have failed?"

name: Laser Spider Playground
summary: This is a very early prototype of the spider for Webbed. There is no goal and it may be full of bugs. Pun fully intended.

name: Last Resort
summary: Last Resort is a small co-op shooter in which you and up to 3 others defend humanity's first hotel on Mars against hostile aliens. Defend & power up generators, upgrade your weapons and gun down hordes of aliens to save the hotel!

name: La Guerra de las Vajillas
summary:
Conversational adventure game, parody in the style of the Mel Brooks movie "Spaceballs".

The video game puts us in the shoes of Martin Luke Skywalker in his ancestral fight against the empire led by the Emperor Karapalo and his second, the fearsome Darth Water.

name: Lakria Legends
summary:
Aeons ago, before planets and worlds came to be in the fabric of time, Goddess Gaea the creator of Life and Rebirth, created six mystical elements which made the foundation of a world. Nature, Fire, Water, Earth, Light, and Shadow, these elements coalesced to form planets full of life and energy.

The world you live in is known as Lakria, a planet blooming with lush life and full of wonderful mysteries and legends. Many inhabitants of the world often give praise and thanks to Gaea for bestowing them such a life to live.

Until one day, the energy of the Lakria appears to be waning and the planet slowly begins to start dying. Everyone is in shock and is wondering what might be causing the planet's pain, they began to look up at the sky to Gaea for a miracle, hoping she will once again visit the planet and bless it with rebirth.

name: La Java du Privé
summary:
The husband of a wealthy banker—neglected and vaguely paranoid, influenced by a television series—is convinced that his wife is cheating on him. He has contacted a specialized adultery agency, which quickly uncovered his wife's incriminating activities.

Having heard of your excellent track record as a private detective, the wife now begs you to help her cover up the evidence and save both her marriage and her social standing.

As luck would have it, you’re currently at odds with the local crime boss, who’s given you a choice: leave the country within 24 hours or end up as fish food in the Seine.

Will you manage to complete your investigation? Who can you trust to help you? It’s up to you to find out—before it’s too late...

name: La Peri
summary: Enter a realm of enchantment with "FIREBIRD - La Péri", and play the role of Iskender, a prince seeking the "flower of immortality". You will appear on the stage, visit the ethereal world of La Péri, and witness a magical and poetic encounter as one of the characters... In this unique and visually stunning production by the award-winning french VR studio Innerspace, choreography, music, story-line and the most high-end technology will merge into one, producing an extraordinary audio-visual experience.

name: Last Bastion
summary: Nonstop, fast paced castle defense shooting action against relentless armies of evil in a dark, brooding atmosphere.

name: Lady Bug
summary: Lady Bug is an insect-themed maze chase arcade game produced by Universal Entertainment Corporation and released in 1981. Its gameplay is similar to Pac-Man, with the primary addition to the formula being gates that change the layout of the maze when used. The arcade original was relatively obscure, but the game found wider recognition and success as a launch title for the ColecoVision console.

name: Last Night of Winter
summary: A souls-like action-RPG with lots of battles and exploration. Defeat your enemies, steal their weapons, and uncover the secret of the stronghold.

name: Lara Croft Go
summary:
Lara Croft GO expands the turn-based puzzle gameplay and takes you on an adventure set in a long-forgotten world. Explore the ruins of an ancient civilization, discover hidden secrets and face deadly challenges as you uncover the myth of the Queen of Venom.

A never-before-seen take on the iconic franchise featuring challenging gameplay, gorgeous visuals and a mesmerizing soundtrack, all at your fingertips.

name: Last Stand
summary: Future Agent Natasha finally found the recently awakened human hero, Morgen. This time, they must embark on a perilous journey back to the South Pole, seeking the origins of the impending world apocalypse. However, what awaits them there is a group of unknown enemies shrouded in mystery

name: Labyrinthine Dread
summary: In this Top-Down Horror game, try to escape from an otherwise abandoned laboratory, armed only with a lantern and the keys strewn about in monster-infested rooms.

name: Laser Harp VR
summary: You too can be a stealth major You will be the organizer and make the live show a success! Please note that the instrument to be handled is the “Laser Harp”.

name: Labyrinth Life
summary: The PlayStation 4 version of Omega Labyrinth Life with altered illustrations and minigames as well as scenes that will be automatically skipped.

name: Lava-Runners
summary: Grapple using left click/touching the screen, it will attach to where ever your mouse is on the screen.

name: Lands of Sorcery
summary: Lands of Sorcery is a turn based combat RPG set in a time of virile men, ravishing women, creepy sorcerers and disgusting monsters. A tongue in cheek love letter to classic sword and sorcery literature and movies. To the death!

name: Lady Thalia and the Masterpiece of Moldavia
summary:
Lady Thalia is back in London and back to her old tricks, putting up with Britain’s social elite by day so she can steal from them by night. But that doesn’t mean things are easy, what with her husband back from abroad and a new detective hot on her trail. Still, she’s not going to let those little things distract her from pulling off the heist of her career, even if she needs a bit of help to do it…

Explore London, match wits with friends and foes, and steal everything that’s not nailed down (and some things that are) in this gripping installment of the Lady Thalia series!

name: Lawless: Blood and Dust
summary: An intense third-person action-adventure set in rural India. Engage in brutal combat, explore a vibrant and raw open world while navigating a gripping narrative of power, survival, and moral choices.

name: Last Wave
summary: A survival action RPG with fast-paced combat and strategic decision-making. Fight waves of enemies using combos, elemental spells, and techniques. Master the command system to unleash devastating attacks and achieve high scores. Inspired by 5th-gen low-poly visuals with modern action RPG gameplay.

name: Lara Croft: The Last Plague
summary: This is a fan-made standalone game that uses the Tomb Raider The Last Revelation engine while creating its own story and puzzles.

name: Lara Croft and the Guardian of Light
summary: Lara Croft and the Guardian of Light is a platform action video game developed by Crystal Dynamics and published by Square Enix for Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 3, Xbox 360 and iOS as part of the Tomb Raider series through digital distribution. Unlike previous games in the series, the game does not carry the Tomb Raider brand and has a heavy emphasis on cooperative gameplay. In multiplayer, players take the role as either Lara Croft or a 2,000-year-old Mayan warrior named Totec. They must work together in order to stop the evil spirit Xolotl and retrieve the Mirror of Smoke. A single-player campaign mode is available that does not include the non-playable character AI following or helping Lara.

name: Last Fisherman
summary: In abandoned biomes, forgotten cities, and lifeless waters, you cast your line — often without knowing whether it is still worth it. Rare fish, fragile systems, and a world without explanation create an atmosphere that observes rather than entertains.

name: Labyrinth of Touhou: Gensoukyo and the Heaven Piercing Tree
summary: Long stories Dungeon RPG with girls of "Touhou Project"! Towering Heaven-Piercing tree suddenly, losing the Amanomurakumo, and more...? Find out mastermind of the simultaneous outbreaks! Fight against the powerful enemies! Let's dig in the vast dungeon !

name: Landlord Quest
summary: 2BR, 1BA, NO PETS!!!

name: Last Knight
summary: Last Knight is a top-down roguelight game where you have to survive only with a sword in a castle occupied by a monster. There's only a sword in your hand and your two legs Defeat all monsters and escape this castle

name: Late Night Drift
summary: Are you ready to embark on the drift adventure of a lifetime? Gather your crew, rev up your engines, and become the Drift Masters.

name: Last Kingdom
summary: Last Kingdom is an MMORPG in which players start as peasants and gain experience points to progress in character classes

name: Lazy Galaxy: Rebel Story
summary:
An old robot named H-34-RT wakes up in a derelict space station orbiting his home planet. His civilization was destroyed long ago by evil O'Xelg, but he has yet to figure that out. After an initial shock, he decides to follow his old defense routines: that means fighting the invaders, even if he is alone now. 
 
Lazy Galaxy: Rebel Story is a challenging, squad-based shoot-em-up/bullet hell roguelite. Fly through tons of bullets, defeat various enemies and engage challenging bosses, all this to help a lonely robot complete his mission.

name: Landlord Tycoon
summary:
LANDLORD the biggest mobile tycoon on the market

Imagine the world as a giant board game, where you can buy and sell real-life places and earn rent every time someone visits your property. Now it’s possible! Landlord Real Estate Tycoon is an award-winning geolocalisation Monopoly-game, that throughs you into the reality of big business! Make the best property deals, earn big money, compete with friends, people from you country or even the entire world to ultimately become one of the most powerful magnates on the globe!

name: Lazy Train Game
summary: Lazy Train Game offers a calm experience and an escape into a world of tracks and trains! Lay tracks and automatically collect resources with your train in this cozy idle-like train simulator.

name: Laser Defense Extreme
summary: Laser Defense Extreme is a Tower Defense Game, with a Killstreak System. Place your "Towers" strategically and eliminate the incoming enemies.

name: Lady's Escape
summary: Join a young lady in 'Lady's Escape,' an NSFW visual novel. Help a young noblewoman flee her confines and pursue freedom. Make choices, avoid the butler's watch, and seduce your way out of the mansion. Can you help her succeed?

name: Laundry Simulator 2025
summary: From Soap Suds to Success: Build Your Laundromat Empire!

name: Layers of Fear
summary: A remake of the original Layers of Fear and its DLC, as well as a new DLC from the perspective of the painter's wife. This remake in Unreal Engine 5 adds new core mechanics and features to blend the chapters together seamlessly.

name: Labyrinths of the World: Fool's Gold
summary: Can you save your friend from the world of leprechauns of before your luck runs out?

name: Laundry Store Simulator
summary: Start small and work your way up, upgrading your equipment, designing a stylish store, and expanding your services! Are you ready to own the best Laundry Store in the world?

name: L'a L'a Cofflhu Fhtagnyaa
summary: L'a L'a Cofflhu Fhtagnyaa is a Galgame with Cthulhu mythology, with three female (xie) masters (shen) who can be attacked, 8-10 hours of game time. Working in a coffee shop, I accidentally discovered the indescribable secret of this shop...

name: Lavender Quartz Kyoukai Hyoudou
summary:
Two fates seeking hope cross paths at ground zero.
in a Ikonu, whose hometown village was lost to war, meets the intelligence agent Kirshium in the state capital of Miranalc under martial law. Pursuing an invisible boy who stole the supernatural substance “Origin Stone” from a crashed artificial satellite—capable of turning the tide of the war—the two girls race through the city.

name: Lamentations
summary: You and your teammates are part of an elite undercover unit tasked with finding out information on a mysterious complex known as "the backrooms". Explore various locations, solve puzzles, check your six, and escape with your life!

name: LazerBlazer: Type A - Intercept
summary: One of the games found in Super Scope 6.

name: Last Legacy
summary:
LAST LEGACY is a free-to-play fantasy-romance visual novel with optional paid content from FICTIF GAMES, created by a small team of queer people of color.

With branching dialogue and multiple endings for each character route, your choices alone will spell the fate of the world...

Whether you're dooming it or saving it.

name: LazerBlazer: Type C - Confront
summary: One of the games found in Super Scope 6.

name: Law & Order: Mushroom Kingdom Unit - Pilot Episode: Tragic Fox "Tails"
Larry Lotter and the Test of Time
summary: Join Rob Greasley, Calliope DeRanger and Professor Mumblemore in this short Harry Potter parody, loosely based on the greatly admired books by J.K. Rowling. Watch the other characters act and interact of their own accord, and spin time back and forth to interfere.

name: Lapse: A Forgotten Future
summary: A mobile app where you play as president of a nation in a post-apocalyptic world set beyond the year 2075.

name: Last State
summary:
Last State is a hardcore wilderness survival simulation where every decision shapes your fate. You're alone in the post-collapse wilderness with nothing but your skills and determination.

Scavenge abandoned settlements. Craft tools from raw materials. Hunt for food. Build shelter against the elements. Trade with strangers or fight them. Every action drains your resources. Every mistake can be fatal.

The wilderness doesn't care about your plans. Storms will destroy your shelter. Wildlife will compete for resources. Injuries will slow you down. Starvation, dehydration and freezing temperatures are constant threats.

name: Last Watchtower
summary: Last Watchtower is a minimalist roguelite defense game. Gather resources, pick upgrades, and unlock powerful tower abilities. Experiment with diverse builds, withstand relentless monster waves, and grow stronger with every run through permanent meta-progression.

name: Lawnmower Game: Pinball
summary: New part for lawnmower themed game series. Pinball which has lawnmower game series style

name: Laser Hell
summary: A fast-paced and minimalist game where you aim to live as long as you can, to climb higher on the leaderboard.

name: Labrys
summary: Labrys is a multiplayer (up to 1v5) horror game where players are thrown into a randomly generated labyrinth against a minotaur. Play as the minotaur or one of up to five human players trying to escape the labyrinth while avoiding the minotaur.

name: Land-io
summary:
In Land-io, players claim territory by moving around, making trails, and enclosing plots of land to gain them as their own.

The goal is to have the most land claimed when game time runs out, but watch out for other players! If someone runs into your trail, you'll lose all the land you've collected."

The player with the most land at the end of the 5 minutes wins the game.

name: Land of Mushrooms
summary: Dive into the Land of Mushrooms , where enchanting fungi come to life! Combine a delightful array of mushrooms, from the elegant Parasol to the flavorful Chanterelle, as you skillfully drop them into the pot.

name: Lambda end Theory
summary: Lambda end Theory is a cryptic and minimalist RPG about a mysterious world and its inhabitants.

name: Lazy Angel Mika
summary: Use angel's power to solve people's problems! Answer quizzes to earn their trusts and gain some "Love"! Quizzes range from general knowledge to in-game context! There are also assist items that can help you find the correct answer!

name: Laser Matrix
summary:
Laser Matrix is a strategic action game built for Mixed Reality, blending fast-paced movement with brain-teasing reflex challenges. Play in your living room or any room-scale space!

Your objective: activate every button and survive shifting hazards. Easy? Not quite. Each level introduces a new twist (timed zones, moving lasers, unpredictable patterns) that require you to think ahead while staying on the move.

name: Last Life
summary: Last Life is a breathtaking adventure game set in NeoNova, a cyberpunk city where high technology and dark secrets intertwine. Our protagonist, a cute cat controlled by players, will embark on a mysterious journey to find their lost lover.

name: Last Z: Survival Shooter
summary: In an apocalyptic world overrun by the undead, where the fate of humanity hangs in the balance amid diminishing living spaces, will you rise as the hero we need to reshape the destiny of humandkind? Uncover the adventure of Last Z: Survival Shooter - your destiny awaits.

name: Labyrinth: Dracula's Lair
summary: Trapped in Dracula's labyrinth, hunted by monsters, armed only with relics — explore, survive, and uncover the path to eternal life, where beyond the fog lie secrets never meant to be found.

name: La-Mulana
summary:
La-Mulana is the “Ruins Exploration Archaeological action game” in which the player seek the “Anthropo-origin”, sleeps in the Huge Ruin La-Mulana, which is said the beginning of whole the civilizations.
Various types of traps for blocking infiltrators are awaiting inside the ruins, and sentinel-monsters are roaming about. Target the deepest point of the ruins by figuring out riddles, putting off the monsters and deactivating the traps. The way to the goal will be extraordinary, more complex riddles will be waiting for you as you come deeper point.
Handle Professor Lemeza to find out the Anthropo-origin!

name: Late Night Cleaning Simulator
summary: Take on the task of cleaning different businesses, but avoid breaking too many items in the buildings otherwise your boss will not be happy.

name: Lawnmower Game Jigsaw
summary: Lawmmower game jigsaw is jigsaw puzzle game with lawnmower game themes

name: Lantern of Worlds - The Story of Layla
summary: Lantern of Worlds - The Story of Layla is an adventure game in which you play as Layla, a former, high-ranking member of a secret order of assassins.

name: Lagoon Lounge: The Poisonous Fountain
summary: This is a visual novel containing furry characters and homosexual themes. You take on the role of a furry who has moved to a seaside village and become involved in the lives of its residents.

name: Lazy Lord: War on the Desktop
summary: You're the Laziest Evil Lord ever—too lazy to fight, yet destined to rule the world. Send minions (automatically), upgrade them with gold and treasures, and conquer 1,000 areas without leaving the throne. Evil has never been this effortless.

name: Lake: Season's Greetings
summary: It's Christmas time, 1985. Thomas Weiss spends the final few days of the year as he's always been doing: delivering mail and celebrating Christmas with his friends and family in Providence Oaks. However, this holiday season turns out a quite a bit different than expected...

name: Lawnpocalypse
summary: Lawnmowing Roguelike! Hop on your mower and battle back the overgrowth, muck, and hordes of garden pests. Fight and upgrade as you complete oddly satisfying yardwork. Invent game-breaking builds, customize your Gnome, and uncover secrets of the Lawnpocalypse!

name: Laedomanes
summary: A First Person Platformer with Parkour elements. Explore ancient Space Monoliths and face off against the sentient Machines. Use collected Laedomanes to improve your gear and travel to artificial star systems via the Wormhole.

name: La Vuelta al Mundo con Vascolet
summary: This third game made for Nestlé's Vascolet features Alejandro and his friends kart racing around the world. But beware! Evil Malmark and his lackeys are out there trying to ruin the races!

name: Lab Eject
summary: You are the one who suddenly break out from vivarium And You feel that the freedom is out there.There are various obstacle out there.Try to escape from a lab and get freedom for Slimeslime need your help for itIt will be hard trip.

name: Last Word
summary:
For 2017 I made Last Word, a little action word game where the difficulty increases as your words get longer. There’s a proper videogame version (with no prompt hidden inside it) here. Made in Terry’s Haxegon engine, a nice ultra-minimal Haxe library which is perfect for small prototypes. I love using engines that build to the web as well as native targets – makes it very easy to share prototypes without asking the player to do anything more annoying than play the actual game (which might already be quite annoying, honestly).

I made this little game as a way of learning Terry Cavanagh’s work-in-progress game engine, Haxegon. It’s a bullet-hell game where you are always trying to eat a particular bullet… you try to build unique words to gain points, but it’s game over if you form a series of letters that cannot be a word. I think this is a new idea? But I’m not totally sure.

name: Lancelot
summary: Lancelot is a standard text adventure with limited graphics on some platforms game by Level 9 released in 1988. If focuses on Lancelot's quest to find the Holy Grail.

name: Lara Croft: Reflections
summary: Lara Croft: Reflections is a battle card game starring Tomb Raider's protagonist.

name: Last Anime Boy 2: Hentai Zombie Hell
summary: In 2088, Nazi Muslims achieved great success in the field of chemical weapons and, not to fall into captivity and fight even after death with the infidels, they created a serum that turned them into zombies.

name: Lab 7: Cold Nights
summary: In LAB 7: Cold Nights - wise foresight decides on the outcome of your fate. Wasted coins, reckless use of electricity, and poor time management will lead to your demise. Explore your surroundings, build defenses and find a way to freedom.

name: Last Man
summary: You're the sole survivor of a global virus that wiped out all men. In this apocalyptic world, your mission is to survive and foster intimate relationships with the most outstanding female survivors, sparking the resurgence of humanity in an epic adventure.

name: Lag Simulator
summary: It really was the game's fault you lost

name: Lawyer Guy: Defender of Justice
summary: Lawyer Guy is a jumping, shooting action platformer game in the vein of Mega Man.

name: Land and Sword
summary: Lead a group of survivors in a new land, build a functional settlement, manage deep production chains, and prepare defenses to face growing hordes of creatures. Balance growth, logistics, and survival in a world scarred by a creeping plague.

name: LAN Party
summary: Experience online gaming like never before! LAN Party is designed to be the perfect compliment to your gaming group. Whether you're playing the same game competitively, cooperatively, or playing different games entirely, LAN Party makes communicating and sharing gameplay so much easier.

name: Lab Cats
summary: Lab Cats is a puzzle platformer game that emphasizes cooperation and coordination, requiring players to work together seamlessly.

name: Last Heroes 3
summary: Enjoy another classic 16-bit RPG from Warfare Studios of Vagrant Hearts, Ashes of Immortality and Valiant fame, and embark on a quest with Amelia and Roland as they make new friends, experience dreams, and discover their destiny.

name: Lando: Me? A Hero?
summary: Thrown into a strange world by an angel, you’ll fight, adapt, and evolve in this action-packed roguelike. Combine insane powers, conquer new worlds with each run, and face relentless enemies. Will you rise as the hero—or fall trying?

name: Lair Land Story
summary: This raising simulation follows Xero, a great hero of Lairland, and the mysterious holy woman Chilia. Over four in-game years together, Xero helps Chilia to blossom into her own person while also recovering her lost memories. Like in Princess Maker, the player's job is to set out her schedule with tasks like studying to improve her statistics, working to earn money, or more. Players can also head into town to befriend other NPCs or buy items, and their schedule is broken up periodically by special events or other long-term goals.

name: LaserAge
summary: LaserAge is a retro game similar to Galaxian and Galaga clones. This shooter features power-ups and is highly detailed, combining nostalgia with 24-bit colour. Four levels have 100 waves of ships. Destroy 15 enemies with 13 power-ups. Your ship can be controlled with the mouse, which comes in handy when you're trying to dodge enemy fire. The Gold version features a new interface and a massive list of bug fixes.

name: Lady Sia
summary: Join Lady Sia, bold defender of a world invaded by a race of ruthless beastmen. Help her use her sword and her wits in an intense battle across land, sea and air to free her people. Acquire the magic of the elements to defeat the giant T'Soa bosses, and invoke Sia's shapeshifting power in a final showdown against an unforgiving foe!

name: Land of Puzzles: Battles
summary: In Land of Puzzles: Battles the king and queen need your help. To avoid war the king has accepted a challenge of puzzles to solve. He needs you to solve 15 sets of challenging puzzles and help him secure the kingdom.

name: Lawnmower Game: Mission X
summary: Lawnmower game series continue. Now the mission is to find 6 stars in different levels under limited time and also avoid traps and enemies.

name: Lazy Witch's Factory
summary: A run-based rogue-lite factory builder where middle management meets lawless Hell. Optimize production, make questionable deals, and race against the debt deadline.

name: Last King of Africa
summary: Last King of Africa invites you on a fantastic journey deep into an imaginary Africa where you play the role of young Ann Smith, daughter of the last king of Maurania. Ann is on her way to assist her dying father on his deathbed when her plane crashes near a city held by a rebel faction, on the north side of the country. Ann lives through this terrible accident and wakes up with amnesia in a prince’s palace. That is how her extraordinary journey begins. The numerous puzzles and mind-teasers throughout the game have been completely reworked and now offer an original and intuitive gameplay that takes advantage of the Nintendo DS functions. The use of the stylus, microphone and your own logic are of capital importance in solving the puzzles and mind-teasers.

name: Lake of Creatures
summary: A fast-paced action FISHING ROGUELIKE, where you're on a quest to save the lakes from mutated creatures! Catch Fish - Find Treasures - Conquer enemy riddled randomly generated lakes!

name: Laundry & Supermarket Simulator
summary: "Laundry Simulator" immerses you in the bustling laundry business. Manage a boutique shop, handling everything from everyday clothes to luxury garments, and sell related products. Efficiently manage resources, upgrade equipment, and optimize layout to attract customers with superior service.

name: Lapis x Labyrinth: Limited Edition
summary:
The limited edition was created for the international release.
The Nintendo Switch version comes with some extra items.

The Limited Edition for PlayStation 4 and Nintendo Switch includes:
- Lapis x Labyrinth
- Lapis x Labyrinth My Labyrinth Photo Album~♡
- Lapis x Labyrinth Dango Beats
- Collector's Box

The Nintendo Switch version, Limited Edition XL, also contains:
- Lapis x Labyrinth Poster
- Mayor's Special Feast Mini Art Print
- Dango Delights Mini Art Print

name: Laika 2.0
summary:
Reach the most guarded places as a KGB trained chimpanzee: biologically enhanced, psychic trained, ready to sneak everywhere and a bit short on bananas during the Cold War.
A challenging puzzle platform through some of the main theatres of the Cold War

name: Large
summary:
Large is a survival and exploration game set in a post-apocalyptic world generated procedurally, immersed in fog.

It will be a first person game, in which you will have to explore large mechanical structures, being able to move through them in the fog with a flying vehicle.

I'm developing the game in unreal engine 4. It's still at an early stage of development, so I'm updating information on Twitter every week. If you like it, don't hesitate to follow it! ^^

name: Laetus.
summary: Laetus. is a rapid 2D precision platformer focused on speed and skill. You play as a small yet swift circle racing against the developer for the fastest time. Speed your way through challenging levels and use all aspects of your movement and colour-changing abilities to finish in record time!

name: Last Dino Standing
summary: Last Dino Standing is a fast-paced game where you control a T-rex to avoid crazy elements.

name: Laserwave
summary:
Grab your mouse...

Turn up the volume...

Let the beats flow through you!

Laserwave is a synthwave bullet-hell-like rhythmic shooter where your actions are defined by the music!

name: Last Ride
summary: YOU are launched at full speed into the arena, determined to crush your opponents at the wheel of your racing car. But even when your car gives up the ghost, the fight isn't over. You continue the battle on foot until there is only ONE SURVIVOR left!

name: Land of Wind and Shade
summary: Land of Wind and Shade is the second interactive flash game in the Homestuck web-comic. In the game, you play as John, who is exploring the Land of Wind and Shade while directed by an Exile.

name: Lansbury's SneakOut
summary: Help Lansbury navigate eerie underground tunnels and avoid capture by roaming ancient warriors.

name: Landline
summary: Prevent murder cases with the telephone.

name: Labyrinth Legends
summary: Cartoony dungeon crawler with puzzle elements for the PS3.

name: Lappy Games
summary: LAPPY GAMES is a lively party action game where you compete to collect hearts with Lappy and friends. Up to four players can join in at once, with support for online multiplayer. Make use of all kinds of stage events to your advantage—the player who gathers the most hearts wins!

name: Late Ming Fly Guy
summary: A platformer where players use arrow keys and spacebar to jump/fly. The game randomly generates floating platforms and obstacles, and players can choose to collide with monsters to eliminate them or dodge them, challenging themselves to continuously ascend upward.

name: Lacey's Flash Games
summary: These are the REAL girls’ games. In the mid 2000s, Charlie (Charchar887), discovers the Laceys's Flash Games and their disturbing secrets. Step into the virtual world to uncover the whereabouts of the missing website creator, Rocio Yani, and explore all the games and activities with Lacey!

name: Last Hour of an Epic to the Moon RPG
summary: You like RPGs, but don't have time to play it all. . . We like RPGs, but don't have time to make it all. . . So here's (only) the last hour of an Epic RPG !!

name: Laserade
summary: A high reflex platforming game about dodging lasers while collecting soda cans. Duck, jump, and move around skillfully through challenging levels for the chance at winning a lifetime supply of Suga! The market research team at Suga Corp thanks you.

name: La Pasion XR
summary: “La Pasión XR" takes guests on an ephemeral, audio-reactive journey through the Gateway Chamber Orchestra's Spring 2023 performance of Osvaldo Golijov's La Pasion según San Marcos.

name: Last Rites
summary: Zombies have taken over the world and it is your mission to save humanity.

name: Last Holiday
summary: Last Holiday is set in a picturesque North Bohemian village during the holidays in year 2000, where a good little singer seeks refuge from an angry old man. You have to take care of all your needs, such as food, drink, cigarettes, beer, girls and just about everything that goes with village life.

name: Last Summer at Camp Apocalypse Blood: 101 Ways to Not Capture Bigfoot
summary: A surreal dark comedy visual novel about monster camp politics, childhood trauma, and a bribe-prone Bigfoot. Battle rival camp Wonderfang during what could be the last summer at Camp Apocalypse Blood!

name: Layered Ordeal
summary: LAYERED ORDEAL is a bullet time FPS. A barrage of various bosses will attack you. Take advantage of the slow-motion feature to avoid the barrage, defeat the bosses, and reach the lowest level.

name: Lazy Dog
summary:
Jump into this cozy puzzle game and help your adorable pup reunite with his beloved ball! Calculate the angles, time your moves, and draw lines to help the lazy dog catch his beloved ball by guiding it to him with ropes. With satisfying physics, cozy visuals, and challenging puzzles, Lazy Dog is the perfect game for the whole family. No ads, no in app purchases - just pup-tastic fun!

Traverse the puzzle levels with your lovable canine buddy on a mission that's simple yet oh-so-satisfying: help the lazy dog catch his beloved ball by using fun mechanics to solve the puzzles.
Collect all the dog bones to achieve a perfect score on each level. Unleash your puzzle-solving prowess today!

name: Last Days Motel
summary: In the doomsday Hotel, you can experience the hard life in the waste Land World. Stick to hope in motel-based doomsday shelters and fight survival challenges such as hunger, thirst and lack of energy. Risking their lives to collect supplies, develop and build hotel shelters. Do everything possible to survive the cataclysmic world.

name: Lap of the Gods
summary: When the sun shines on the Lap of the Gods, it is blood red. And when it rains, the sky sobs. Explore a strange world populated by even stranger beings in this story-driven adventure as Marion attempts to undo a mistake on a universal level, before everything she has ever known becomes Undone.

name: Lair Defense: Dungeon
summary:
ay back in ancient history, when humans and dragons live in peace, the human emperor once heard eating dragon eggs will make one live forever. Since then, the war between humans and dragons has begun. You are the ONE to stop the greedy humans from stealing eggs and killing dragons. 
 
Dragons/Spells: 
- Fire Dragon: Defends against invading enemies with fiery power. It is one of the most powerful and ancient creatures. 
- Ice Dragon: A heroic defender specializes in ice attack. It can freeze invading enemies. 
- Poison Dragon: Defends against invading enemies with poisonous power. Getting too near to it is horribly dangerous. 
- You can raise dragon from young to adult and giant. Many special skills are only available for adult/giant dragon. 
- Fire rain: special spell that damage an area by fire rain. 
- Ice up: A spell that temporarily freeze all enemies. 
 
Enemies: 
- Varying from armless peasants to druids, the masters of magic power. 
- Thieves move fast and become invisible as they like; 
- Mage is immune to fire dragon attacks. 
- Priest is the master of healing and prevervation. They can heal themselves quickly. 
- ... 
- And many more enemies are joining battle as level goes. 
 
Command your dragons to stop greedy humans from stealing eggs now, HERO!

name: Lara Croft and the Temple of Osiris
summary: Lara Croft and the Temple of Osiris is the sequel to Lara Croft and the Guardian of Light, and the second game in a spin-off from the main Tomb Raider series. The two-player cooperative campaign from the first game is expanded to support up to four players. They need to work together in a platform environment to explore the temple, defeat hordes of enemies from the Egyptian underworld, solve puzzles, and avoid traps, using a high-angle perspective like the previous game. When playing together, the level lay-outs change to support cooperative actions.

name: Lady Dracula
summary: An evolution of the Classicvania genre and a return to the glory days of precision platforming, retro challenge and gothic atmosphere. Transform yourself into a wraith, a spider and a bat to fly, climb and blast your way across Transylvania to do battle with Lady Dracula at her castle keep.

name: Last Flag
summary: Hide your flag. Find the enemy flag. Run it back, then defend for a minute to win it. Welcome to Last Flag: a fast-paced 5v5 shooter with showstopping contestants, set in a televised competition where strategy, teamwork, and chaos blend in the ultimate game of Capture the Flag.

name: Last Spartan: Glory Over Madness
summary:
In this deck-building roguelike, you'll customize and build your own dice set to use in turn-based battles as you explore a dark, randomly generated world, full of new enemies and encounters on every run. Experience a story-driven campaign! Fight for your Sanity and defeat the Lovecraftian horrors.

Last Spartan sees you playing as the titular Last Spartan as you battle through a story-driven randomly generated campaign where keeping a grip on your waning sanity becomes increasingly difficult as you do battle with more and more enemies that draw inspiration from Greek mythology and the Lovecraft mythos.

It's a roguelike with deck-building elements. The unique part here is that your deck is actually a set of customisable dices, with each face acting as a slot for a different ability. There are over 700+ dice faces to discover, allowing you to develop and learn numerous synergies to suit your preferred playstyle, especially when god selection comes into play.

Aside from the dice, you will be accompanied on each run by an ally Greek god. There are over 10 of them currently, although they won't all be unlocked immediately, and each provides distinct active and passive abilities. With them, you can develop different strategies for dealing with the many foes you encounter.

According to the developer, for the first ten hours, you will face new enemies on every run, with over 100 regular enemies and 20-plus mini-bosses to discover and fight in turn-based combat. This should keep the game feeling fresh and surprising for far longer than other entries in the genre.

The same applies to encounters with over 200 NPCs to meet and choices surrounding them to make. Depending on your interaction, they might provide you with a reward, blessings, or even curses that will remain constant until the end of that particular run.

Some of those NPCs will make their way to your city. It's here where you respawn after dying and spend resources you've gathered throughout each run to upgrade the various buildings in a bid to rebuild Sparta. This is the more permanent side of the Last Spartan game and will eventually provide you with perks that increase your chance of completing a run and progressing the overarching story.

The indie game Last Spartan is set to come out in early access on PC/Mac/Linux via Steam in February-March 2024 and full release coming to all Platforms and major storefronts by April 2024 ( Coming to PC/Mac/Linux first and then to all major consoles like Xbox & Playstation & Nintendo Switch & IOS soon after PC and console release )

name: Last Report
summary: Last Report is a dark horror game where you play as a night shift park ranger. While monitoring the camera footage, you start noticing strange events. Uncover the terrifying secret of the National Park. Something moved in the window, but don’t worry it’s probably just another deer, right?

name: Lapis Re:Lights
summary: Lapis Re:LiGHTs is a Japanese RPG social simulation game launched in 2021. In this game you are the teacher and educate witch high school girls.

name: Landonia
summary: Developed by a one-man team, Landonia is a single-player, turn-based RPG that includes exploration, loot, factions, level grinding, and class-based progression. Your characters can interact with each other to help -- or stop -- each other in the land of Landonia!

name: Last Escape: Dead Complex
summary: Dead Complex is a 2D Top Down, Survival Horror Game. Sneak, Loot and Fight your way out of an infested apartment complex and begin your final escape from the city.

name: Last Epoch: Tombs of the Erased
summary: Experience epic endgame updates, face off against brand-new and fearsome bosses, and unlock a trove of exclusive items and Uniques. With groundbreaking quality-of-life updates, this is the most extensive update Last Epoch has ever seen. Don't miss out—jump into the world of Eterra

name: Last Kiss Before Summer
summary: An unknown illness has gripped you since birth, stranding you indoors most of your life. Despite this, you've spent your days happily learning about the world around you. But recently, your illness has progressed rapidly, leaving you with only 33 days left to live! Determined to make the most of your time, you enroll in school and seek out experiences you’ve never had before—like love. Will your last days be as blissful as you’d hoped?

name: Last-Hit Defense
summary: Defense game in which you build towers to block enemies from approaching.Action game in which you control a hero to eliminate monsters.An innovative 'Action-Defense' game created by merging two game genres !

name: Last Train to Tranz-Central
summary: Welcome to Last Train to Tranz-Central, a two-part run 'n' gun adventure for the beloved ZX Spectrum! There are 64 levels in total across 8 unique Space Trains (each part has 32 levels, spread across 4 trains) and 8 Rogue AI bosses to defeat or escape from.

name: Last
summary:
The world is about to end. It's your last chance to let go of your fears and leave your mark on the world.

A short kinetic novel about existing outside of the gender binary, feeling like you're running out of time and embracing your desires.

name: Last Tale
summary: For a whole year the monkey rules the world, but the moment came when she needed to leave. The monkey did not want to part with her throne, and then she decided that if no one celebrates the new year, next year will not come. Therefore, she decided to spoil all the holiday. A mellow monkey sent a magic charm on a toy in a bag of Santa Claus.

name: Latex, Leather, Lipstick, Love, Lust
summary: A self-described "chronically online" trans guy goes to a kink club thinking it will fix him. It doesn't.

name: Las Vegas Poker & Blackjack
summary: Las Vegas Poker & Blackjack is a computerized version of different types of Poker and Blackjack, including 7-Card Stud and 5-Card Draw. The player inputs how much "money" that is available to bet with. There is one and two-player games, and Las Vegas Poker & Blackjack includes a dealer to play against. Developed by John Brooks for APh Technological Consulting and published by Mattel Electronics

name: Laydock 2: Last Attack
summary: Sequel to the successful shoot 'm up Laydock. Again two jet fighters go on a joint mission, each space ship managed and controlled by a different player. The ships can be docked side-by-side or end-to-end for greater fire and fighting power. When docked one player is the pilot and the other is the weapons officer. But this game can also be played by a single player. When you progress in the game you can select more advance weapons systems to fight the over 50 different enemy characters. Compared with its predecessor there is not much changed only better graphics, more detailed backgrounds and inter level animations.

name: Landmark
summary:
"Welcome to the place where creativity and adventure thrive! 
 
Landmark is a world shaped by the passion, talent, and ambition of its players. Explore and impact the world around you. Spark your creativity alongside a community where everyone has a chance to share something memorable." 
 
"As a powerful Luminary, you have the ability to mold landscapes and turn imagination into reality. Use your powers of inspiration to create your own story in this world, from a monster-plagued dungeon, to an intricate spaceship, or the house of your dreams. In Landmark if you can dream it, you can build it! 
 
Along the way, you’ll meet other Luminaries eager to team up to build shared creations, battle monsters, or enjoy interactive experiences that YOU’VE designed. The possibilities are endless here, so establish your site, fire up your imagination, and get ready to create! "

name: Lamu
summary: Lamu is an adventurous, single-player 2D RPG game.Improve your farm during the day.Protect your friends at night and battle enemies.

name: Labublas: Battle Royale Shooter
summary: Blablublas Battle Royale Shooter drops you into a vibrant world where you face off against numerous challengers in a high-stakes competition. As the last contender standing, you must rely on your instincts and quick thinking to outlast every opponent. The journey challenges your decision-making and perseverance as you fight to become the ultimate champion and secure your place among the legends of Blablublas land. Each encounter pushes you to adapt and stay sharp in the relentless battle for survival. Prepare to test your limits as you overcome fierce competition and prove your dominance in this thrilling solo experience. The path to victory is tough, but only one can claim the crown.

name: Lara Croft Go: Mirror of Spirits
summary: The Mirror of Spirits is heavily inspired by the Croft Manor and classic encounters with Lara’s doppelgänger. This new chapter includes over 25 puzzles, completely new mechanics, and a new artifact to collect.

name: Last Stand Halloween
summary:
An Atari7800 weekend exploration that became a game.
You are stuck in the middle of the screen and must shoot everything!

name: Late Shift: Midnight Burger
summary: A cozy horror game where you own and manage a burger shop. Prepare burger, serve customers, and survive the midnight nightmare.

name: Last Fantasy Hentai
summary: Last Fantasy Hentai continues to tell the story of a guy who is transported to a fantasy world where he meets women ready to fulfill their most pleasurable desires.

name: Last War
summary: Partner with players from all over the globe to battle the zombies. Stay alert – alliances are complex, and not every survivor you encounter is friendly.

name: Lasagna Boy
summary: An adventure horror game with a Gameboy aesthetic. Lasagna boy brings a mix of puzzle, adventure, and platforming along with some minor shooting elements, all packaged together in a charming yet haunting pixel art style.

name: Land of Legends: Heroes of Loria
summary: Land of Legends: Heroes of Loria takes place in the fantasy world of Loria, a Human kingdom besieged by conflict with the Orcs. A group of heroes, which includes you, is being cast down by the All-Seeing-Eye to save humanity once again. Travel alone or with your friends in co-operative mode through the rich and colourful world of Loria and end the Orcs' evil reign.

name: Last Chance Market
summary: When a grocery list becomes a struggle to survive against cosmic horrors, will you make it through the door? Stay alive, solve the mystery and make your offerings - or end up on a missing person poster in this first-person, non-linear nightmare. But you'd better hurry, the store's closing soon.

name: Last Days
summary: The gods have blessed New Canaan for four hundred years, and everyone - including Sister Ginsetsu - thought it would go on forever, until the day Ginsetsu met the gods of New Canaan. Since then, the story between the maiden who calls herself a god, and the maiden who will become a god has begun.

name: Lapso
summary: Lapso is a single player first-person exploration game, with particular attention paid to the environmental narrative and sound. It develops through the figure of a scientific illustrator camping near a lake, documenting a special assignment.

name: Launching Over It
summary: Launching Over It is a challenging and emotional journey through levels inspired by the developer’s childhood memories. To reach the end, you’ll need to overcome all kinds of obstacles—by launching a ball. Sounds simple? Think again.

name: Labyrinth: The Wizard's Cat
summary: Enter the dungeon and help the master wizard to find his cat in this oldschool dungeon crawler. Discover powerful magical items and weapons. Solve puzzles and traps and fight the enemies in this real time combat dungeon crawler game.

name: Laser Blast!
summary: Help Atom Girl defeat waves of enemies trying to stop her as she races through space. Use her ability to change into a ship and back to blast her foes into stardust.

name: Last Colony
summary:
Run your colony after the collapse of society

Recruit colonists, craft weapons and supplies and venture out from your colony base to gather resources
Life is rough in the new world with hardcore shooter gameplay to match

Craft guns, bombs, meds and armor
Upgrade your guns with 50+ possible combinations
Chose an ability that matches your play style
Level up to unlock more crafting recipes

name: Last Shark Standing
summary:
Last Shark Standing is an award winning, couch-play party game where you use your superior fishing skills to throw other players out of the arena, competing to be the last shark standing.

The game features a unique hooking mechanic, hit a player and you will fling them behind you. Miss and you will be pulled to the location of your hit.
Players can see where you are aiming and react accordingly, so you'll need to predict the opponent's reaction to outmaneuver them.

The simple three-button control scheme makes the game easy to pick up for anyone, yet has enough depth to master.

name: Labyrinth
summary:
Besides the classic square mazes, there are many original circular and triangular mazes to discover.

There are also some special maze shapes like rabbit, guitar or tree mazes. Have fun searching for the exit through this fascinating puzzle experience.

Challenge yourself with a journey through a constellation of mazes that can be played in 7 different game modes, including our unique twisted mazes with teleportation portals.

name: Lachesis or Atropos
summary: This world is woven of strings, of fate and of hate. What do you see, detective? A horror-mystery yuri visual novel peering into the maddening darkness of love and death.

name: Land Above Sea Below
summary: Land Above Sea Below is an atmospheric building strategy and puzzle game where you have to build your island from tiles in order to raise its height as much as possible, to avoid it getting flooded by the constantly rising sea level.

name: Land of the Vikings
summary: From victuals to Vikings, lead your village and expand it into a thriving city. A wise Jarl must manage resources, survive harsh conditions and enemy raids, and guide their fellow Vikings to work together through social conflict. Skál!

name: Last Room
summary: Last Room is a logical puzzle game in the genre of fantasy horror.

name: Larentia
summary: Julius is an aspiring adventurer visiting port city of Genoa in Larentia region. The city is prospering and thus there is a constant shortage of manpower. Julius answers the call to make a name for himself over three years.

name: La Tour des Ombres
summary: Tower of Shadows is a turn-based strategy game where every decision counts. Climb the levels one by one, face formidable opponents, and perfect your tactics to reach the top. Your ultimate challenge? The Master of Shadows himself.

name: Last City
summary: Last City features stunning and verisimilitude 3D graphic design brings you a thrill game world to discover. With a console-like designed on mobile control panel, it challenges your skill and ability of game plays. Skating is the key concept to start all the actions and movements. You can enjoy high-speedy skating and drifting, hover flying, anti-gravity moving, 360 degree rotating on mobile screen with smooth action performance!! The environment is really worse, with limited oxygen support, you have to destroy the creatures, expend and protect the power stations, assign the proper agent to take mission. It challenges your strategy and control skill to protect human from death. Mission must be completed, and must succeed, once all the power stations are ruined, human will be destroyed right away.

name: Landnama
summary: Face the judgment of winter’s deadly toll as you lead the first Viking clans to settle Iceland in this non-violent, rogue-lite survival base builder.

name: Last Days of Lazarus
summary: After their mother's suicide, Lazarus returns home to his sister Lyudmila. But unexplained events make the world and even reality collapse around him. Looming death, a spreading malediction and the supernatural threaten his sanity, yet Lazarus pushes forward to find the truth about his family.

name: Late Homework
summary: Retrieve your forgotten class assignments from school while avoiding the creature known to haunt it at night.

name: Lastlore Saga
summary: Select your party in this tactical RPG roguelike. Choose from a list of characters with unique abilities and gear for vast amount of build ideas. Classic feel of old school 16 bit RPG games, updated roguelike gameplay and progression for infinite replayability!

name: Lapsus
summary: LAPSUS is a thrilling 2D Puzzle-Platformer that will make you think in multiple timelines simultaneously. Squeeze your brain to solve challenges in a way never seen before. Manipulate the laws of physics to overcome 80+ levels across unique worlds and push your mind and fingers to the limit!

name: Lami: A Cup of Code & Coffee
summary: Inheriting Grandpa’s Old Café… and Meeting a Cute Robot Girl?! Use all your skills to develop unique gadgets and run the café alongside the adorable Lami. Face exciting challenges and gradually uncover Lami’s story!

name: Layers of Fear 2
summary: Layers of Fear 2 is a first-person psychological horror game with an emphasis on exploration and story. Players control a Hollywood actor who heeds the call of an enigmatic director to take on the lead role in a film shot aboard an ocean liner. Beware, for all may not truly be what it seems.

name: Last Journal
summary: Last Journal is an interactive graphic novel where you play as John Weston, fighting to survive a deadly pandemic. Your choices shape the story, leading to branching paths, alliances, and multiple endings. Choose wisely—survive or perish.

name: Lama Azavtani
