summary: In the game, we can experience that in the moderate violent combat, the survival days will increase while breaking through the barrier, and different days and states will usher in different plot trends. Lama Azavtani tells the story of survivors fighting for survival after the end of the day.

name: Late Shift
summary: Late Shift is a first-person horror game. Immerse yourself in a realistic thriller and try to escape the death that follows your life as a night shift worker at a gas station.

name: Last Summer
summary: A 2D narrative adventure with retro art. Explore districts, solve problems, unlock abilities, and bring color back to a broken city. Inspired by metroidvania, platformers, and emotional indie games with deep stories.

name: Last Soul
summary: What will happen if after death you prove to all hell that you are worthy to live ...

name: Ladderhead
summary: A surreal narrative focused roguelite text adventure. In it you play a man stuck in the same day who has to get to the top floor of an unusual building to find his loved one. Each floor is a perilous mystery to unravel. Each time you die the day resets.

name: La La Land 5
summary:
La La Land is the third game in the La La Land series, a pentalogy of short experimental videogames by Matt Aldridge (a.k.a. theanemic) which share a recurring cast, subliminal and fable-like storytelling, and a haunting atmosphere.

In the third installment, Biggt is a salesperson. Every day, he wakes up and sells his merchandise to pink salmon villagers. Your goal is to reach the end of the level, symbolized by a bed. Upon reaching it, you start a new day and the whole salesman act starts again. But the screen gets fuzzier with every passing day.

name: Launch & Loot
summary: Launch & Loot is a rogue-lite dungeon crawler with vibrant pixel art, where each room is procedurally generated. Use the environment to your advantage by throwing objects and loot to defeat enemies. Discover unique power-ups that change your playstyle with every run!

name: La Chose De Grotemburg
summary:
La Chose de Grotemburg is a text adventure with graphics in French. The protagonist returns to his town after travelling to find his young wife dead. The search for the one responsible bring the character to different locations such a forest, an underground environment and a mansion where the one responsible resides.

Most of the screen provides a view of the environment with detailed graphics. At the bottom of the screen text descriptions appear and commands are entered. On the right possible movement options based on the four wind directions are displayed.

name: La Vie en Rose
summary: In this beautiful rose-coloured world, which path will our love lead to?

name: Last Ninja 2: Back with a Vengeance
summary: Once beaten, but not destroyed, the evil Shogun Kunitoki used all his mystic powers to transport himself through time and establish a new empire of tyranny in modern day Manhattan. Only you can stop him!

name: Ladykiller in a Bind
summary: An erotic romantic comedy about social manipulation, crossdressing, and girls tying up other girls. Will the hapless lesbian ladykiller Beast succeed at pretending to be her ruthless twin? By the creators of Analogue: A Hate Story, featuring choice-driven mechanics... and lots of sex.

name: Laments of a Platinum Rose
summary: A mixed-media visual novel about a robot and God. A story-focused visual novel game where the player can explore Nexus and interact with the world in whatever order they like, with a story emphasizing the player's agency.

name: Labyrinth
summary: Make your way through the procedural mazes of the Labyrinth. Compete with friends on the leaderboards as you rack up points and battle for the title of the Lord Of The Maze.

name: Laundry Boss Simulator
summary: Lather, rinse, profit.

name: Last Days
summary: Save or enslave? "Last Days" is a survival, zombie, horror, rpg game where every choice matters and will affect you long term.

name: Langoth
summary: Langoth (Old English) means a very specific yearning, when a person had a vision of Paradise – and it was gone, but the rest of his life he was looking for it reflections.

name: Lake Haven: Chrysalis
summary: Detective Zeke Reynold is called to investigate what he assumes will be another case he'll quickly forget, but what he finds will be sewn into the fabric of his existence forever.

name: Lady Knight Quest
summary: When the city-state of Marito falls on hard times, it submits to annexation by the expansive Vanderland Empire. But not all in Marito are pleased by their new overlords, and dissent is brewing. Felicia Arde, a stoic and accomplished imperial knight, is given an important task: go to Marito and win the support of the people by any means necessary. Leaving behind her fiance, she travels to unfamiliar shores to carry out her duty...

name: Late Night Talks
summary: A short, late-night conversation with an exorcist. Who's also your boss.

name: LakeSide
summary: Build and manage a quiet town by the lake or expand it into a picturesque city state in this side-scrolling city builder featuring hybrid mechanics. Construct marvelous buildings, epic wonders and become the envy of the known world!

name: La Rana
summary: In La Rana, players explore the lost Rain Temple of Rana. Play as a small spirit frog who is the temple's last remaining caretaker. Traverse its grand chambers and winding passages to restore its former power and revive your fellow frog spirits along the way.

name: La Crypte des Maudits
summary: Fan Remake of "Black Sect 2: The Cursed Crypt".

name: La torre de Mario
summary: Mario climbs the tower but you got to be faster or you wont be the real mario.

name: Labyrinth of Galleria: Coven of Dusk - Limited Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following
Game: Labyrinth of Galleria: Coven of Dusk
Soundtrack (by Tenpei Sato)
Three-sided spine box
Original Game Card "Labyrinth of Galleria"

name: Last Oasis
summary: "Keep moving, the world is dying in this Nomadic Survival MMO. Build walking mobile bases and travel to new lands. Create clans and fight for territory. Resources deplete fast, so take your sword and scavenge, pirate, and trade to stay alive."

name: Labyrinthatory
summary: The best puzzle-based top-down pixel art comedy collectathon adventure based in a retro futuristic formica punk science mansion ever made! Solve hundreds of puzzles with variable difficulty settings as you move through a comedy-mystery storyline.

name: Last Regiment
summary: Engage in epic simultaneous turn-based combat in this fusion of cards and map-based strategy. Assemble your regiment, brandish your might, and lead your forces to triumph!

name: LabRat
summary: A point and click horror game in an abandoned lab, finding clues to what happened to the place before something in the darkness gets to you.

name: Latent Experience
summary: Latent Technology's first tech demo. A journey through different worlds built with Generative Physics Animation technology, featuring, for the very first time, fully physical and interactive characters.

name: Lanesplitterz
summary: Lanesplitterz is a 3D arcade-style bowling game. Join Hiro as he competes in a brutal bowling tournament to become King of Neo Las Vegas!

name: Lawnmower Day
summary: A simple collection game with spawning tokens and enemy

name: Lawnmower Game Racing 2: Drunken
summary: Sequel to lawnmower racing game. Drive now against stupid ai opponents in this world slowest racing game. Try to finish tracks and collect achievements

name: Land of Towers
summary: Land of Towers is a VR adventure game for the whole family. Reality-based quests, distinctive architecture, intuitive controls, creative workshop, picturesque locations for relaxation.

name: Lazer Tag Arena
summary: Join One Man Makes Games for the release of my latest title "Lazer Tag Arena". A free-to-play, multiplayer, peer-to-peer, free-for-all Arena Shooter, which is heavily inspired by the laser tag aesthetic and playstyle. Play with up to 6 friends people per lobby.

name: Last Definitive Fantasy
summary: A parody to shabby made RPG Maker games and homage to old classics of the J-RPG genre.

name: Lacey's Wardrobe
summary: Lacey needs your help to find the best outfits for every occasion. Play dress-up Lacey and experience amazing moments with her!

name: Ladybug Quest
summary: Ladybug Quest is a 3D, tile based, action-platformer that sends players on a story-driven adventure following the journey of a Ladybug on a quest to save her colony! Hop and dodge your way through the enchanting environments, while immersing yourself in the riveting story.

name: Laserpitium
summary: Blast off on a critical mission to free the galaxy from artificial governance in this side-scrolling 2D shoot’em up!

name: Lab Chaos
summary: Lab Chaos is a fun and challenging indie action platformer game. If you're a casual gamer, a completionist or love to speedrun, Lab Chaos is the game for you.

name: Lamia Must Die
summary: A horrible monster has been terrorizing the local town for years, doing terrible, unspeakable things to the citizen. One day, a paladin leads several other heroes towards the cave where the monster lies in, them being the final hope for the town of Clearmill and to save it from total devastation.

name: Lackadaisium
summary: Lackadaisium is a surrealist adventure game with puzzle and action elements. It is autobiographical. Made stream-of-consciousness style during a six year-long depressive episode, it aims not just to be a fun adventure, but also to make you feel and confront all sorts of uncomfortable emotions that the author experienced during that time.

name: Lan Master
summary:
Lan Master is a puzzle game for NES, inspired by the game NetWalk. The goal is to connect all of the computers on each level. Rotate the pieces and connect the wires before the timer runs out! There are fifty levels in all, with increasing difficulty. A password system is included so whether you’re playing in an emulator or on a console, you can come back later and pick up where you left off. 
 
The game was entered into the NES Coding Compo 2011 and scored second place.

name: Last Inua
summary: A father and son tale, Last Inua will leave you breathless with its immersive, emotional and captivating gameplay. Last Inua is an immersive and emotional, award winning 2D platform adventure game developed by Glowforth. Designed for the young and old and mixing classic platform genres, culminating in a captivating experience, Last Inua tells the tale of an Inuit family’s fight for survival against a fearsome demon and the harsh elements of the mythical Arctic.

name: Lands of Achra
summary: Lands of Achra is a dark fantasy strategy game of a lost age. Build a customized force as a hero, monster or nation, fight your enemies in brutal autobattles and strive to vanquish the procedurally generated world. Seek glory, against all who struggle upon the distorted earth...

name: Last Stop: Station 66
summary:
You fell asleep during a train ride after visiting your friend. Upon awakening you realize you've arrived at the last stop, except this line shouldn't have more than 25 stops, but you've now arrived at Station 66. Uncover the mystery behind what is actually going on, and go in depth with the multiple outcomes to your story and ultimately your demise.

Features 2 different endings depending on player actions through non-linear gameplay routes and exploration taking the player to different locations and providing different outcomes. To fully understand the story you must complete both.

Last Stop: Station 66 is a 90s VHS Found Footage Psychological Thriller Horror experience that plays on realistic situations and claustrophobic environments with a deep atmosphere.

name: Lake House: Children of Silence
summary: Long-forgotten memories bubble to the surface when the past invades the present in The Lake House: Children of Silence! Located at the edge of a gloomy lake and shrouded in fog, the house at the center of this story has stood empty for 15 years. Beckoned by what appears to be a ghost, a woman who lived there as a child returns to the house to solve a mystery that begins with an old photograph and ends in a secret room. Find hidden objects, solve puzzles and prepare yourself for an ending that will take you to a place darker than you can imagine!

name: Labyrinth: The War on Terror
summary: Face the global war on terror in this engaging 2 player strategy game. Set against recent world events, Labyrinth portrays the U.S. efforts to counter extremists’ use of terrorist tactics, as well as the wider ideological struggle – guerrilla warfare, fundamentalist rule, regime change and more.

name: Lawgivers II
summary: Lawgivers II is a political sandbox game which offers multiple ways to experience the process of ruling and approving bills. Start your political adventure from the very bottom and perhaps one day, lead your nation to become the most influential in the world.

name: Lazriel the Demon's Fall
summary: The angel "Lazriel" was dropped into the demon world. The only way to return to the heavenly world is to go up the tower. Go up the tower before she "fall" to the demon's power, and aim to return alive.

name: Last Armageddon
summary:
The humans who breathed the toxin-filled air on the Earth's surface became one with the Earth and kept dissolving. The history of humanity ended and dominion of the planet returned to the demons. These mutant creatures did not depend on oxygen to survive. Therefore, they were able to breathe the air and use the land.Meanwhile, an army of robots wage World War IV against the demons in order to conquer what is now known as Makai - the Demon World. These robots came to the planet on a wave of energy that created an explosion that turned the world into a wasteland. Much later in the game, concurrent themes including Adolf Hitler, war, creating a perfect race of people, and the destruction of humanity in the year 1999 are revealed to the player inside one of the robot's main bases.

Can the demons gain dominion on the humans' old planet or will robots enforce impose a millennium of logic and dictatorial force throughout Makai? Playing as the robots is not an option that is open to the player. Therefore, the player must take advantage of his or her mutant army and crush the robot invaders. This game builds on the fear of robot domination of the world that has been featured greatly in movies from The Terminator to Terminator Salvation. The gameplay is similar to Final Fantasy as the turn-based fights are viewed from a third-person perspective.

name: Law School
summary: A 3D adult visual novel where your choices shape relationships, rivalries, and a gripping story. Dive into drama, humor, mini-games, romance and a fully interactive social app in the journey of a young law student at Stocklinburg College.

name: Lalli
summary: Lalli tells the tale of a Finnish folk hero and freedom fighter. In 1240, Finland is invaded by the neighboring Swedish Kingdom, aiming to convert the tribes to Christianity by force. This is when a regular woodsman is forced to adapt into a warrior - and a legend, remembered centuries later.

name: Last Chess Standing
summary: Last Chess Standing is a casual chess puzzle game, perfect for beginners. The goal is to capture pieces until only one remains on the board.

name: Launderley
summary: A horror and exploration adventure that tells the story of Blanche, who was found alone in the gardens of Launderley, in front of a pile of twenty-nine corpses.

name: Labyrinth
summary: A maze game shooter

name: Last Floor
summary: Оne day your life changes dramatically and you become a hostage of your own home. Your task is to survive but to do this you need to get outside.

name: La Ruota Della Sfortuna: Prima parte
summary:
"You've received a strange message (an MMS... yes, you read that right) from your uncle, and you've just arrived at his house to find out what happened.

Strangely, all the lights are off, and the front door is open.

The situation worries you a bit, but you gather your courage—your uncle might be in danger.

You turn on your phone's flashlight and step inside..."

"La Ruota Della Sfortuna - Prima parte" is the first part of the game. It was created to participate in the ITALOCURSO Game Jam 2024."

name: Labyrinths of the World: Fool's Gold - Collector's Edition
summary: Can you save your friend from the world of leprechauns of before your luck runs out?

name: Last Time I Saw You
summary:
Last Time I Saw You is a coming-of-age narrative adventure about first loves and acceptance. An uplifting story, rich with complex characters, set in a vibrantly imagined vision of late 80s Japan.

Join Ayumi on an exciting tale of self-discovery in which he'll face his first tentative steps into adulthood and confront the terrible curse that has fallen upon his hometown.

name: Lareissa Everbright
summary:
Bursting with equipment, Gwenaelle is set to deliver a holy relic to Fort Trista. To do so, she must power through the monsters that assail her by picking the right tools for each encounter. 
 
Consider Every Item 
Each and every item has its use in battle. With each use, the durability of Gwenaelle's weapons and trinkets drop and eventually break. Find the perfect combination of four pieces of equipment in each combat situation in order to pull through to the end. 
 
Core Features 
 - Manage a large inventory of items, each which performs a different action in combat. 
 - 16 unique pieces of equipment, from the claymore to the crossbow to even the flag staff and more! 
 - Turn the tide with the Judgement system which builds from taking damage, allowing the use of special equipment actions. 
 - Be wary that monsters can counter your Judgement with a similar meter called Revenge. 
 - Slowly uncover Gwenaelle's motivation and purpose as she converses with her horse, Prixton, between fights. 
 - Reach the true ending with perfect equipment execution and preservation. 
 - ...Or relax in comfy mode if it all becomes too overwhelming (*￣▽￣)b 
 
Preserve and prevail!

name: Last Kids on Earth: Hit the Deck!
summary: The Monster-Zombie Apocalypse means no homework, no parents, and no rules! Become zombie-fighting, monster-bashing heroes in this action-packed rogue-like strategy card game.

name: Last Window: The Secret of Cape West
summary: Last Window: The Secret of Cape West is an adventure video game developed by the now-defunct Cing and published by Nintendo for the Nintendo DS handheld game console. It is the sequel to Hotel Dusk: Room 215, starring protagonist Kyle Hyde and placed one year after the events of its predecessor. The game has visual and audio styles similar to that of the first game. In Last Window, Kyle Hyde is living in the Cape West Apartments, Los Angeles, in 1980. The story of this sequel is separate from the first game, even though it includes some connections to it. Last Window was the last game developed by Cing before the company filed for bankruptcy on March 1, 2010.

name: La-Mulana 2: The Tower of Oannes
summary: The first piece of downloadable content for La-Mulana 2, the newly-added map – The Tower of Oannes. Ranks with the previous instalment’s Hell Temple in difficulty, acting as an optional distraction from the main journey, filled with brutal level design and humour akin to a Masocore title.

name: Lazy Girl
summary: Action-platformer with puzzles for the most hardcore gamers! Help the young wizard to save her loved one. Use your reaction, intelligence, and some gravity-changing magic to complete ten dungeons and fight the evil technomage.

name: Last Escape
summary: Last Escape - is one of some 3D shooters with surviving elements where you play as a cyborg Stephen. He is anxious to revenge everyone who made him who he is.

name: Lambda Spellcrafting Academy
summary: Develop magical programming abilities while building spells. Lambda Spellcrafting Academy is a card-based puzzle game where you build spells (programs) to solve puzzles. Fun for complete beginners or professional wizards.

name: Late Stage Capitalism
summary: You're stuck at your home desk, clicking away at your keyboard. If only you could get away from it all... but everything just costs, and costs, and costs some more. Going outside is expensive, walking has a price, passing a street will cost you, even meeting a puppy could prove to ruin your wallet! Amass more money, and reach the airport to finally escape this madness, hopefully for good!

name: Latin America Empire 2027
summary: Lead your Latin empire in an empire building turn based strategy war game. Are you ready to lead, Supreme Commander?

name: Landflix Odyssey
summary: Landflix Odyssey is a 2D Platformer that mixes many gameplay elements from various genres. Play as Larry, a lazy binge watcher who ends up in a dimension that’s based upon his favorite Landflix (a video-on-demand parody) TV shows.

name: Lady Thalia and the Seraskier Sapphires
summary: Navigate fraught social situations by day and pull off heists by night as Lady Thalia, the not-actually-aristocratic thief bent on making a mockery of British high society.

name: Land of Idyllic Beauty
summary: Welcome to "Land Of Idyllic Beauty" a simulation management game that combines farming, store management, supply chain management, and romance elements. Experience the beauty of the idyllic life, starting from a small plot of farmland, gradually building your agricultural and commercial empire!

name: Lair of Anubis
summary: You became an archaeologist to uncover the truths of ancient civilisations. You heard a story about a pyramid hidden deep in the sand, accessible only once every few centuries. You didn't put much stock in the story, but decided to investigate it anyway.

name: Laser Battle Cats: Travel & Destroy!
summary: Tame kittens, develop your workshop, and experiment in the lab! Build a laser on your battle cat and destroy your enemies!

name: Labyrinth Trials
summary: Descend into the ever-shifting Labyrinth Trials, a relentless roguelike FPS where survival depends on your skill, your weapon, and a little bit of luck. Face hordes of nightmarish creatures, scavenge powerful upgrades, and conquer the maze… or die trying.

name: Lawnmower Game: Next Generation
summary: In Lanwmower game you drive lawnmower and cut grass in a big open world which contain grass, houses and other obstacles! Drive lawnmower in open world and cut every cuttable grass right in front of you. After cutting all grass, it will respawn - the game loop is endless. Lawnmower has also fuel consumptio mechanics. Pick-up Jerry cans and add fuel. If you run out of fuel you will respawn at the starting location. Enjoy the game, cut all the grass and be the Lawnmower King!

name: Lands of Lore: Guardians of Destiny
summary: In Lands of Lore: Guardians of Destiny you enter a world of intense beauty and mortal danger where your slightest move can trigger cataclysmic events, miraculous escapes, or lethal battles. See magical cities rise out of great oceans. Enter the musty caverns of Dracoid ruins. Discover gruesome altars and witness secret ceremonies never before seen by humans.

name: Last Question
summary: "Last Question" is a VR puzzle-solving game where you experience escaping from a locked room in first-person perspective.

name: Last Gasp
summary:
Whatever you do, do not give up.

Create a party on the fly and engage in Turn-Based JRPG Combat. Awakening in the world of Limbo, the Wanderer must take hold of their inspirations to escape. Limbo constantly changes and ideas will flow. You will have to work with what you're given and improvise your strategy.

name: Last Guest
summary: Last Guest is a first-person psychological horror game. You are a tired traveler who stops at a creepy roadside motel. The motel on the highway seems normal at first glance, but only at first glance. Strange staff and rumors about room 8 will make you question the reality of what is happening.

name: Last Second Save
summary: A story set in Cavemanon's Snoot Game by snoot_talk. Anon gets his act together and stops himself at the very brink of Ending 1. Now that he's at the edge of the abyss, he has to make his way back up. Alas, he can't undo the damage that's already been done, but that doesn't mean he won't try.

name: La Residencia Del Doctor Gallagher
summary: A retro-style point-and-click adventure. Step into the peculiar Gallagher Mansion to uncover its darkest secrets.

name: Lawnmower Game 2: Drifter
summary: Sequel to Lawnmower Game. Drive with more faster lawnmowers and game contains 3 gamemodes

name: Last Message
summary: Last message is a short atmospheric thriller / narrative / adventure game that brings you into a world overrun by infected.

name: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
summary: The world of the hit television show Law & Order: Criminal Intent comes to life on the PC as players take on the role of Detective Robert Goren to investigate four all-new murder cases while taking the on the role of Detective Robert Goren. Actor Vincent D'Onofrio voices the character while you scrutinize the crime scenes, analyze evidence and interview witnesses and suspects. With beautifully rendered graphics and voices just like members of the show's cast, this thrilling 3rd person mystery adventure game will have players feeling like they've stepped into an actual episode of Law & Order: Criminal Intent.

name: Laserstorm
summary: Welcome to Laserstorm, the wild, free-for-all, shooter where you can unleash chaos as your favorite critter, decked out in your choice of stylish hats! Join up to 3 other friends in a frenzy of lasers and excitement, where only the savviest animals survive.

name: Land of Puzzles: Castles
summary: In Land of Puzzles: Castles the king and queen need your help. To avoid war the king has accepted a challenge of puzzles to solve. He needs you to solve 15 sets of challenging puzzles and help him secure the kingdom.

name: Labyrinth
summary:
Labyrinth is a bold and innovative new Collectible Card Game (CCG) adventure that allows  players  to experience  the  depth  of  traditional  CCGs and  the  action  of  tactical role-playing games in an immersive 3D universe. 
In Labyrinth,  players are both Adventurers and Dungeon Masters.  As Adventurers they must assemble a powerful deck of Heroes and then invade rival dungeons and engage in epic player vs. player 3D battles to capture loot. As Dungeon Masters, they will use the loot from conquests to customize their own dungeons and put together a powerful deck of Bosses, Monsters and Trap cards to defend their riches at all costs.
An additional level of strategy is introduced as multi-player battles are fought asynchronously, which means each player can take their time to plan their defense.
Labyrinth is set in a vast and wondrous city called Starfall.  Once a peaceful and thriving market city, age-old pacts and alliances have broken down creating turmoil and unrest.  The  earliest  settlers  have  consolidated  their  power  and  look  to  push  out  rivals  while newcomers to the city seek to carve out territory for themselves.  As night falls, a silent war  begins  in  the  tunnels,  alleys,  and  halls  of  the  ancient city  and  every  player  must battle for survival.

name: La Galerie des Toilettes
summary: Explore a museum containing the word's greatest collection of toilet art.

name: Last Epoch: Deluxe Edition
summary:
The Last Epoch Deluxe Edition is a fantastic way to join the fight, slay your way across Eterra in style, and support the development of the action RPG of the future!

The Last Epoch Deluxe Edition includes the following cosmetic items:
- "Golden Guppy" the Baby Chronowyrm - Pre-Order Exclusive - Cosmetic Pet
- 50 Epoch Points (EP)
- Adolescent Chronowyrm - Cosmetic Pet*
- Fallen Ronin - Cosmetic Armor Set*
- Firefly’s Refuge - Cosmetic Portal*
- Full Original Digital Soundtrack (OST)**

Cosmetic items require an online connection and are not available in offline mode.

*These items will unlock and become equipable at 1.0 (February 21st, 2024 - 11am CST)
**This item will be delivered at a later date following the release of patch 1.0

name: Last Man Standing
summary: Last Man Standing is an adrenaline fueled non-stop shoot out where players must outwit, outgun and outplay opponents to ultimately be crowned the Last Man Standing in a massive dynamic warzone. Players are thrown into the battlefield with up to 100 other players fighting each other and searching the environment for weaponry and attachments to enhance your tactical style and get the edge in competition modes.

name: Lands of Ryuu
summary: Lands of Ryuu is a tower defense game that brings strategy and exploration together. Defend your homeland against waves of enemies using totems, spells and other manifestations of your power.

name: Lapso: Nimbo
summary:
Kali Müller knew Rockrose like the back of her hand, she used to camp by the lake with her partner Illai and it was common to see her walking each of the trails. The last time she was seen was on the path leading to the lighthouse, where she used to sit and draw the unique figures of the shrines, fascinated by the local stories about miracles, strange symbols and unexplained medical recoveries.

Delve into Rockrose after her strange disappearance and find out if the legends are true...

Lapso: Nimbo is a short adventure as a prologue to the story of the main game. Some factors like performance, graphics, sfx, music,... are subject to improvement, so the final result in LAPSO could change. We hope you enjoy it.

name: Labubu Battle Royale
summary: Labubu Battle Royale plunges you into a vivid, living forest where every corner hides danger and excitement! Feel the adrenaline as you soar above the treetops, the wind rushing past, and prepare to land in a world where only the sharpest and quickest survive. The forest is alive with movement and sounds—rustling leaves, distant shouts, and the echo of distant gunfire. Every step could lead to glory or disaster, and every choice matters in your quest to become the ultimate survivor.

name: Last Legion UX
summary: Last Legion UX is a platform game for the Nintendo 64. It was released only in Japan in 1999.

name: Lake of Darkness
summary: Your small town is slowly becoming corrupted by a mysterious evil, In a dream you get a premonition of your own death. How do you avoid an unknown fate? Spend your final moments wisely in this choice-based psychological horror visual novel game.

name: Lawnarchy
summary: A card game for gardening lunatics: manicure your lawn, trim your hedges – and steam roll over your neighbors' flowers!

name: Labyrinth: The Computer Game
summary: Labyrinth: The Computer Game is a 1986 graphic adventure game developed by Lucasfilm Games and published by Activision. Based on the fantasy film Labyrinth, it tasks the player with navigating a maze while solving puzzles and evading dangers. The player's goal is to find and defeat the main antagonist, Jareth, within 13 real-time hours. Unlike other adventure games of the period, Labyrinth does not feature a command-line interface. Instead, the player uses two scrolling "word wheel" menus on the screen to construct basic sentences.

name: Langrisser I & II: Limited Edition Box
summary:
This edition includes the following:

- Langrisser I & II
- Limited Edition Box with artwork by Satoshi Urushihara
- Art Book
- Soundtrack CD

name: Last Star
summary: Last Star is a space shooter roguelite with tower defense elements. Pilot a spaceship to protect your solar core from endless waves of alien invaders. Upgrade both your core and spaceship to become unstoppable. Execute tactical counterattacks against alien motherships to slow down the invasion.

name: Late Laundry
summary:
It's late at night, you just want to do your laundry but there's no water at home due to pipe burst so you venture out and find this 24 hour laundry place, you wont like what happens there...

In this game you will get to experience what happened to the player that you are playing as, the horrific events this place has to offer such as doing laundry late at night in a mysterious area, that definitely doesn't have any scary events or monster running around.

name: Lacuna
summary: A murder. A hack. A bombing. All it takes to plunge the solar system into war – unless you do something about it. Help CDI agent Neil Conrad make a string of increasingly difficult decisions in this modern dialog-driven adventure set in a gorgeous 2D sci-fi noir universe.

name: Lawnmower Game: 2024
summary: Lawnmower game saga is back. Drive now original lawnmower vehicle, cut grass, hang around and collect items in this story which is based now to futuristic food place

name: Labyrinths of the World: Changing the Past HD
Labyrinths of the World: Shattered Soul - Collector's Edition
summary: Margaret's soul has been broken into fragments and strewn across multiple worlds. Can you find them all and save her?

name: La Bola Negra
summary:
On a ordinary night, Carlos receives an unexpected letter inviting him to the mysterious and exclusive Casino of Granada to acquire the coveted status of member.

Rumor has it that whoever becomes a member of the Casino will have access to unprecedented riches, incredible parties, and a privileged social position.

The four pages of Federico García Lorca's unfinished novel "La bola negra" inspire this visual thriller in which the player embodies the character of Carlos, a young man in 1930s Spain who must make crucial decisions and uncover the secrets hidden within the Casino.
Meet the eccentric characters who will accompany you on a tense night, unravel their tragic personal histories, and discover the different endings that your choices determine.

They are all hiding something… Will you be able to claim victory, or will you die trying?

name: Laura Bow and the Mechanical Codex
summary: LAURA BOW IS BACK, in an all new point-and-click adventure! Get ready for lots of wonderful nostalgia, in this third installment of the Laura Bow franchise, originally created by Sierra Online and designed by Roberta Williams & Bruce Balfour.

name: Lance A Lot
summary: Lance A Lot is a local party game that pits 4 friends against each other in GLORIOUS rocket-powered combat! Fly across the sky on a noble rocket steed and use your lance to send worthy adversaries plummeting towards the ground. In the end there can only be one knight left standing!

name: Larcin Lazer
summary: The best tool for a good theft? Your memory! Observe your surroundings and remember the location of the lasers, they disappear as soon as you move. Move with style to dodge the many obstacles spread across more than 100 levels. Prepare for a memorable heist!

name: Lara Croft and the Guardian of Light: Raziel and Kain Character Pack
summary: Grab a friend or go at it alone as Kain and Raziel from the Legacy of Kain games. The two iconic characters must work together to defeat a new threat in an unfamiliar world.

name: Lapistasia
summary: Lapistasia is a Block Puzzle Roguelike Deckbuilder. Create block and relic synergies to unleash massive damage. Manage the board to your advantage, and even break the rules of the puzzle. Defeat tough enemies to escape the Sealed Ruin.

name: Launcher Heroes
summary: Launcher Heroes is a tactical, artillery, party game where you try to knock your opponents off the world. Use an assortment of items such as bombs, rockets, and jetpacks to help you navigate and destroy the terrain.

name: L'Ange de Cristal
summary: Get Dexter 2.

name: Lady Umbrella
summary: Wield your high-tech umbrella to take down Italy’s last mafia family while evading capture by your own agency in this thrilling third-person action-adventure shooter.

name: Land of Anima: The Research of Artificer
summary: Isometric tower defense game where you can change the map routes to create your own strategy. Collect resources, craft towers, and upgrade your equipment to unravel the mysteries of the Land of Anima.

name: Land of Anima: The Research of Artificer
summary: Isometric tower defense game where you can change the map routes to create your own strategy. Collect resources, craft towers, and upgrade your equipment to unravel the mysteries of the Land of Anima.

name: Labyrinths of Umbra
summary: Deep beneath the mountains of Wildergrey, far to the north on the continent of Azmarin, a tangle of shadow attempts to ensnare one brave explorer.

name: Laraan
summary: Laraan is a Science-Fiction game about exploration in a desolate world. Created with a minimalist low poly style. Accompanied by a splendid movie soundtrack.

name: L.A. Noire: The Consul's Car
summary: The Consul’s Car is a Traffic case in L.A. Noire.

name: L.A. Noire: The Naked City
summary: "The Naked City" is a Vice case in L.A. Noire.

name: L.A Gridlock
summary: Tower Defence with Cars! Send Police to the roads of L.A. to chase down Motorized Gangs. Save the citizens!

name: Last Rites
summary:
Last Rites is a hand-drawn 2D fighting game set in a dark fantasy world overrun with monsters. You play as one of 3 characters — the Gravedigger; Reilia, the Vampire; and Reiner, the Knight — all with unique movesets and playstyles. The characters each have their own set of color palettes, as well as a home-field stage with 3D environments and a corresponding music track.

Play against friends at the computer or on the couch in Versus mode, go solo and battle your way through the Story and Arcade modes, or improve your skill and learn new combos in Training mode.

The game was made in 9 months by Media Design School Game Art Bachelor students.

name: La costurera
summary: You are a seamstress in a world where society is falling and you only try to help other people.

name: Lady Sword: Ryakudatsusareta 10-nin no Otome
summary:
An unlicensed eroge dungeon-crawler RPG developed by Games Express for the PC Engine in 1992.

Lady Sword is an RPG of the Wizardry/Eye of the Beholder/Etrian Odyssey mold. An unnamed swordsman delves deep into a cursed labyrinth in order to rescue a group of abducted women from their monstrous captors. Throughout the early stages, the player character randomly bumps into other NPCs who dole out advice and tips. Upon successfully clearing each floor, the player is presented with a nude image of the rescued women; this is the extent of the eroge element.

The game was developed by Games Express, a sobriquet for Hacker International: a company which primarily developed and published unlicensed games for the PCE and Famicom.

name: Landomayzer
summary: I have been chosen by the “Queen.” I must swiftly complete the tasks. The city we live in is ruled by the “Queen,” and her orders are absolute."Landomayzer" is a first-person adventure game.

name: Last Resort
summary: Dive into the mysterious world of the "Last Resort", a non-linear visual novel where past and future are woven together. His life’s breaking under the weight of life problems. Unable to fight any further, He decides to take his final journey. Will it change anything? Or will it lead Him to the end?

name: Last Drop
summary: Last Drop is a story you need to experience. Welcome to Nykylä Finland 1994. Seppo Sahtivaara and friends are waiting for you. This is an openworld action game with a story that has an impact. We bring back old good games and action from the best movies from that era. We want you to enjoy!

name: Lateral Thinking Together
summary: Crack the Mystery Together! "Lateral Thinking Together" is a cooperative and competitive online multiplayer game that challenges your knowledge and deductive reasoning to uncover the truth. Solve incomprehensible stories with creative thinking and flashes of insight!

name: Labyrinth Sword Princess
summary: An action game using a time mechanism. Actively slow down the flow of time. Within a short period of time, capture a momentary flaw, quickly approach the enemy, interrupt, avoid fatal attacks, and break the deadlock.

name: Layton's Mystery Journey: Katrielle and the Millionaires' Conspiracy - Deluxe Edition
summary:
Layton's Mystery Journey: Katrielle and the Millionaires’ Conspiracy revamped as Deluxe Edition with multiple improved features!

The game centers on Katrielle Layton, the daughter of famous archaeologist and puzzle-solver Professor Hershel Layton. With the help of her assistant Ernest Greeves, she solves cases in and around London, alongside a talking dog that, for reasons unknown, only the two of them can understand.

name: Lazaretto
summary: Lazaretto is a first-person survival horror video game set in the current day. You play the descendant of a man who once worked at an old and inactive facility, rumored to be located on a haunted quarantine island - a Lazaretto. Armed with only with a flashlight and nagging curiosity, your goal is to explore the environment, uncovering mysteries surrounding an artifact which has recently fallen into your possession.

name: La Llorona Wants Your Soul
summary: La Llorona wants your soul offers a unique horror experience based on real events that occurred in Mexico, follw the tormented soul of a woman who lost her children and every night roams the town in search of them and the one who took them. In this story, you control a group of 4 paranormal investigators seeking to solve the mystery and find La Llorona's children to free the pain of the restless soul.

name: Launch Party
summary: You and your teammates are armed only with a manual to instruct you in your task of launching rockets. Work together to enter codes, push buttons, flick switches and turn knobs in order to win.

name: Lamprey
summary:
Fang couldn't be happier about her new job at the prestigious tech startup Riverstone, Inc. When she starts on her new team, building a revolutionary workplace assistant AI called Lamprey, she jumps into her work head-first.

However, it's not long before things start going wrong, with a software bug causing Lamprey to trap the team in their office. Will Fang and her co-workers be able to escape a prison of their own making?

name: Lab LVL
summary: LAB LVL is a sci-fi horror adventure where you, as agent Flywheel, must rescue a girl from a frozen capsule using science in a laboratory while trying to survive on Earth-3's orbital station against relentless attacks from the "Ancients," who have hunted her for generations.

name: Last Card Dungeon
summary: Last Card Dungeon is a roguelike autobattler where your soul is trapped across a cursed deck. Explore a forsaken world. Collect powerful equipment. Tap and discard cards to battle enemies, survive events, and hunt the hooded figure who imprisoned your spirit...before your deck runs dry.

name: Ladies, Don't Tempt My Immortality
summary:
They say the path to immortality is paved with hardship. But in your case, this hardship happened to take the form of seven dangerously beautiful women.

You are Lin Fan, the chosen one of the Crane Illusion Sect. Born with a Pure Yang Lineage, you are destined to ascend to the heavens. However, no matter how hard you train, fate sends yet another challenge in your way...temptations in the shape of an unreliable master, a strict senior sister, or a saintess who seems far more interested in testing your heart rather than your skills.

Can you survive the thousand tribulations of love, jealousy, and thunder? Or will your heart fall just before your heavenly ascension?

name: Laika
summary: Laika is a third person perma-death runner game. A robot named Rico launched into the space. While Rico overcome various obstacles, his journey starts by encountering Laika's trace and ends by finding Laika!

name: Labyrinth of Shadows
summary: Dive into the Labyrinth of Shadows, a game that challenges your wits and bravery. Navigate dungeons filled with traps, enemies, and hidden treasures. Use unique artifacts to overcome obstacles and uncover secrets. With procedurally generated levels, each playthrough offers a new adventure.

name: Lawnmower Game: Survival
summary: Drive a lawnmower across 15 different levels. The player has 60 seconds to find a coin and finish each level.

name: Lara Croft and the Guardian of Light: Hazardous Reunion - Challenge Pack 3
summary: Four new challenge maps featuring mind-boggling puzzles, waves of intense combat action, and a fiery reunion with an old friend.

name: Last Alert
summary: Only a relentless commando assault can stop this international arms syndicate's threat to humanity. That's why we picked you. You'll need rocket launchers. hyper pineapples, and super napalm to blast through their high tech fortress... past tank brigades, bazookas, and then far into space. Confront the renegade military lunatic sworn to your destruction. Listen up for your orders, Commando. You'll be facing one suicide mission after another along the way. It'll make a great story... if you live to tell it!

name: Lara Croft and the Temple of Osiris: Gold Edition
summary: Lara Croft and the Temple of Osiris is the sequel to the critically-acclaimed Lara Croft and the Guardian of Light, and the first-ever four-player co-op experience with Lara Croft. Featuring stunning visuals and a brand-new story, players must work together to explore the temple, defeat hordes of enemies from the Egyptian underworld, solve devious puzzles, and avoid deadly traps. All the while, players will compete for treasure, powerful artifacts, and ultimate bragging rights. Lara Croft and the Temple of Osiris takes place deep in the deserts of Egypt. In her new adventure, Lara must join forces with rival treasure hunter Carter Bell and imprisoned gods Horus and Isis, to defeat the evil god Set. As Lara and her companions fight the elements of nature across the sands and through ancient tombs, they will battle legendary deities and creatures of myth. With the fate of the world at stake, Lara must recover the fragments of Osiris to stop Set from enslaving all mankind.

name: Lazarus A.D. 2222
summary: The final part of the Sons of Welder game series, set in a dystopian universe, which uniquely combines games from the Magnus series. A game that you can experience on two levels. Hand-drawn motion comics. A metaphorical journey into oneself. A mystical experience with a touch of good humor.

name: Lasers
summary: Lasers is a multiplayer game where you must survive deadly laser mazes until only one player remains standing.

name: Last Day Lockdown
summary: Bid farewell to the mundane and embrace the extraordinary as you step into "Last Day Lockdown," a thrilling office escape puzzle that transforms your farewell into an unforgettable journey!

name: Layers of Fear 2
summary: A remake of Layers of Fear 2 and its DLC. This remake in Unreal Engine 5 adds new core mechanics and features to blend the chapters together seamlessly.

name: Labyrinthum
summary: Labyrinthum is an exciting maze game that offers a unique gaming experience combining puzzles, riddles, and general knowledge challenges.

name: Laugh Track
summary: You're now the lead writer for Juno's World, a perfectly normal sitcom in which nothing strange or horrible happens, ever! Choose your scripts, decide what characters to build relationships with, and keep those audience ratings high -- or get cancelled in more ways than one! Welcome to Must See TV.

name: Last Laugh
summary: Last Laugh is a horror game that tells the story of the fate of 3 teenagers who often bully their classmates.

name: Lana: Queen of Ancient Egypt
summary: Dive into a world of mystery, face diverse foes and unleash the power of ancient gods in this action-puzzle adventure. Upgrade your abilities, solve intricate puzzles, uncover hidden secrets!

name: Lab Rat
summary: This satirical adventure stars a metrics-obsessed AI who will monitor, profile, and entertain you as you progress through over a hundred genre-bending puzzles.

name: Last Shift
summary: Mark Thompson accepts a late-night shift in a mysterious office, but what seemed like a routine night quickly turns into a nightmare.

name: Lawn Mowing Simulator: Ancient Britain
summary: Britain’s finest Ancient sites are in need of a trim! Discover 4 new locations: The Royal Stones, Druid Tor, The Ancient Aurochs and Aurochs Hill. Due to their heritage status, they come with very heavy fines for any damage so be sure to cut carefully!

name: Last Command: B-Side
summary:
A story about another side of the world of Last Command.
Explore with Honest, the prisoned girl, and redeem the unfortunate end!

name: Langrisser II
summary:
Langrisser II is a turn-based strategy game that was developed by Team Career, part of Masaya, and published by the parent company NCS Corporation.

This version of the game was released on the Nintendo Wii through the Virtual console and was later released for Windows though a classic games service.

Unlike the first Langrisser, known as Warsong internationally, almost all of the other games and remakes in the series have not been released outside of Japan.

name: Last Train Home
summary: The Great War is over - the fight continues. Command a legion of soldiers, desperately trying to make their way home amidst the chaos of civil war. Lead them through the unforgiving wilderness onboard an armored train. Manage your crew and resources and try to survive.

name: Lapidary: Jewel Craft Simulator
summary: "Lapidary: Jewel Craft Simulator" is a simple and minimalistic gem crafting simulator. In the quiet of your workshop, process various rough stones to create gems with the ultimate sparkle.

name: Layer Section & Galactic Attack: S-Tribute
summary: The vertical shooting game with gorgeous 2D animations and lock-on lasers is back with new features and online ranking!

name: Laby and the Mysterious Planet
summary: Laby and the Mysterious Planet can be played anytime and with anyone! A quiz game where up to 8 players can play together to win. On a mysterious planet where "piece of quiz" are floating, you and your robot buddy "Laby" will try to restore the liveliness of the planet through quizzes!

name: Last Hope Bunker: Zombie Survival
summary: Attention, brave survivor! The world has fallen victim to a devastating virus that threatens humanity's very existence. But amidst the chaos, a glimmer of hope remains. Join the gripping story of Last Hope Bunker and embark on a heart-pounding journey to save humanity from the clutches of the undead

name: Labyrinthine Dreams
summary:
Labyrinthine Dreams is a short puzzle game about Beth, a young woman who is standing at Death’s Door. After a traumatic childhood and a tough entry into the world of adulthood, she was just starting to take control of her life. However, she is now up against an insidious enemy who threatens to take everything away from her. During what may be her final hours, Beth wanders through important moments in her life while also staying a few steps ahead of the monster who won’t rest until she is no more.

Mazes in dreams are said to symbolize the dreamer’s feeling of “being trapped.” As Beth tries to find meaning and strength in her life, players must guide her through a variety of mazes, each with its own twist. The most challenging sections are reserved for confrontations with the monster, who must be outmaneuvered and outwitted to proceed.

name: Last Seen Online
summary: “last seen online” is a psychological horror escape room, based on early flash games. Look through someone's computer files. Solve puzzles and discover the secrets that lie within the computer.

name: Labyrinth of Touhou Tri: The Dreaming Girls & The Mysterious Orbs
summary:
A Fanmade Touhou Project DRPG With Not-So-Easy Boss Fights!
The girls of Gensokyo weave together a dungeon RPG with an estimated playtime of 30~50 hours. Pick a frontline of 4 and a rear of 8 to form a party of 12 characters out of a pool over 40+ and conquer extensive dungeons!

The girls of Gensokyo weave together a DRPG with not-so-easy boss fights! Form a party of 12 allies out of a pool of 40+, and create with 1000+ skills to choose from! Hack, slash, and grow stronger, then make builds (or counter-builds!) to take down powerful bosses awaiting you in the dungeons.

name: Lakehopper
summary: Take flight in a seaplane flight simulator through a rugged world where you are responsible for the care and maintenance of your plane. Deliver cargo between far-flung communities in a flooded landscape that challenges your piloting skills! Fix your plane and keep flying!

name: Last Patrol
summary: You are an Orderlord — a mutating meatball cop battling cultists in a surreal post-human dystopia. Evolve your form, investigate an intergalactic conspiracy, and prevent cosmic annihilation in this top-down horror shooter.

name: Labyban
summary:
Liuri wakes up, alone, deep inside a mine on an abandoned floating island. He doesn’t know how he got there or why. There’s only one thing to do: explore.

A tribute to the timeless Sokoban genre, LABYBAN modernizes the puzzle game experience with an accessible, intuitive, and stimulating approach. Across more than 140 levels, each puzzle pushes the gameplay mechanics even further.

Teleporters, slippery surfaces, conveyor belts... and many more surprises await!

The world of LABYBAN is made up of seven distinct biomes, each with a strong visual identity and unique gameplay mechanics. Some introduce new ways to play, while others combine and transform previous challenges, ensuring a smooth and varied progression.

Will you manage to escape the island?

name: Late Night Mop: Minimum Wage
summary: The demon returns in this unofficial sequel to Late Night Mop (a game by Lixian)!

name: LawnMower City
summary: You control a lawnmower and need to cut all the grass and plants in the city. You have to be beware not to crash into traffic or get shot.

name: La Fattoria (Farm Slot)
summary: The most famous slot machine is now available for free on your device.

name: Launch Dude
summary: What happens when unstoppable strength meets zero limits?

name: Lazy Chimps
summary:
Welcome to Lazy Chimps!
Dive into a wild world where you can garden your own paradise, explore the Lazy Chimps universe, go fishing & chill with friends, run from spooky monsters, play exciting minigames, master parkour challenges

Lazy Chimps is always growing with new adventures, seeds, gadgets, and minigames every Sunday!

name: Labyrinth of the Chaka King
summary: Take on the role of Tokiko the archaeologist as you make your way through the ancient Labyrinth of the Chaka King. 2D platforming fun for the whole family!

name: La Quimera
summary: La Quimera is a story-driven FPS set in dystopian future Latin America. In a fractured world where microstates rely on mercenary forces, you are an operative caught in a web of lies and deception. Play alone or with up to two friends geared with futuristic weapons, exoskeletons and combat abilities.

name: Last Hammashan: Awakening of a Hero
summary: To save the people of his village, He enters the Hammashan castle from which no one returns alive. But he sparks a war for the power of a civilization which the world believed has been annihilated.

name: Last Victim: House of Fear
summary: This is an indie horror game in which you have to face your fear and escape from house by solving puzzles and escaping from a ghost. Find out the story of a serial killer...

name: Late Metro Drive
summary: You just ended your night shift, now you need to get home by the metro...

name: La Salamanca
summary: "La Salamanca" is an inmersive first-person psychological horror experience, a story-driven game where you traverse different sections, solve puzzles, and survive the horrors lurking in the shadows of a twisted apartment complex. Inspired by an Argentine local urban legend.

name: Lamborghini: American Challenge
summary: Lamborghini: American Challenge is a racing game where players start with a basic Lamborghini and $6000, competing across 60 tracks in the United States to advance through four racing divisions. Players race against championship rivals and local drivers while avoiding police who pursue speeders exceeding 110 km/h, attempting to ram offenders off the road. The game features a betting system where players wager on race outcomes against other championship drivers, and progression requires completing Divisional Challenge time trials. Players can purchase upgrades including tires, radar jammers, engine improvements, and nitro boosts using race earnings, with each race requiring an entry fee and offering monetary rewards based on performance and successful bets.

name: Last Nova
summary: Last Nova is a ruthless extraction-based PvPvE action game. 10–20 players dive into resource-depleted, hazardous zones where only melee, cold weapons are allowed. Fight, strategize, and survive. Only those who reach the final extraction point with what they’ve claimed make it out alive.

name: Last Moon
summary: The Moon is falling, malicious creatures appear, the world falls in chaos! Last Moon is an Action-RPG greatly inspired by the mythical titles from the 90s! Explore a mesmerizing, vast and ruined world riddled with dangers, face tainted creatures and upgrade your abilities in a classic hand-drawn 2D style.

name: Last Year
summary: Team up with four other Classmates to survive against a sixth player controlling a dreadful, horrifying Fiend, in this evolution of multiplayer horror games inspired by classic horror stories.

name: Labyris
summary: Labyris is a surreal first-person psychological horror and puzzle game set in an underground labyrinth. Players descend into multiple layers of crypts and caves, where they must survive demonic enemies, solve ritual-based puzzles, and uncover the dark origins of Jarduun — a demon born of forbidden sorcery. The game features both single-player and online co-op modes, an immersive inventory system, and atmospheric environments built with Unreal Engine 5.

name: Last Half of Darkness: Tomb of Zojir
summary:
The darkness has descended upon Louisiana, where the treasures from the gypsy's lair are still hidden, when a mysterious book is found in the tiny town of Shadowcrest. Perhaps a book that should never have been opened. A book with pages that chart the passage to the Isle of the Dead... 
 
Shrouded among fog and lore, legends of the Island speak of the strange ghosts that live there and the creatures of the dead hiding in the shadows; feeding on sailors foolish enough to beach upon the dark shores. Although stories of great treasure surround the island, it is also rumored that the isle holds the origin for a great darkness inside an ancient temple built centuries ago. 
 
Use your experience in the dark arts and science to uncover the true origin of the last half of darkness

name: Last Wood
summary: In Last Wood, it is an oceanic world after The Apocalypse. You will guide several survivors in the ocean from pieces of rafts, survive, build rafts, defense the threats, explore the unknown world, even have their offsprings, and find the truth of the world.

name: Last Antagonist
summary: Last Antagonist is an intense first-person action and strategy game, entirely developed by a single creator.

name: Lazaret
summary: Lazaret is an atmospheric first-person horror game. You play as a member of a rescue team called out to investigate a distress signal coming from a ship that disappeared 4 years ago.

name: Layers of Fear: The Final Masterpiece Edition
summary: The psychological horror that shaped an entire genre returns - rebuilt from the ground up in Unreal Engine 5.

name: L.A. Noire
summary: L.A. Noire for PlayStation 4 and Xbox One delivers the complete original game and all additional downloadable content with a range of technical enhancements for greater visual fidelity and authenticity, including enhanced lighting and clouds, new cinematic camera angles, high resolution textures and more. L.A. Noire plays natively in 1080p for the PlayStation 4 and Xbox One consoles, and stunning 4K for PlayStation 4 Pro and Xbox One X, capturing the grit and grime of the City of Angels like never before.

name: Lac Viet Journey
summary: Explore Vietnam’s rich flavors and culture as you soar with a little Lạc bird, typing dish names, unlocking upgrades, and journeying across the country.

name: LawBreakers
summary: Beat gravity into submission in LawBreakers, an exhilarating new first-person shooter where even the laws of physics can be shattered, creating unprecedented gravity-based combat across a bloody rebuilt American landscape.

name: Laptop Tycoon
summary: Welcome to Laptop Tycoon! Compete with the tech giants! You will have the opportunity to show your skills in business management. Start your own laptop company! Choose and hire the best people for your company, buy and upgrade your own office and start building your dream laptop.

name: Lazarus: Side Story of Comrade Force
summary: "LAZARUS" is a BOUKEN action RPG where you freely explore the world while mowing down countless monsters. Strengthen your character with skills and equipment, and aim to defeat the demon king Lazarus! Various dungeons, summoned beasts with mysterious powers, and relics await players in the world.

name: Lanesplit
summary: Push performance bikes to the absolute limit, and weave through traffic where one wrong move can spell disaster.

name: L.A. Noire
summary:
L.A. Noire is a neo-noir detective action-adventure video game developed by Team Bondi and published by Rockstar Games. It was initially released for the PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360 platforms on 17 May 2011; a Microsoft Windows port was later released on 8 November 2011.

L.A. Noire is set in Los Angeles in 1947 and challenges the player, controlling a Los Angeles Police Department (LAPD) officer, to solve a range of cases across five divisions. Players must investigate crime scenes for clues, follow up leads, and interrogate suspects, and the player's success at these activities will impact how much of each case's story is revealed.

The game draws heavily from both the plot and aesthetic elements of film noir—stylistic films made popular in the 1940s and 1950s that share similar visual styles and themes, including crime and moral ambiguity—along with drawing inspiration from real-life crimes for its in-game cases, based upon what was reported by the Los Angeles media in 1947.

The game uses a distinctive colour palette, but in homage to film noir it includes the option to play the game in black and white. Various plot elements reference the major themes of detective and mobster stories such as The Naked City, Chinatown, The Untouchables, The Black Dahlia, and L.A. Confidential.

name: Laser Tag Massacre
summary: Halloween night turns deadly when five friends decide to throw a party in an abandoned arcade deep in rural Campinas, Brazil. What was meant to be just a game turns into their worst nightmare, proving that sometimes, play time can be deadly.

name: Last Tide
summary: Last Tide is a battle royale shooter sending 100 divers to the depths of the ocean! Avoid bloodthirsty sharks, locate equipment, and do whatever it takes to be the last diver swimming!

name: Lastfight
summary: LASTFIGHT is bringing 2v2 3D fighting back to your living room! Pick up any available object in one of the 8 stages and teach your opponents a lesson! Play in local multiplayer mode, for up to 4 players, or one-player story mode, with a cast of 10 characters inspired by the comic book LASTMAN.

name: Land of Futures
summary: Build and defend your dream village using structures specific to the elf orc and human races. Chat with NPCs containing artificial intelligence language models as if you were talking to someone from daily life.

name: Lavrynthos
summary: Lavrynthos is an independently created VR short, a funny and philosophic story that places you at the heart of the labyrinth of Crete to tell you the story of the unlikely relationship between the Minotaur and his next meal: a girl named Cora.

name: Latest Jump Cube Game
summary: Play this challenging latest jump game and test your skills. Compete with your friends to reach the highest level of the latest jumping cube, while experiencing the joy of playing this enthralling game. The cross moving characters will grab your attention and will challenge you to go further.

name: Laser Paddles
summary: Laser Paddles is a pong game where you can destroy your opponents' paddle or see your own paddle destroyed. Lasers fly, power ups are activated, balls go crazy.

name: Lastone: Behind the Choice
summary: A point & click visual novel puzzle game where players fight against other characters in a game. Discover and progress stories of playable characters from varied backgrounds by winning, and decide their fate after knowing their stories.

name: Laureli: Blood-Dipped Manor
summary:
From the team that brought you Oto-hime...

After an accident that left her using a wheelchair, detective Laura Le Fanu relocates to her uncle’s castle-like estate in rural Rhode Island. There she meets his maids and the mysterious butler Eli, who quickly forms a bond with her. When a maid is found dead and a storm traps them inside, Laura must unravel the truth—unaware that a vampire walks among them.

name: Labyrinth Hotel
summary: Labyrinth Hotel is an immersive, first-person, action-adventure game where the player wakes up locked in a jail cell and must escape, but the only way out is through the Hotel. Contains 20 unique levels, 4 bosses, many unique characters, a cool crt effect, and many secret levels.

name: Last Cloudia
summary: Last Claudia is a mobile RPG game that features real-time battle. The game has a plot that depicts human collaborating with monsters to save the world together. There is a huge variety of units and they could be trained very freely.

name: La Forêt de Pago: La vengeance du Dragon
summary: A new way to learn spelling with Flora and her magical world The first of its kind, La forêt de Pago is an educational game: you can improve your grammatical spelling by discovering a heroic fantasy tale.

name: Last Stance: A JuVentures Game
summary: Fight your way through endless waves of enemies in this fast paced 3-button punch game.

name: Lapin
summary: Lapin is a precision 2D platformer game about abandoned rabbits in the park. Help rabbit 'Liebe' to search for a new home for rabbits through a expedition out of the burrow. Expedition involves a lot of dangerous things, so you need elaborate control. Enjoy five rabbit’s brilliant episodes in Lapin!

name: Last Soul
summary: "Last Soul" is a 2d pixel art action platformer with a compelling story about a future where mankind has lost its will. Explore and fight your way through a variety of levels, and take on awesome boss enemies.

name: Last Shape Standing
summary: Last Shape Standing is at its core a survival game where each player needs to survive through a multitude of chaotic and fun randomly selected challenges, be it bullet hell, PVP, a zombie apocalypse or even dangerous quizzes!

name: Labyrinth of the Demon King
summary: Venture through the Labyrinth Of The Demon King, solving puzzles and fighting fearsome monsters in an epic quest to track down the demon who betrayed your lord and end it’s life.

name: Laser Cup
summary:
​Have you ever wondered what it would be like to play air hockey with bumper cars? Then Laser Cup is the ideal game for you!

Select one of 8 teams from all over the solar system to compete in high-paced, physics-based matches against your best friends. But be warned: They might not be your best friends once the match is over. There's no need to worry though because even when you inevitably run out of friends you will still be able to compete in public matches or against AI enemies. Use crazy powerups, like magnets and shockwaves, to get an edge over your opponents.

The game looks and sounds like it's ripped straight from an 80s arcade with its vectorized, neon graphics and its early-techno soundtrack. But don't be fooled, the game is action-packed to the brim combining the best elements of the last 5 decades of sports video games.​

name: Labyrinth DeLux: A Crusoe Quest
summary: Solve 16 mind bending puzzles by guiding a laser beam through a maze of mirrors and prisms. Walk on walls and ceilings through a unique magnetic shoe locomotion. Enjoy a funny frame story between a female space trucker and her overly correct AI companion.

name: Laserlife
summary:
Remember what it means to be a human in this interactive biography of a dead astronaut found in deep space by future intelligences who have no concept of humankind.

With technology far beyond human comprehension, the discoverers of the astronaut use lasers to build physical replicas of the astronaut’s long-dead memories in hopes to understand what this strange creature was and why they are floating through space alone.

By controlling dual lasers with both analog sticks, players will:
-Collect Memory molecules scattered around the mysterious space ship
-Harmonize the Astronaut’s memories within the Astronaut’s metaphysical plane
-Warp back to reality through the Astronaut’s subconscious, avoiding mental blocks
-Energize the dead Astronaut so it can create physical manifestations of its memories
Laserlife is meant to be played in one sitting, so turn down the lights, turn up the volume, and get lost in this existential adventure about what it means to be a human.

*Laserlife requires either an Intel RealSense Camera or a controller in order to play*

name: Lawn Care Simulator
summary: Take Back the Yard in Lawn Care Simulator! Grab your mower and bring unruly lawns under control. From overgrown backyards to massive estates, cut through the chaos one blade at a time. Satisfyingly slice, edge, and clean your way to perfectly manicured greens — all in a day's mow.

name: Last Knight: Rogue Rider Edition
summary: Countless enemies had been shot, hacked and slashed in the history of games. Now it is time to ram a wooden lance in some gut, send your foes flying, and watch them bite the dust! Body parts ripping off, ragdoll horse physics, and destructive environments included.

name: Later Daters
summary: Later Daters hilarious and sentimental dating sim featuring a cast of sexy seniors for you to befriend and date as the newest resident of the Ye OLDE retirement community. It's a bit overwhelming with all the changes, but who knows - maybe these will turn out to be the best years of your life.

name: Late Night Shift
summary: Late Night Shift is a first-person horror game where you step into the shoes of a gas station employee working an overnight shift deep in the woods. What starts as another dull night quickly turns into something far more sinister.

name: Lazy Galaxy
summary: Lazy Galaxy is a mix between RTS and idle/clicker game. Lead an evil (albeit lazy) alien race to conquer the universe!

name: Ladies I'm Ready
summary: The player becomes Samuel, uses the first-person perspective to immerse himself in meeting two beauties, and embarks on a joyful and sweet love journey with them. Two girls with different personalities, and it is up to you to decide who will go to the end with you.

name: Lake
summary: It's 1986 - Meredith Weiss takes a break from her career in the big city to deliver mail in her hometown. How will she experience two weeks in beautiful Providence Oaks, with its iconic lake and quirky community? And what will she do next? It's up to you.

name: Last Bloody Snack
summary: Last Bloody Snack tells the story of a boy named Cody, who suffers from severe psychological disorders and has visions of a monster that will try to eliminate everything he hates. The game explores a strong theme, focusing on maternal responsibility.

name: Last Battalion Defense
summary: Command your arsenal! Defend the realm. Your battalion is humanity's last hope.

name: Lake Resort Flipper
summary: Buy, renew and start earning! Lake Resort Flipper gives you a unique chance of becoming a lake resort owner. Buy an abandoned resort that used to be full of tourists. Renew it, invest in new attractions and start your own business!

name: Late Night Confessional
summary:
Late Night Confessional is a multi protagonist photography-minigame-visual novel about a long time coming break-up and the fast approaching end of the world.

God appeared dead in the sky and the pieces wont stop falling down to Earth. Everyone pretends they don't see it coming. The world moves on as normal. Mary Baker still has to work her low wage fast food job. Her biggest problem right now? She wants to break up with her girlfriend.

name: Late Night Drive
summary: Explore various maps with your friends or play solo and relax. Whether you prefer a relaxing drive or a fast-paced, action-packed race, the choice is yours. Get ready to unforgettable journey through the city streets under the moonlit sky!

name: Lavender Field
summary: An atmospheric visual novel with puzzle elements and a nonlinear storyline.

name: Lar
summary: Lar is a horror-themed puzzle game currently being developed by one person using Unreal Engine 5.

name: Last Threshold
summary: Dive into the world based on the Lovecraft universe and its successors. In immersive visual novel discover the secret of the temple and learn the truth about your companions and your father’s past!

name: La Abadía del Crimen
summary:
La abadía del crimen (The Abbey of Crime) is a computer video game programmed in 1987 by Paco Menéndez and Juan Delcán. The game was originally conceived as a version of Umberto Eco's book The Name of the Rose. However, the developers received no reply from Eco in order to secure the rights for the name, so the game was released as La abadía del crimen.

This game is a videoadventure with 3D isometric graphics, where a Franciscan friar, William of Occam, and his young novice Adso have to discover the perpetrator of a series of murders in a medieval Italian abbey.

name: Land of the Druids
summary: Play as a powerful druid at the beginning of creation and bring life to the world. Grow meadows and forests, and summon mighty stones to create a wild new land. Learn new magical talents and recipes, and draw power from your creations in your quest to master the universe.

name: Last Remains
summary: Last Remains is a 50-player zombie battle royale game where survivors compete in a PvPvE world and take risks on their journey to the extraction point by searching buildings to find food, water, and digital collectible skins such as equipment and weapons.

name: Labyrinth of the Demon King
summary: Labyrinth of the Demon King is a challenging first-person dungeon crawler, set against the backdrop of a mythical feudal Japan besieged by demons. As a lone foot soldier, embark on a quest to track down and slay the Demon King who killed your Lord. But will you have the skill, resources and stamina needed to survive through all the horrors this brutal world will throw at you?

name: Last Will
summary: Last Will is a digital Escape Room experience, where the players need to infiltrate a grand old mansion, where it's deceased owner has filled it with cryptic riddles and weird puzzles, to keep away intruders. They need to work together, to solve the puzzles in time.

name: Last Command
summary: Last Command is a fast-paced Snake x Bullet Hell action game. Maneuver through enemies’ barrage of attacks, collect Data Points to deal damage! Mix and match skill chips as you progress, overcome intense Boss battles, and uncover the secrets of their program world...

name: Landlord Simulator
summary: Landlord Simulator lets you take the role of a man deciding to accept the challenge of owning homes. The city in which he decides to start this journey is New Blossom where time is almost frozen due to the fact everyone moved. Help bring it back to what it used to be through buying, fixing, and renting homes.

name: Landmine Princess
summary: Landmine Princess is the sophomoric release for Jeistar that is a spin on the dating simulator genre. It takes the "fast-love" rogue template and interpolates it with the explosive personality of Mina, a "Landmine" girl whose personality is explored deeply. Stats passive aggressively update based on your decisions with important random questions Mina throws at you.

name: Labyrinths of the World: Forbidden Muse - Collector's Edition
summary: Can you help the City of Artists find their lost inspiration?

name: Lawnmower Maniac
summary: There’s a maniac with a lawnmower outside… and the grass isn’t his only target.

name: Lair of the Clockwork God
summary: A fast-paced Point-and-Click adventure for the modern era! Join adventurer Ben and wannabe indie darling platformer Dan in a race against time to prevent all the Apocalypses happening at the same time.

name: Lavatro
summary: It is a Roguelite about doing laundry. Lavatro is a cloth-builder where you wash clothes to score as many points as possible. Use synergies, fold, dye, and purchase new clothes to create the best laundry combinations

name: Last Shift Standing
summary: A fast, tactical roguelite: missions explode across the city with ticking timers. Assign heroes, build wild power combos, manage injuries, and keep the city alive through the whole shift.

name: Lamentum
summary:
Lamentum is a pixel art survival-horror game set in New England in the mid-nineteenth century. To solve the dark secret at the heart of Grau Hill Mansion, you will have to immerse yourself in a nightmare world full of terrible creatures.

Choose well in whom to trust, every decision you make may alter the course of the story.

Will you survive?

name: Last Labyrinth: Lucidity Lost
summary: An escape adventure game in which you work with "Katia," a girl who speaks a mysterious language, to escape from a hall where death traps are set.

name: Laser Sounds
summary: You are a mercenary hired by the Space Company to inspect the space station, which has not been heard from for years, because of the news you have received that some experiments are being carried out. Your goal is to clear everyone from this space station.

name: Last Memory
summary: The soul, leaving its body, passes through the last memories in order to find peace.

name: Last Train Home: Legion Tales
summary: Experience new, exhilarating stories from the Czechoslovak Legion on their odyssey home. Join Zoltan, a seasoned veteran and master storyteller, as he fondly recalls tales of courage and brotherhood from those who fought on the frontline.

name: La Neige
summary: This is a naughty adventure game starring the most popular characters of Higurashi no naku koro ni.

name: Lands of Mine
summary: Mine resources, craft tools, and battle fierce underground enemies as you explore, trade, and build your way back to the stars. Level up, upgrade your gear, and automate your processes for ultimate efficiency. Play solo or team up with a friend in this 1-2 player mining and combat adventure.

name: Last Night Shift
summary: Last Night Shift is a first-person horror game that creates a spooky atmosphere and tension. An ordinary night shift at a motel turns into a living nightmare.

name: Layton's Mystery Journey: Katrielle and the Millionaire's Conspiracy
summary:
Join Katrielle Layton, our new hero, as she becomes embroiled in a casual, quizzical quest, which has its roots in our hero’s search for her missing father, Professor Hershel Layton. You'll be whisked around London's famous landmarks, from the Houses of Parliament to Tower Bridge, following Kat, solving case after unlikely case, until she unwittingly uncovers the Millionaires' Conspiracy.
