The story begins with Katrielle setting up the Layton Detective Agency, determined to prove her worth and hoping the exposure will uncover clues about the missing professor's whereabouts. Help Kat discover clues, solve mysteries and original puzzles! Fashion-conscious players can also redecorate the agency and dress Katrielle in various outfits to suit the case at hand. With the most puzzles ever included in a Layton game, a colorful new cast, and an intriguing storyline that includes seven millionaires and one whopper of a conspiracy, will she ever be able to find her missing father?

name: Late Shift
summary: Late Shift is a high stakes FMV crime thriller. After being forced into the robbery of a lucrative auction house, mathematics student Matt is left proving his innocence in the brutal London heist. Your choices will have consequences from the very start, right through to the very end. One small decision could change the entire outcome in a choose-your-own-adventure style gameplay that can lead to one of seven conclusions.

name: Lakeview Cabin Collection
summary:
Delve into the diverse world of horror movies in this 2D action puzzler.
Nothing can prepare you for the R-rated challenges you will face!

name: La-Mulana
summary:
La-Mulana is the “Ruins Exploration Archaeological action game” in which the player seek the “Anthropo-origin”, sleeps in the Huge Ruin La-Mulana, which is said the beginning of whole the civilizations.
Various types of traps for blocking infiltrators are awaiting inside the ruins, and sentinel-monsters are roaming about. Target the deepest point of the ruins by figuring out riddles, putting off the monsters and deactivating the traps. The way to the goal will be extraordinary, more complex riddles will be waiting for you as you come deeper point.
Handle Professor Lemeza to find out the Anthropo-origin!

name: Laser League
summary:
"Blink and you are dead! LASER LEAGUE is the new last-word in high-speed, future-sports team action. Battle against the opposition for control of nodes that bathe the arena in deadly light. Evade rival coloured beams, and fry your opponents with speed, strength and strategy."

"In 2150 the most popular global sport is Laser League. Teams of players battle against the opposition for control of nodes that bathe the arena in deadly light. Evading rival colored beams, teams attempt to fry their opponents with speed, strength and strategy. Utilize special offensive and defensive abilities, as well as game-changing power-ups on the arena floor, to provide an edge at the crucial moment."

name: Last Term
summary: Last Term is a spot the difference anomaly game. You’ve been trapped in a school by a mysterious God. Memorize your surroundings, spot the anomalies, and reach floor 0 to earn your escape.

name: Lara Croft and the Temple of Osiris: Deus Ex Pack
summary: The Deus Ex Pack features Adam Jensen themed skins, including Adam Jensen's signature combat rifle and the Deus Ex ring that allows your player to open treasure chests for 10% less gems.

name: Lara Croft and the Temple of Osiris: Twisted Gears Pack
summary: The Twisted Gears pack adds a brand new tomb for Lara and her companions to explore and also includes the Original 1996 Lara Skin which will take fans on a nostalgic trip back to her first adventures as well as exclusive rings, amulets, and the Cluster Bomb Launcher.

name: Lamplight City
summary: "A steampunk-ish detective adventure from the creator of A Golden Wake and Shardlight! Can private investigator Miles Fordham find justice for his clients and track down his partner's killer before his entire world comes apart?"

name: Larva Mortus
summary: Larva Mortus is a fast-paced action horror game that has you hunting monsters of the supernatural in a dark and ominous atmosphere full of undead, terrifying and demonic nightmares. A horrific atmosphere goes hand in hand with furious action packed splatter fest. Everything accompanied by creepy, first class soundtrack!

name: La-Mulana 2
summary: In La-Mulana 2, you will take on the role of Lumisa Kosugi on a mission to find the entrance to the ruins of Eg-Lana, which is rumored to be the source of recent monster appearances. The ruins themselves are compromised of a variety of areas as well as huge boss creatures known as Guardians. Who knows what lies in wait at the end of Eg-Lana?

name: Lab Crisis
summary: Lab Crisis is a turn-based puzzle about a robot who's rescuing scientists from a mutant-infested lab! The more scientists you grab at once, the longer is the chain, so be careful!

name: LAZ3RZ
summary:
Fast paced dystopian, action packed, mobility focused, competetive first person shooter.

Sail with us through space in the world of LAZ3RZ! You can currently choose one of 8 available characters and meet friends & people around the world
in the social area or battle your enemies in one of the arenas.

name: Last November
summary: an erasable twine zine about some stuff that felt like the apocalypse but no i guess global warming's still gonna get me

name: Layers of Fear: Inheritance
summary: Layers of Fear: Inheritance expands the plot from Layers of Fear and tells the story of the painter’s daughter, who comes back to her childhood home to face her past. Lead the daughter through what’s left of the mansion and take part in the madness that her father bestowed upon the whole family. Can she forgive her father, or will she resent all that has happened?

name: Langrisser I & II
summary:
This is a remake of two games: Langrisser (known as Warsong in USA) and its sequel, Langrisser II – or, better to say, the enhanced version of this sequel, known as Der Langrisser.

The remake features the Ultima-style character creation (you choose between various answers to morally provoking questions) introduced in Der Langrisser, and also offers branching storyline (you can be good or side with the evil forces, if you wish).

name: Last Sinner
summary: Last Sinner is a Top Down Shooter with elements of a Royal Battle.

name: Last Rites
summary: 3D bullet-hell boss battle!

name: Labyrinths of the World: Stonehenge Legend
Last Stitch Goodnight
summary: Last Stitch Goodnight is a side scrolling action adventure that embraces a new mythology. After a near-death experience, you are kidnapped by a doctor who is experimenting on people who satisfy certain criteria. Escape will require new weapons, powers, and a strong stomach for bad science.

name: Last Car Standing
summary: Car Destruction Game

name: Laserbreak
summary: A puzzle game from errorsevendev and Apex Creative

name: Land of Mushrooms: Sweet Classic Mushrooms - Skin Set
Labyrinths of the World: Eternal Winter
summary: The lights are the warning...

name: Lab Escape!
summary:
Welcome little specimen!
You're the unstable... thingy captured by scientist.
Consume meats, select random Mutations, and Devour all bad guys in your sight!

name: La Caza del Espía
summary: find evidence against Gustav Monch, allegedly a German Spy

name: Ladder Slasher
summary: Web-based hack and slash clicking game.

name: Lazy Caverns
summary: Multiplatform platforming game

name: Laboratory Rat Escape Simulator Pro
summary: Free your ratty friends and escape the laboratory!

name: Laika
summary: First dog in orbit. A tinyQBN demo.

name: Landscapes
summary: 16 original jigsaw puzzles by oil painter Gwen Guidici. This app is perfect for all ages and anyone who loves doing jigsaws. Users can adjust the number of pieces or switch puzzles with large, easy controls. The playing surface resembles a nicely finished dining room table. Best of all, you can't lose any pieces!

name: Last Ruler of Vicissity
summary: Last Ruler of Vicissity is a single player deck building game. Continue to build your deck as you battle increasingly difficult bosses. Money, weapons, and medicinal plants help you thrive. Recruit mutated, wandering souls along the way. Send your minions to crush your foes and be the last standing.

name: Las Vegas
summary: In this 1981 handheld LCD game from Bandai Electronics you must collect enough coins at a casino so you can try your luck at playing the big jackpot machine.

name: Laura
summary: Laura is an adventure game where players control a girl named Laura. She explores her Victorian-style home and town, completing missions and mini-games to help people and bring happiness, aiming to restore the sparkle of a magical diamond. Designed for a younger audience, it focuses on gentle exploration and problem-solving.

name: L: A Mathemagical Adventure
summary: This classic text adventure game (with graphics) was "designed to use and stimulate your mathematical imagination".

name: Langrisser IV & V: Final Edition
summary: This is a PlayStation release of two Saturn games bundled together: Langrisser IV and Langrisser V: The End of Legend. Both games form a separate sub-story within this strategy RPG series.

name: Lab.Ar
summary: Narrative sci-fi horror quest. Travel to the mysterious research center as a Dr. Robert O`Neil on his mission to reveal old secrets of Howard Deus, the renowned researcher of cancer who died by mystical circumstances.

name: Labyrinths of the World: Shattered Soul
summary: Travel through the worlds and save Margaret!

name: Last Defenders
summary: The corruption must be purged! What do you get if you combine an cards, tanks & ... monastic order? LAST DEFENDERS.

name: LaTale W
summary: LaTale W

name: Lamina Island
summary: The legendary hero trainer Evolym has taken on a new pupil. Being cursed as a slime, she will need your assistance. It is up to you to take the promising mage Neemu from zero to hero.

name: Lamento: Beyond the Void - Treasure Disc
summary:
Fandisk for 'Lamento: Beyond the Void'.

The characters of Lamento: Beyond the Void gather for a celebration in the largest town for the Winter Festival. What happens on one night in particular in Bardo's inn is unexpected when a sly slip was done.

name: Lazlet
summary: A puzzle game from Dolores Dolls.

name: Lashek
summary: Make up your mind to enter the Lashek family home and solve its mystery!

name: Lapin Malin : J'apprends à lire et à ecrire
Laruaville 6
summary: Use your Match 3 skills for seeking hidden treasures on an uninhabited island!

name: Last Summer
summary: Last Summer is a single-player third-person adventure set in the Lost Alpine Mountains, where you will go through the challenges of a young adult, turning into their own person. Climb, Explore and rediscovery what has been lost in the Lost Alpine.

name: Lawnmower Game 3: Horror
summary: Third part of Lawnmower game series. Sequel to succesfull lawnmower game series. Cut grass and avoid dangerous animals.

name: La Voz
summary: A video game adaptation of the Spanish version of The Voice.

name: Launched!
summary: Launched! is a small scale RTS about building and launching an arsenal of missiles at the other island in the distance.

name: Laxius Force
summary: Laxius Force is a PC RPG game from Aldorlea Games.

name: Laser Nodes
summary: Line up all the lasers through the nodes to beat the level. Bounce lasers off mirrors with infinity reflections later on in this brain-teasing game that is very hard! This is a brand new remake of my older Flash game known as Nodes. Now with shiny lasers!

name: Labyrinth 2
summary: A relaxing labyrinth game.

name: Last Battleground: Survival
summary: Battle royale

name: Lataman
summary: Lataman the punk that fights the punks because they ruined the punk.

name: Laser Cat Craft
summary:
Do you love cats?
So help these kittens in their amazing adventure in the wild, crossing bridges, facing laser cat craft monsters!
Don't forget to collect coins to unlock new craft cats!
If you love pets and animals you will enjoy this game.
Play the game now and have fun!

name: La La Land 3
summary:
La La Land is the third game in the La La Land series, a pentalogy of short experimental videogames by Matt Aldridge (a.k.a. theanemic) which share a recurring cast, subliminal and fable-like storytelling, and a haunting atmosphere.

In the third instalment, Biggt, sick of only eating oranges every day, leaves his house to search for something else to eat.

name: LazyTown
summary: In 2009, a game based on the TV show LazyTown was in development by Redoubt for the Nintendo Wii and DS. No details about the project were ever publicly revealed and the game was silently cancelled.

name: LazyTown: Ziggy's Challenge
summary: Compete in a race to the LazyTown park.

name: Laruaville Match 3 Puzzle
summary: That's the first game in the Laruaville series! It has some new interesting Match 3 mechanics you won't see in other games, plus Mahjong ( try it! This mahjong is totally different from regular mahjongs! ) and some Spot The Difference scenes. Plus building the town.

name: LaserZone
summary: LaserZone is a puzzle game with action elements and a storyline. Play as Handel, avoid traps, fight enemies, and escape. Upgrade your tools to overcome escalating danger. Recover his lost memory and reclaim something invaluable, even more than his life.

name: Last Rose
summary: A weird plague sweeps the land, in the form of an endless rose garden. Two lost souls were chained together to fix everything. I hope they don't mess it up again.

name: Labyrinth Eternal
summary: Using your ability to teleport, find your way through the winding corridors of the Labyrinth Eternal.

name: Lacura
summary: MENTAL TRAINER

name: Last Hours of Jack
summary: Last Hours Of Jack is an adventure game full of gory action and comedy. Take control of Jack, the most sociopath and nerdy IT guy who works for a tech company, who will unexpectedly become the ultimate action hero in order to save the office (and the world?) from a zombie apocalypse!

name: Last Cat
summary: A cozy puzzle game. Lead the cat through various mazes with different difficulties.

name: Last Hope Z - VR
summary: Developed exclusively for virtual reality the game "Last Hope Z" gives you an incredible drive of races and shooters at the same time. Spin the wheel, shoot sharp, discover new guns, change and upgrade cars, and save your four-footed friend! You will have to face an intricate and extremely realistic challenge...

name: Lambda-Strike
summary: This mod was originally just a reskin of Doom, but now is a full port of all the arsenal of counter-strike 1.6 with some extra.

name: Lapis Vitae
summary: Point and Click with very dark humor in a beautiful dark dungeon. LD49

name: Labyrinth of Light
summary: Labyrinth of Light is a first-person puzzle game with platforming elements. The player can walk on any illuminated wall. Through a giant concrete maze in the Brutalist style, the player saves a withering tree.

name: Last Day of Summer
summary: It's the last day of summer, and you're old enough now to go into town by yourself.

name: Lance A Lot: Enhanced Edition
summary: Challenge up to four your friends to a glorious duel of rocket jousting! Settle rivalries and become the last knight standing in this fast paced local multiplayer!

name: Late Stage
summary: Late Stage is a stealth action game where you play as a mercenary, completing missions for megacorporations

name: Last God's Bidding
summary: Assume the role of a divine guardian in Last God's Bidding entrusted by a powerful god to restore balance to the planets. Make the right decisions in this turn-based resource management strategy game to recultivate planets.

name: Lady Phantom
summary: A turn based strategy mech combat game for the PC-Engine Super CD format. Developed by Telenet and published in Japan in 1991.

name: Lazer Rush Reloaded
summary: Shoot, Climb, Slash, Dash, Jump, Slide, and Ride the most intense rollercoaster of a movement shooter-platformer you've ever played. Experience challenging chaotic combat and high stakes platforming at the same time. Fight at top speed in Lazer Rush.

name: Lam Lam
summary: One night, "I" noticed that the neighbor was making some noise as usual. Just at this moment, I heard the cry of a girl from Room F. "I" used my superpowers to see what was going on next door. What awaits the "me" will be a heinous and heartbreaking scene.

name: Lacrosse Arcade 2014
summary:
Dodge, pass, shoot, and defend like never before on your mobile device. Lacrosse Arcade 2014 is a simulation lacrosse video game featuring five lacrosse game modes, and intense lacrosse action! Download Lacrosse Arcade 2014 today!

1) 1v0 - Shooting on a goalie
2) Offense Transition - Work through 2v1, 3v2, 4v3, 5v4 situations
3) Fours - 4v4 mini game
4) Horde - Weave through over 10 players!
5) Practice - Want to work on fast breaks? No goalie? Play defense?

name: Lavender Woods
summary: Help Monnet get through the woods in this arcade-style Action Adventure/Match-3 mashup.

name: Late Night Wanderer
summary: An atmospheric game about a late night walk home.

name: Larry the Unlucky: Part 1
summary: Follow Larry's life to find the source of his lack of luck. Discover his intriguing story and solve puzzles to understand how his life plays out.

name: Law Law Land
summary: An adventure about a factory worker, who becomes the most influential politician in the country.

name: Layers of Fear: Legacy
summary: A port of Layers of Fear for the Nintendo Switch.

name: LazyTown Live! The Pirate Adventure
summary: LazyTown Live! The Pirate Adventure is a video game created for the live theater performance of the same name.

name: Last Imperial Prince
summary: When an army of monsters attacked the castle Camelot and forced the Emperor to resign, the whole country fell under their rule, and the Emperor's son Radius had to flee. But in his heart, the young prince still hopes to reclaim the land that is rightfully his, and to defeat the monstrous conquerors. With the aid of his best friend, the wandering monk Nova, and a female fighter Mirion, Radius begins his quest.

name: Last Week
summary: The inhabitants of a small portside town begin to fear the worst when they hear the news. This is the last week before the end of the world. With the limited time you have left you must decide which of the town's folk to try and help.

name: Lands of Lore III
summary:
Coppert LeGré, our 16 year old hero, is a bastard child of a prominent nobleman. But even the fact that he is a nephew of the king won’t help him clear his name from the unjust charges of murdering his own kin. It’s up to him to prove his innocence, regain the trust of the people of Gladstone, and face the evil, mystical force that’s been menacing the land. It will take more than just courage to close the dimensional rifts that seem to be the source of the turmoil. Knowing that, Coppert sets off to find allies, avenge the death of his father and brothers, and save the kingdom itself!

Lands of Lore 3 offers diverse, RPG gameplay presented in first person perspective. It gives you a large amount of freedom, letting you choose your own path towards the game’s ultimate goal, and to divert from it whenever you like to engage in one of the many side-quests. You can join one of four guilds as a fighter, cleric, thief, or mage. Gaining expertise in the skills associated with your class is as easy as putting them into use. You’re not facing your destiny all by yourself, though. By your side you’ll find a magical familiar-- a faithful companion in your journey. With its help you will survive--and thrive--in one of the most extensive RPG game worlds ever created.

name: Lair of the Evildoer
summary: Lair of the Evildoer is an Xbox Live Indie Game.

name: Labyrinths of the World: Changing the Past
L'Albero Azzurro
summary: This FMV game is based on the educational TV show of the same name. This game is shaped like an episode of the show. The player can point and click on items, which will display a video of the two presenters and the protagonist Dodo, a muppet with a yellow beak and a pois body. Videos are usually activities, songs or stories shown by the presenters. The target is prescholar age, between 3 and 6 years.

name: Laser Lasso Ball
summary: Laser Lasso Ball is the deadliest sport in the universe. Beings from across the galaxy battle to become stars in this Local Multiplayer Alien Deathsport.

name: Last Colossus
summary: Last Colossus is an ACT/RPG game. You play as a commander who gains control of a giant robot after crash landing on a war-torn planet.

name: Landing Party
summary: You starship is marooned on an alien planet! A team of six crew members must beam down to the surface of the planet in order to find energy crystals needed for take-off.

name: Landing High Japan
summary:
Landing High Japan is an arcade game in which the object is to pilot a commercial airliner, taking off from and landing at several Japanese airports.[3] It is a part of the Landing series of airline simulation arcade games which also includes Midnight Landing (1987), Top Landing (1988) and Landing Gear (1995). 
 
The game is available in both 29" and 50" versions.

name: Lazerz
summary: The fast paced free to play arena shooter. Master the art of hydraulic power movement, fly like an angel through the arena and shoot with powerful ricocheting lazerz to obliterate your enemies with style!

name: Laser Drift: OverDrive
summary:
Laser Drift: OverDrive  
  
COMING TO PC – LATE 2017!  
  
A retro style top down battle car game for up to 4 players.   
  
Make your friends your enemies with a host of different race tracks, battle arenas, weapons, powerups and game modes. Pure local multiplayer arcade fun!   
  
RACE, BATTLE, SURVIVE, DESTROY!  
  
Sign up to the mailing list on our website for a chance to win a free copy of the game on release! (Don't worry - We won't spam you!)  
  
  
CLASSIC LOCAL MULTIPLAYER!  
  
Up to 4 player players can battle it out in either Battle or Race Modes.  
  
Pick up and play!  
  
  
BATTLE!  
  
Get yourself armed up and destroy the opposition!  
  
A variety of different weapons each with their own strengths and weaknesses - Master them all!  
Gain the upper hand with a well timed power up!  
Free for all or Team vs Team play  
Choose your mode! - We already have Deathmatch, Survivor (Last Man Standing) and Fugitive (Capture the Flag), but we plan to add many more.  
Huge selection of fully authored battle arenas. We have around 20 currently but we're hoping for that to be closer to 50 by the time the game is released!  
  
  
RACE!  
  
Top down racing in the classic mould!  
  
One screen, one track - Entire track visible on the screen at the same time like the old school top down racers of old.  
Huge variety of fully authored tracks - We currently have around 50 but we're hoping for double that by the time we come to release!  
Comprehensive customisable Grand Prix modes.  
Exciting tracks - Not just your run of the mill circuits here. Over and Under, Speed Boosts, Moving Hazards, Shortcuts - It's all in scope!  
Battle or Pure Racing Modes - Choose to introduce weapons and powerups into the mix or to race pure and leave it all down to the driving!  
  
COMING TO PC – LATE 2017!

name: Last Debt
summary: You owe powerful people a lot of money. Start from the bottom - working as a cleaner in fast food and become the director of a large campaign.

name: La Crypte des Maudits
summary: The sequel of Black Sect remained confined to France on the Amstrad CPC. Like its predecessor it's a graphical adventure with a text parser, but unlike that game it did not benefit from an official remake, though a fanmade one exists under the name of "Black Sect 2: The Cursed Crypt".

name: Lasting
summary:
Lasting is an interactive experiment in claustrophobia developed in 2012.
The map and events generate randomly, so everyone's experience is different. Gather disks and descend into the dizzying complex as the thick static presses in on you. You are not alone.

name: Last Kingdom: The Card Game
summary: Last Kingdom is a hardcore strategy battles card game. Demon King was conquered your country, and now is sending the army to conquer the last kingdom. Bring your country survivor to help the last kingdom facing the army, discover all possible strategy, and defend the last kingdom in this land!

name: LazuNight Funkin'
summary: Step into the shoes of Pomu, who, in celebration of LazuLight's upcoming first year anniversary, will be rehearsing for their grand concert with her friends Finana and Elira in the hopes of giving their fans the best performance possible!

name: Labyrinths of the World: Forbidden Muse HD
Lawn & Order
summary: Plant, Attack, Defend: 4 Player Garden Competition

name: Late Night Shift
summary:
At 1 am you wake up to the sound of your cell phone, it turns out it's your coworker, you work at a 24 hour super market, and you work the night shift.

in this game you have to complete the tasks you are supposed to do, there are also several jump scares here, so prepare your heart!

name: Labyrinth Lunacy
summary:
Roller coaster tracks and jumps meet the classic wooden labyrinth.
Advanced 3D graphics, including fully dynamic shadows and lighting. All objects cast shadows that realistically move as your device moves, helping to create the feel of natural light. Runs at a silky smooth 60+ frames per second on all supported devices.

name: Lalaloopsy: Sew Magical! Sew Cute!
summary: Welcome to the whimsical world of Lalaloopsy! Explore the colorful world and make new friends!.

name: Lavender
summary: Lavender is a community-driven social sandbox. There are no limits on performance, physics or scripting. If you want to make it, you can. Come imagine with us.

name: Last Voyage of the Aqualus
summary: Large adventure map, primarily 19th century themed, with some scifi elements.

name: Last Day: Zombie Survival VR
summary: A stranger, who awakens in a room with no recollection of how they got there, soon discovers they're pawns in a deadly game perpetrated by a notorious unknown person.

name: Laser 77: Virtual Lab
summary: Shoot, slash and dash your way against virtual enemies and try to max your score in this 2D, top-down action game.

name: Launch Director
summary: A walking simulator where you can launch rockets! Become the Launch Director for a commercial space transportation company. Can you configure these reusable rockets for a successful launch, ascent and landing?

name: Laptick
summary: A puzzle platformer game for multiple Japanese computer systems.

name: La La Land 4
summary:
La La Land is the first game in the La La Land series, a pentalogy of short experimental videogames by Matt Aldridge (a.k.a. theanemic) which share a recurring cast, subliminal and fable-like storytelling, and a haunting atmosphere.

In the fourth instalment, Biggt works as a chef and goes on a journey through several dreamlike scenes.

name: Lazlos' Leap
summary: Lazlos' Leap is a puzzle game, purported to have been designed by one Professor Lazlos, a "mathematician and Game Boy player". In Japan, it was released with the ultra-simple title "Solitaire".

name: Latebus
summary: You can't remember your name.

name: La Caza
summary:
A scientist receives a letter from a colleague but their plans are averted when the plane's engines fail, stranding our protagonist in the wilds of the jungle.

Will you survive?

name: Last Mind Standing
summary: When you need answers, you ask questions. When you don't get them, there is always another way, although it won't be easy. Put the helmet on, lay down, close your eyes, take a deep breath and relax. In a few moments, nightmares will get real.

name: La Espada Sagrada
summary:
"La Espada Sagrada" is an action adventure game consisting of three levels. where our protagonist aspires to obtain the Sacred Sword.

The first two stages are more oriented towards adventure, platforming and puzzle solving , while crossing a dangerous jungle and a cave full of traps.

In the third and final stage, our hero takes advantage of the sword to rise victorious in a classic action arcade side-scrolling gameplay.

name: La Voix
summary: Navigate complex relationships and unexpected revelations as a transfer student with amnesia in this visual novel adventure. Uncover the truth behind a mysterious dream and the wishes of the campus crush.

name: Lady of Hwarang
summary: “Training after test? Stop the shoot!” Right after university examination, the car accident led me to a ghost claiming I muredered her 1,400 years ago. Solving the mystery is the only way to go back… wait, by traveling all the time back and training with Hwarangs? My new life has just begun!

name: Lancer Lords
summary: Inspired on the Arcade game Joust

name: Last Case: The Disappearance of Amanda Kane
summary: A private eye named Jack Forester investigating the disappearance of Amanda Kane.

name: Last of Ark
summary: A roguelike deckbuilding tactics game that combines elements from 'Monster Train' and 'Into the Breach'.The player needs to establish organization in a destroyed world, defend against enemy attacks, and restore order.

name: Last Bronx
summary: Nine gang leaders battle it out for control over Tokyo city in this AM3 developed arcade fighting game. It was the first motion captured fighting game released back in May 1996 to Arcades in Japan. Home versions of Last Bronx were later produced for the contemporary Sega Saturn and Windows systems.

name: Laid Back in the Alternative World
summary: A role-playing game from U.K.

name: Lawnmower Game
summary: Drive and cut grass first time in simulator game, with amazing lanwmower in big open world

name: Laboratory X-29
summary: Laboratory X-29 is a sci-fi roguelite-like top-down shooter, where the protagonist takes his chances to escape from the Lab after an accident. Shoot your way out to freedom, clear rooms full of other dangerous experiments, find out the secrets hidden in this place and eat chicken to survive.

name: Lame Defenders
summary: Fight waves of monsters in real-time tactical battles using a team of up to 5 heroes. Collect new heroes and create as many teams as you like as every team is better for different situation.

name: Laser Ghost
summary:
A shoot-'em-up designed for use with the Light Phaser, but can also be played with a control pad.

Not to be confused with the Sega System 18 version.

name: Last Command: Extra Mode Pack
summary: Add 3 special challenge maps, 5 time trial maps, and 5 player shapes.

name: Late Last Nite
summary: Have you ever had one of those nights?

name: Laundry++
summary: a game about trans harassment

name: Languish
summary: Languish is a First-Person Indie horror game. A woman and her two children are mysteriously missing. There’s no sign of burglary, all property is kept in good condition. What happened? Where are they? Are they still alive? A sound recording finally revealed the horror truth…

name: Last Harem

name: Last Lap Heroes
summary: Take control of the last laps in legendary races, represent famous teams and turn the tides from where it was supposed to go. Fall in love with the Tyrant or wear the Wombat Drivers Club coat with pride. Lock in your gear, push your luck and reach the finish line first, becoming the Last Lap Hero!

name: Laboratory

name: Lady Pac
summary:
Lady Pac is a homage to Ms. Pac-Man, an arcade game published by Midway in 1982.

Main differences from the original version:
- Randomly generated mazes
- Bonus rounds

name: Labirinto
summary: Labirinto this is a simple game in which you need to get to the other end of the maze.

name: Lala the Magical
summary:
In the ancient ruins (province of Badajoz) lives Lala with her teacher. She is learning magic but still has a long way to go.

“Tell me about the Sky Palace” – asks Lala, and her teacher tells her again about the three Power Gems hidden inside. “I’d love to see them”, but Lala’s teacher would say no… “It’s too dangerous, and powerful magic is required to traverse the palace”.

But now the teacher has left for a few days and Lala is bored… “His Magic Wand should provide a power that’s strong enough to be able to cope with the perils hidden inside the Sky Palace. Problem is, the Wand is locked in a special vault, and the lock is also magical!” Not only she needs to find the key, but become stronger collecting eight magic potions.

Let’s get busy! Help Lala get the Wand and travel to the Sky Palace to find the three Power Gems! Just because she’s bored!

name: Labrynth of Zeux
summary: An ASCII-based action/puzzle game for MS-DOS. Playing the role of Vince M. Louis, players must traverse the Labyrinth in search of the legendary Silver Staff of Zeux.

name: Laboratory of Nightmares

name: Last ticket for Eternity

name: Later Daters: Part One and Two
Last Sapiens
summary: Doomsday survival games. You can fight zombies, steal zombie supplies, the zombies will fight each other, and you can take advantage of them... The game takes place shortly after the human Dark Forest Strike

name: La Corona Mágica

name: Laundro-Mess
summary: Survive endless hordes of... Something.

name: Laser Heck

name: Lacrosse Shot
summary: Lacrosse Shot is a third-person flick lacrosse video game.

name: Lady Godiva: Naked Eye

In the first period, set in a distant and turbulent past, a powerful and fearless female figure emerges, whose true name remains shrouded in mystery. She, however, is confused with the legendary historical figure who rode naked.

name: Landshay: Event Night
summary:
Immerse yourself in the epic action world and pass the test in the adventure game.

Avoid dangers, run away from wild animals, overcome obstacles to advance further inside the mysterious world. Find secret locations in each level.

name: Laser Push
summary: Push laser blocks and direct the lasers into switches that open the exit path.

name: Layer - Simple is Hard
summary:
Welcome to Layer, A minimalist mind-bending puzzle game. 
Your goal is to stack all the pieces into a single stack.

name: Laservasion

name: Laruaville 12
summary: Recreate the Wild West in its former glory by playing Match-3 levels and solving puzzles!

name: Lawn Mower
summary: The goal of this game is to mow all the grass before you run out of gas. Collect gas cans to keep yourself from running on empty.

name: Last Standing
summary: Last standing is a game that combines puzzle elements that remove elemental blocks and indulging girls' stories. Grow yourself by playing. Also, please release the girls' cravings with the items you collected.

name: L'Ange et le Demon

name: Laserface
summary: Blow up a city with your face lasers!

name: Lagaf': Les Aventures de Moktar: Vol 1 - La Zoubida
summary:
A decent platform game that's identical to Titus' earlier The Fox: From Here for Marakech, except that you are now controlling Moktar, a plump Arabian adventurer similar to Nintendo's popular Mario.

Nothing is wrong with the game-- it just feels like a rehash of many different platform games that's been done before, and better. If you like The Fox or any other Titus' action games, you'll probably like this one. If you're looking for a creative platform games without repetitive levels, play Disney's or Infogrames' games instead.

name: Launch Party
summary: A competitive multiplayer space flight experience, played over a Twitch stream.

name: Lava Joe
summary: Keep climbing to avoid the rising lava. Collect treasure and take down monsters for bonus points.

name: Larry the Dinosaur 2: Something in the Cola

name: La Malédiction

name: Last Harvest
summary: a good haul this year

name: La Giungla Tenebrosa
summary:
One of the expansions games from Kinder Fresh Adventures series, advertising italian snacks.
The gameplay is almost the same as La Valle Magica's, but the graphics were changed to a jungle.

name: Lawless Lands: Grizzly Pet Pack
summary: The Grizzly Pet Pack DLC for Lawless Lands unlocks the exclusive Grizzly Bear Pet Companion to join your company and follow you on all your adventures!

name: Last Santa Standing
summary: Last Santa Standing is a Christmas-themed PvP arena fighting game by Doborog Games. You take on the roll of one of many Santas looking to win a battle royale style match and grab the Christmas Dinner prize.

name: Labyrinth
summary: Can you escape the Labyrinth, or will you succumb to the many monsters that live within?

name: Lawn Mowing Simulator VR
summary: Escape to a world where it’s always sunny and there is always grass that needs mowing – Lawn Mowing Simulator VR allows you to find your inner zen through the art of mowing and string trimming. Reach up, down and all around to maintain your equipment or complete your ground checks and mowing, or just sit back, relax and mow yourself into peacefulness. Explore unique locations and help make them look beautiful again through the power of garden maintenance.

name: Last Survivors
summary: In the game, you will experience an incredibly satisfying adrenaline rush that will leave you wanting more. However, be sure not to harm innocent humans in the zombie horde. Survive in the post-apocalyptic world, show off your amazing shooting skills, and become the last survivor!

name: Last Loremaster
summary: Harness the power of the six cardinal elements in Last Loremaster, a high-octane ARPG set in a stunning mythological world. Play as Jahir, a powerful Elemental Loremaster combatting the encroaching Unravelling as you seamlessly freeze, burn, crush, and electrocute your foes!

name: Ladybugs Lines

Ladybugs Lines is the same puzzle game but a hundreds times nicer and more diverse than its ancestor because it’s more fun to watch the ladybirds hilariously creeping on a playing area than to watch just circles!

name: Last Stand
summary: Last Stand is a tactical defense game where you must defend humanity against the undead zombie horde. Construct your army’s defenses by building walls, turrets and towers. Thin the zombie horde with explosives devices such as land mines, bazookas and air strikes. Upgrade your squads skills and arm them with powerful weapons and armor.

name: Late Work
summary: Short horror game where you need to close the office in time

name: Last Man Kicking
summary: a bunch of dude play soccer in a swivel chair... any more questions?

name: Laser Clay Shooting System
summary: The Laser Clay Shooting System is a light gun shooting simulation game created by Nintendo in 1973. The game consisted of an overhead projector which displayed moving targets behind a background; players would fire at the targets with a rifle, in which a mechanism of reflections would determine whether or not the "laser shot" from the rifle hit the target.

name: Lab.Gen.
summary:
It is Labyrinth! No, a LOT of labyrinths which always will be different because of procedural generation.
And what about controls? They are simple. Left, right, up and down – that’s all you need to know.

name: Lasso
summary: A rope type animal catching game.

name: Labyrinth
summary: Roll your ball through the maze while avoiding the holes in this incredibly realistic tilt-controlled game.

name: Lament of the Yuppie
summary: Horror at work, horror at home. There is no escape!

name: Last Week of a King
summary: Enter Last Week of a King and follow Jesus as he confronts money lenders in the temple courts and eats Passover with his disciples.

name: Last Meal
summary:
You were kidnapped by a group of crazed potato salad cultists, and now you're being forced to eat poison laced potato salad.
Find a way to get rid of your potato salad while they aren't looking.

name: Layton Brothers: Mystery Room
summary:
Layton Brothers: Mystery Room is a Professor Layton series spin-off game for the iOS and Android mobile operating systems. It was announced on the LEVEL-5 Vision event 2011.

The game follows Lucy Baker, a beginning detective who is transferred to Scotland Yard. Here, she works under Alfendi Layton, son of the renowned Professor Hershel Layton. Together, they investigate crimes for Scotland Yard's "Mystery Room".

The game was released as a freemium game: the game itself and the first 2 cases (and prologue) are free, while two additional packs of respectively 4 and 3 cases can be bought from within the app.

name: L.A. Funk
summary: It's 1980's Los Angeles, filled with flashing neon's and retro synth tunes, you are Jack Tatum, here to find out what happened to your journalist fiancé who has mysteriously vanished after stumbling upon something she shouldn't have. Your journey starts deep in Krips territory where you find yourself stuck in the middle of a gang war.

name: Lasercade
summary: The first thing you're bound to notice upon booting Lasercade is how nice the graphics look. It's hard to believe that the 2600 can do a 3/4th perspective shooting game, but Lasercade is the proof. The goal of the game is to shoot all the targets in the upper section of the screen before time runs out (that's original). However, while you can just start shooting willy nilly, you should probably take a second to look at the funny little targets in the middle section of the screen. In the middle section of the the screen there are three rotating mirrors. As you may have guessed, these mirrors can play havoc with your laser if you're not careful. If you shoot a mirror while it is facing you, it will reflect the laser back at you and you will lose some time and be momentarily stunned. However if you shoot the mirror while its back is to you, you can destroy it so it won't bother you until the next round. While this may sound a bit complicated, it's often best just to ignore the mirrors and shoot at the targets themselves. The number of mirrors can be controlled with the left difficulty switch.

name: Lara Croft and the Guardian of Light: Things that Go Boom - Challenge Pack 2
summary: Four new explosive challenge maps featuring a variety of tense puzzles, deadly traps, and relentless combat encounters.

name: Lapse
summary: A real time mystery about using time travel to solve your sister's murders. Yes, murders with an 's'.

name: Labyrinth
summary: Labyrinth is a game where the player travels through a maze looking for clues and tools to help kill the Minotaur.

name: Lackgirl II: De Docta Ignorantia
summary: Sequel of the visual novel『Lackgirl I: Astra Inclinant, sed Non Obligant.』, teased after the ending credits.

name: Las Aventuras de Frank el Enano
Last Fort Night Craft Survival Battle Royale
Last Half of Darkness II
summary: Last Half of Darkness II is an point and click horror adventure game. It's the direct sequel to Last Half of Darkness, starting off at the point where the first game ended.

name: Lawgivers
summary: Lawgivers is a turn-based political simulation game. Run for elections with your own party and enter parliament to approve or abolish laws. Appoint the president and decide whether you want a democracy or just a fake one instead.

name: Lawless Racer: 2D Street Racing
summary: Lawless Racer is a retro top-down street racing game with everything modernized. Race! Earn money! And be the king of the streets of Rome with your tuned, 4 wheeled, monster.

name: LaughterLost
summary: LaughterLost takes you through a surreal journey of work and family life. Face psychological twists, narrative choices, puzzles, and unexpected unique confrontations! Will you break this dystopian cycle of everyday life?

name: Lass ich Sliden

name: Lambo Jump

name: LastSafeZone

name: Last Shot

name: Labor
summary:
Labor - nostalgic first-person shooter. 
Player has to go through crowds of zombies and cyborgs, collect data about participants of the experiment and destroy the laboratory.

name: Last Call!
summary: There's a party going on in here, and you're the bartender! All of the action takes place in a hip New York bar, where the clientele just want to drink and you've got to help them. Learn how to mix more than 100 different drinks ranging from the simple to the absurdly fancy. Make sure to check I.D. cards, keep the customers from getting too drunk, and maintain a constant flow of music. (You wouldn't want folks to start getting bored, would you?) The goal is to earn tips, but that won't be so easy with 20 of the city's fussiest at your bar.

name: Last Rollbug
summary:
You are Beetle, a small rollbug who does some platforming stuff and also experiences horrors beyond its comprehension.
The rest of these tiny creatures have gone missing, will Beetle be able to find them, or will something else find them first?

name: La Cosy Académie 2
summary:
The long awaited sequel of the successful Visual Novel "Bienvenue à la Cosy Académie". 
Meet again your favorite characters, like "Foulk", in new incredible settings full of suspense and twists! 
 
A game full of humor and with mysterious puzzles.

name: LAIzy Picture Phone

Players write a prompt for an AI to generate an image, and the next player receives it and has to guess the phrase that created this image, which prompts generate another image, and so on.

name: Labirint
summary: Imagine a labyrinth where walls move every time the player moves making it impossible to calculate your way to the goal in advance so you'll have to improvise.

name: Law of Life
summary: " Natural selection, survival of the fittest, survival of the fittest " This is the law of life that nature cannot escape, the conquest of the inferior by the dominant race!《Law of Life》 is a game of creature-oriented, unlocked combat. Even you can kill creatures just by feeling.

name: Lake Masters 2
summary: A PlayStation fishing game

name: Land of Mushrooms: Forest of Nightmares - Background
Land of Mushrooms: Small Mode - Mini Mushroom Mayhem
Land of Mushrooms: Scary Horror Mushrooms - Skin Set
La-Mulana 1 & 2
summary: Brandish thy whip and sharpen thy wit! Enter the ancient ruins of La-Mulana, filled with nefarious traps, brain-tingling puzzles, and deadly monsters that stand between you and a powerful treasure.

name: Late Bird
summary: Late Bird is a short interactive story about birds, movies, suicidal thoughts and not growing up in time.

name: Last Generation: Survival
summary: Last Generation: Survival is a survival game set in a post-apocalyptic world where robots have conquered the world.

name: Landnav
summary: Landnav is the ultimate adventure race. Plan. Prepare. Survive. Excel. Use real world navigation techniques to blaze your path across awe inspiring vistas. Become an unstoppable adventure athlete.

name: Last Command: Scream Fest pack
summary: Free download DLC for the Scream Fest. Become an assassin of Halloween, sneak into the program world and find out the hidden secret.

name: Lazer Cycle
summary: Inspired by the light cycle scene from the movie "Tron".

name: Labyrinth Deck
summary: Will you be able to find the way out?

name: Laundry Room Dilemma
summary: You find yourself amnesiac and trapped in a laundry room. You can earn food by working. Who built this place? How do you escape?

name: Laypo Simulator
summary: 'Laypo Simulator' includes multiple different game modes. At the moment they include: Laypo Country Simulator and Laypo Apocalypse Survival.

name: Lamplight
summary: Lamplight is a 3D mind-bending puzzle platformer where you defy gravity and warp your perception. Navigate a labyrinth of rooms where walls become floors, ceilings become pathways, and time bends unexpectedly. Unravel the secrets hidden within this distorted world - are you ready to be challenged?

name: Lazy Galaxy 2
summary: Lazy Galaxy 2 is an idle/clicker game with base-building and RTS elements. Lead an evil (albeit lazy) alien race to conquer the universe! Expand your base, fight vicious foes, and conquer the galaxies. Acquire combat experience and convert into candy, the most precious alien resource!

name: Last Week
summary: Napa, a girl who has been haunted by a nightmare since childhood, decided to take a step into the abandoned school she saw in the dream. Something attempted to drag her into the past and it will never let her go back.

name: Ladders by Powgi
summary: Make new words by changing one letter at a time. The goal is to turn one word into another using only a limited number of steps. Your reward? A free dad joke with each puzzle solved!

name: Lanternium
summary: Adventure raccoon with a magical lantern, full of interesting puzzles built on a combination of colors.

name: Land of an Endless Journey

name: Last 4 Survive: The Outbreak
summary: New heroes have arrived! Single play is a tense story about escaping from the zombie city! Do a battle and play with each other for up to maximum 4 people!

name: Last Village
summary: Arriving on a hunt in a small village, you become a witness to attack of alien forces on the ground, armed with a shotgun, you decide to repulse the alien intruders.

name: Last Helion

Battle warring factions and bosses to secure valuable loot. Craft gear, build your ship, and upgrade your character to tackle bigger challenges.

name: Lamo
summary: Chaos is the name of the game. In Lamo, everything, including the world itself, is destructible. Outlast your opponents by blasting away the map, constructing massive attack towers, capturing vital control points, and raining destruction from your personalized hovercar.

As in Ikari Warriors, the player can control vehicles - tanks, helicopters and boats. He has a gun with unlimited ammo and grenades. At the end of each level, the player must beat a heavily armed vehicle.

name: Last Chance VR
summary: This is a very simple and easy VR game. Just enjoy yourself inside the VR world!

name: Last Pizza Slice
summary: Take the last slice of pizza before your rival

name: Langrisser I

He'll have to confront his rival Lance and the Kaiser to reclaim his homeland and the Sacred Sword Langrisser. However, both sides will be observed closely by the watchful eyes of the darkness. The fate of Langrisser, Baldea, and the entire continent of El Sallia will be determined by the choices you make.

name: Laser Skirmish
summary: Laser Skirmish is a puzzle game based around planning different ship compositions to beat the enemy.

name: Laser Grand Prix
summary: Laserdisc based driving game. Originally came out in arcades.

name: Lakeside
summary: A single, large, mostly outdoor Egyptian themed map, with custom music and textures.

name: Last Story: Dungeon
summary: Explore a mysterious dungeon in this 2D platformer, uncovering the secrets of Drystan and his missing parents. With stunning visuals and an engaging soundtrack, get ready for a challenging and mystery-filled experience.

name: L'affaire est Dans le Sac

name: Labyronia RPG
summary: Labyronia is an epic RPG. Only by defeating the gods can you, and your friends, save the world.

name: LaserCat
summary: Jump, dodge and explore in the search for your Owlfriend, who has been kidnapped by Wizzord: the magic space frog! Explore Wizzord's castle, avoid nasty enemies, find the keys and solve trivia questions to free your friend!

name: Laser Guy (Harold)
summary: Involuntary twin-stick shooter, do not harm any of your alien co-workers (GMTK 20)

name: Labyrinth of Loci

name: Last Labyrinth: Collector's Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following:

- Last Labyrinth
- Special Packaging
- Theme Song Maxi Single CD
- Original Story Book
- Original Post Card
- Original Sticker

name: Lanadgel

You need to urgently get out of this strange universe after passing all the levels, so that this story does not end and the world was saved from evil enemies!

name: LabTrainingVR: Personal Protective - Equipment Edition

name: Land of the Mage Lords

name: Laser Chess: Deflection

name: Landinar: Into the Void

name: La Carte au Tresor
summary: A trivia show game for the Nintendo DS.

name: Last Epoch: Adolescent Chronowyrm
summary: The Adolescent Chronowyrm is a Cosmetic Pet that can join you on your Travels.

name: Latarnix Puzzle
summary: Help the boar Latarnix as he passes through a variety of puzzles with obstacles to reach delicious golden apples at the end of each of the 50 levels in the game.

name: Last Boss -9x9 Action Battle-
summary: 9x9 Action Battle This is an arcade shooter game. The player has two actions. These are attack and evasion. Avoid various attacks from the boss and defeat the boss. Please defeat four bosses. Then you should be able to meet the true boss.

name: Laserbreak 2
summary: A puzzle game from errorsevendev.

name: Landorus Therian Dating Simulator
summary: A humorous, and also heartwarming love story between an unassuming player and competitive Pokémon's fallen legendary fighter, Landorus-Therian.

name: La Jetée
summary: ‘This is the story of a man marked by an image from his childhood.’ An 30minute black noire game, with an deep story, 30 beautiful images and stunning backroundsound.

name: Laseronium: The Line
summary: This is a game connected with physics, so if you're not into optics and that kind of stuff this isn't a game for you! Just kidding - this is a game for everyone!

name: Law and Order: Los Angeles
summary: An episodic adventure game created by Telltale Gamers that is based on the Law and Order: Los Angeles TV show.

name: Langrisser Re:Incarnation Tensei
summary: Langrisser Re:Incarnation Tensei takes place in a flooded world and the story's protagonist is a man with the Sacred Sword Langrisser, looking to reunite himself with a childhood friend, while fighting the empire's army. The battle system is the same as known from other Langrisser titles, but with 10-on-10 battles fought by super-deformed 3D characters serving as units. The units consist of Infantry, Cavalry, and Archers.

name: Last War 2044
summary: Last War 2044 will allow you to feel the atmosphere of the world that survived a nuclear war. And with the remnants of mankind, you must be saved from mutated creatures by the help of improvised means of protection.

name: Labyrinth: The Exit Is Closer
summary: You are in a Maze. Rescue yourself.

name: Last Spirit PBT
summary: Play solo or with up to 4 players in Last Spirit PBT, a fast-paced roguelike adventure. Crash-land on your former home, now an alien-infested world, and battle relentless machine foes. Combine loot to power up and master each character. Use sharp combat and smart strategy to conquer the chaos.

name: Last Supper Of Devils
summary: Last Supper of Devil is a collaborative horror game that can be played by at least 4 and up to 8 players. Players will role a Devil and attempting to reincarnate into humans through sacrificial rituals, or role a Devotee and infiltrate Devils to fight against them.

name: Lands of Raynar
summary: Take on the role of Karia and unveil the hidden truth of the past with your mysterious companion Ivy. Explore the Lands of Raynar as you take on enemies as they lead through Mórrí, a mythical creature of unknown origin.

name: Lamp Head
summary: The protagonist of this game is a strange man with a lamp instead his head who needs to breach out of the darkened and dangerous odd place at whatever cost.

name: Labirinto 3
summary: Labirinto this is a simple game in which you need to get square to the other end of the maze.

name: LavaCat Jump
summary: An endless platformer in the LavaCat series.

name: Laxius Party
summary: 2005, the year Blades of Heaven was released on Windows. Made by Laxius Power and published by Laxius Power, this role-playing (rpg) game is available for free.

name: Last Day of Rome

name: Lands of Xon

name: Lazy Postman
summary: Lazy Postman is a top-down 3D runner in which you have not one, or even two, but a dozen main characters that spend all their energy trying to stay at their job. Help couriers not to lose their means of subsistence and prove that a human is better than a robot!

name: Lamm
summary: Lamm is a platformer in which you have to pick up orbs to jump. Some orbs allow you to jump once, others twice, and they can go up to five jumps in a row !

name: Land of the Dead: Day of Reckoning

name: LavaCat Run

name: Landon
summary: Everyone lives in an utopia, because science makes huge leaps in every area. But Landon, he's not happy. He's not getting the enjoyment he wants, so he tries to get some.

name: Lappelduvide
summary: A VHS-style found footage, analog, psychological horror game about the experience of one of the extreme cases of the virus that was left untreated.

name: Last Hope on Earth

name: Land Sliders
summary: A mobile game in which a variety of characters are controlled by sliding around the landmass that they rest on.

name: Lambda
summary:
This a gzdoom mod that contains all of the weapons and items from Half-Life and Half-Life: Opposing-Force, also includes some extra sutff from other mods to fill the item holes.

With a focus on fast-paced combat and visual fidelity, Lambda transforms Doom into a hybrid sci-fi shooter with classic mechanics and upgraded graphics.

name: Land's End
summary: Land's End is an upcoming game from the developers of Monument Valley, designed specifically for Samsung's Gear VR,

name: La Mémoire
summary: La Mémoire is a futuristic visual novel about longing and the struggle to bring back lost memories, set in a future where humans live alongside androids.

name: Lapse 2: Before Zero
summary: Lapse 2: Before Zero is the official prequel to Lapse: A Forgotten Future. The one who once was President is now Pharaoh, the one who once was a machine is now your most precious ally in the challenge to come.

name: Larry the Unlucky: Part 2
summary: Larry is back! Discover his intriguing story and solve puzzles to understand how his life plays out.

name: Lazy Jones
summary: Lazy Jones is essentially a collection of fifteen smaller sub-games. The game takes place inside a hotel with three floors, connected by an elevator. The character is a lazy hotel employee who does not much care for his work, but prefers to sneak into the rooms to play video games instead.

name: Lake of Shadows
summary: A 2D pixel art side-scrolling resource management with some action, looting, and a bit of exploration that mainly focuses on a small area. Defend yourself against the terror of the night inside your settlement by employing some villagers and give them equipment to further strengthen your defenses.

name: Last dungeon of defeat - Humiliation for female warrior Erina
Lands of Pharaoh: Episode 1
summary: Lands of Pharaoh is a multi-camera-angle based adventure game. The hero, Heragos, tries to get to Cairo in order to find the messages, related to his divine duty, left for him by Nefertiti.

name: Landing
summary: Conquer gravity and land a rocket on the platform. And over and over again. But conditions will change, and the path is not always clear.

name: La Gran Alameda
summary:
La Gran Alameda is a limit-removing map (complevel 2) set in the middle of a city under an otherworldly red sky. Make your way out of the facility and bring the fight to the rooftops! The city is completely infested, so watch out for fire coming from every direction.
This is not like the other bimonthly demon invasions though... This time they've brought some backup

name: Laser Bounce
summary: Move and rotate pieces to get the laser to hit the goal. Colored lasers, gates, and activators add additional challenge to this relatively simple concept. Can you complete all of the levels?

name: Lady Safari
summary: An action game in which the player is tasked with selecting a scantily clad woman and guiding them across an African landscape avoiding hazards, dodging enemies, and taking pictures of the local wildlife.

name: Last Vanguard
summary: Explore a stunning hand-craft world ravaged by war and ruled by an evil tyrant. Face a wide variety of enemies as you customize your strategy, change your weapons and unlock different abilities.

name: La Grande Armee at Austerlitz
summary: A PC strategy game set in the 19th century

name: Labyrinth
summary: Labyrinth is the classic game where you control a steel ball by tilting a wooden labyrinth. The game has over 1000 levels created by the community and you can easily create more levels of your own.

name: Labyrinth Hearts
summary: Single-player GACHA game with side battle system. Upgrade your town and befriend/romance many of the characters you collect!

name: Laser Ball
summary: A maze style action game for the TRS-80 and C64.

name: Laser Robot
summary: Atari 8Bit Jump and Run, nice graphics.

name: Labyrinth of the Grand Marche
summary: A Dungeon-clearing type game that involves going into dungeons to gather ingredients to cook meals for your characters.

name: Labyrinth Inf
summary: A relaxing labyrinth game.

name: Last Hope
summary: Last Hope is a combat-focused survival game where you will unlock new areas and weapons throughout your playtime to better equip you for fighting the increasingly harder nightly waves of enemies.

name: Laurie Anderson's Puppet Motel
summary: This is an interactive environment containing music, videos, monologues, and art-jokes from performance artist and musician Laurie Anderson with the help of designer Hsin-Chien Huang. It begins with an electrical outlet that glows and howls into the darkness. Then you enter "The Hall of Time", a corridor in the motel where icons cover the walls, and lead to 33 symbol-crowded rooms. A puppet Laurie Anderson sparingly appears as a guide.

name: Last Days of Spring 2
summary: It’s been five years since the Hayabusa Academy gang graduated from high school, Yuka has just graduated from University and moved to a new city when she receives an invitation from Aya, her best friend, for a class reunion in her country lodge in Cannon Beach, Oregon. What adventures lie for the old friends in this beautiful mountain state? Will there be romance? Will old memories sweep them up into rich and new emotions? Find out in Last Days of Spring 2.

name: Last Salvo
summary:
Last Salvo is a dynamic ww2 shooter. 
To survive battles after battles, mastery of your weapons and knowing your enemies are key. 
Only the skilled can survive.

name: Las Vegas Roulette
summary: Implements Las Vegas style roulette game. Most of the screen consists of the standard Las Vegas roulette betting table, and a moving strip on the top with wheel numbers on it represents the roulette wheel. Place your bets on the betting table, and spin the wheel. The game calculates your wins and losses.

name: Laserium
summary: You play as a bold ball that needs to run through all the hi-tech security systems. Bumping into the security bots means death, same does a fall from too high. Collect health points and look for finish blocks to go to the next level.

name: Ladies Orders
summary: One day, the assassins of Mahistî attacked the stronghold with a plot to assassinate Alys. But with the bravery of the knights, Mahistî's plan failed. Despite winning, but the assassin leader has escaped. Therefore, Alys led her knights to the south to find the whereabouts of the assassin leader.

name: Labyrinth Legend
summary: Labyrinth Legend is an action RPG with hack and slash elements. Explore the automatically-generated dungeons, collect powerful equipment, and battle against unknown, formidable enemies!

name: Labyrinth Hearts II
summary: Descend into the Labyrinth to bring peace to the world. First person / 3rd person dungeon crawler with the option to enable romance/adult mode.

name: Labyrinths of the World: Forbidden Muse
Lazy Master
summary:
Right now! It takes only 5 minutes!
Log in and grab various rewards that await you!
It’s so easy upgrading your heroes in Lazy Master!

name: Last Dawn
summary: Last Dawn is a short first-person atmospheric exploration game set in the year 2082. You will explore an open world map, hide from guards, and find a way to escape.

name: Ladies and Gentlemen, It's the Turnabout Show!
summary:
In a strange world being televised to others as a sitcom, defense attorney Jack Jackson must defend a strange client from a strange murder
accusation. But can he get through it with his sanity intact?

name: Latangerine Last Journey
summary: A short and linear "adult only" story. Also a spin-off of "Les 4 Alice : Lorange Journey". Alyce Latangerine is trapped in a strange house.

name: Last Stonelord
summary: Last Stonelord is an Old school Rpg with some Rts elements , inspired by games like Ultima online and Warcraft!

name: Lake Adventure
summary: A metafictional text adventure game by BJ Best. In-universe, written by young Eddie Hughes in 1993, and annotated by Ed Hughes in 2020.

name: Land of Foot
summary: Play together in this local co-op party where the shoes are in control! Guaranteed boots, battles, and bosses in your hunt for the evil Pegleg.

name: Labyrinthus: Episode 1
summary: Can you trust your own memory? Here a maze that you should escape with your survival skils. Find the correct ways, keys ,codes and lastly watch out for evil spirits!

name: Lawless Lands: Runemaster
summary: The Runemaster DLC for Lawless Lands adds magical runestones and a fabled staff and wand to make your characters and companions even more powerful than ever before! With this comes a new title, new skill, a new magic shop in the Capital City of Pyrshen, and some extras to help on your adventures!

name: Last Stanza
summary: Last Stanza is a Slice of Life/Drama Visual Novel that deals with the consequences of a tragic event following different perspectives.

name: Laundry Simulator
summary: A point-and-click time-management game where cats rule. Manage your hectic laundromat and get your cat through law school to defeat Laundrocorp.

name: Laserworks
summary: Redirect lasers to their targets with all sorts of mirrors, filters and weird contraptions. ¿Can you solve all levels?

name: Lamia's Bambina
summary: Lamia's Bambina is a unique game centered around the trials of the Lamia tribe. Reclaim stolen territory from the rival Harpy tribe by training, forming formidable parties, and facing off in battle. The fate of the Lamias lies with you. Unite, Lamia's Bambina!

name: Laser Party
summary: Laser Party is an online/local friendship-ruining party game With a unique laser combining system.

name: LastDitch
summary: "LastDitch" combines 2D tower defense and auto-chess, immersing players in a futuristic clash against void creatures. Strategically choose pieces barricades for defense, barracks for minions, fortresses for high damage. Experience intense battles, unique pixel art style, profound strategic depth.

name: La Fabbrica Spaziale
summary:
One of the expansions games from Kinder Fresh Adventures series, advertising italian snacks.
The gameplay is almost the same as La Valle Magica's, but the graphics were changed to a futuristic factory.

name: Laghaim
summary: A Korean MMORPG.

name: Last Epoch: Temporal Guardian
summary: The Temporal Guardian armor set is a unique cosmetic armor set available to be equipped in Last Epoch and provides only a visual change.

name: Lady Gaga: Born This Way Revenge
summary: Lady Gaga's new album, Born This Way, is presented here for your tapping pleasure. It also includes a bunch of bonus tracks from the special edition.

name: Last Epoch: Adult Chronowyrm
summary: The Adult Chronowyrm is a fearsome partner to have join you on your quests through Last Epoch!

name: Last Embryo: Either of Brave to Story
summary: The young girl "Sill", who longed to become an adventurer, came to the Developing City Aletia. However, shadows came quietly... No one had expected what kind of crisis Sill would encounter. But every footprint left by her will soon become mythology...

name: Lacrymo Tennis 2016
summary: No one does bourgeois revolution quite like the French.

name: Landraisers
summary: Explore the seas, loot islands, and slay bosses - all in the name of creating your own dream island!

name: Lagrange Point
summary: In the 22nd century, mankind has begun to emigrate into outer space. Constructed at a lagrange point were three huge space colonies: the Isis Cluster (two artificial biospheres, named Land-1 and Land-2, and a satellite). In the year Isis 0024 (55 years after the cluster was constructed), however, a biohazard outbreak occurred on Land-2. All attempts at contact were met with nothing but static. Now a research team led by pilot Jin approaches Land-1

name: Lakesider: Above and Below
summary: Working class weeb Knox's life is forever disturbed after a cute fish girl saves him from drowning himself by accident, introducing him to a strange sunken town hidden beneath the lake. An at times (un)comfortable slice of life turned survival horror you won't want to miss!

name: LandPort
summary: Today, the intelligent revolution is taking place. Release in the field of art and design and industry has become the focus of research in art and technology majors. The theme of the project is "Creating the future" is a response to the times when the intelligent revolution is taking place.

name: Lands of Vodria
summary: Climb the throne in this tactical game with clever maneuvers in card battles, as well as long-term strategy on the map.

name: Land der Hoffnung
summary: Land der Hoffnung (german for "Land of Hope") is a real-time strategy game that could be best described as a The Settlers clone. Playing as the leader of the small, but overpopulated country Breehn, you are tasked to lead your people to a better world. Over the course of 40 missions, you'll build settlements, train units and wage war just as you do in The Settlers.

name: Last Warrior Arena
summary: Last Warrior Arena is a roguelike strategy combat game, where you choose your class and develop your warrior by choosing stats, skills and buying and upgrading equipment. Your goal is to go as far as you can in the arena, fighting bosses in your way. Loosing to a boss will result in perma-death.

name: Laundry
summary: Laundry is a cancelled Game & Watch game. It is thought to be an early version of Rain Shower.

name: Last Bet
summary:
--Around 4:30 pm on June 5, a male student (14) from a private junior high school fell from the roof of the school he was attending. The boy died shortly after the fall at the hospital he was transferred to.

The police treated the case as an accident and the investigation was over. A bad event that happened unexpectedly. The misfortune that happened unexpectedly and unintentionally.

Is it okay to end this tragedy that happened about a month ago as an accident?

name: La La Land 2
summary:
La La Land 2 is the second game in the La La Land series, a pentalogy of short experimental videogames by Matt "theanemic" Aldridge which share a recurring cast, subliminal and fable-like storytelling, and a haunting atmosphere.

In the second instalment, Biggt helps a poor fishhead steal money from noblemen.

name: Last Epoch: Firefly's Refuge
summary: The Firefly's Refuge is a unique in-game portal effect that you can use to replace the visual look of your character's town portal!

name: Last Epoch: Fallen Ronin
summary: The Fallen Ronin armor set is a unique cosmetic armor set available to be equipped in Last Epoch

name: Last Fish
summary:
Last Fish is a stylish black and white action game about the survival of a tiny fish in toxic water filled with goo. 
 
 
Eat food, avoid goo, escape the shadowfish. Survive. 
 
 
FEATURES 
 
* Intuitive controls - tilt the device or use a controller! 
 
* Stylish monochromatic Retina Display graphics 
 
* Atmospheric soundtrack 
 
* Simple and addictive game mechanics 
 
* 45 levels and 5 arcade stages 
 
* 3 star performance score on each level

name: Larry: Wet Dreams Dry Twice
summary: Larry: Wet Dreams Dry Twice is the mobile port of Leisure Suit Larry: Wet Dreams Dry Twice!

name: Lament
summary: Lament, an NES styled Action-Platformer about a wolf with a buster sword!

name: Last Judgment: VR
summary: Play as a talented astronauts and save the earth in an awesome Virtual reality game.

name: Land of Chaos Online II: Revolution
summary: LOCO universe which has been closed in the darkest world for a long time, is now in the awakening! Land of Chaos Online II Revolution – is a game developed by only one person with Unreal Engine 4 with high end graphics/performance. Note: This game is not like any other MOBA game you have played.

name: Lauren's visit
summary: Lauren's visit is a new Visual Novel by Hanae Novels. Main character young woman Jessie is a lesbian. This story is about lesbian couple and their old friend. Find out what adventures did they have.

name: La Bestia: The Migrant's Long Journey
summary: Imagine having to leave your home and everything you know behind. Live the experience of a migrant immersed in a lonely journey while listening to the stories of your companions.

name: Lady and Blade
summary: This is a fast paced ARPG game. The heroine is a sexy and mature assassin, who can be replaced by a variety of clothing styles, with『Hack and Slash』that allows you to experience the pleasure of sweeping the battlefield.

name: Lawn Buster for Hire
summary: This game takes about 10 minutes to complete, and there are 5 different endings based on your decisions.

name: La Montagna Misteriosa
summary:
One of the expansions games from Kinder Fresh Adventures series, advertising italian snacks.
The gameplay is almost the same as La Valle Magica's, but the graphics were changed to a snowy mountain landscape.

name: Las Aventuras de Chocu: El Videojuego
summary:
Las Aventuras de Chocu - The Video Game is a two-dimensional platform game starring one of the most beloved characters in Spanish folklore: Chocu. In this hectic adventure we will have to find the mythical primeval chocopoc, which lies hidden in the old waterfall. But our company will not be easy.

Controlling the Chocu is a real delight. We can move from side to side of the screen with the arrow keys, jump with the 's' key, and attack with the 'd' key. We can also interact with some elements of the scenarios by pressing the 'f' key. And of course, to move through the menus we can use the mouse directly.

Although jumping through the jungle in search of chococopos is fun, the strong point of Las Aventuras de Chocu - The Video Game is without a doubt its script. Both the dialogues and the game's own story are hilarious, with a multitude of jokes capable of getting us a good laugh. Special mention deserves its dynamic achievement system, which will accompany us throughout the game.

The Adventures of Chocu - The Video Game is an excellent platform game, which has a cast of characters full of charisma and a lot of useless objects that we can buy and sell in the store of our friend the giraffe.

name: Last Mage Survivors
summary: Survive night creatures and terrible monsters in this roguelite game.

name: Lady's Hentai Mosaic
summary: Build a girl from mosaic shapes and undress her completely. Hentai is love, hentai is life.

name: Laruaville 11 Match 3 Puzzle
summary: That's not your regular Match3 game! It requires strategy. Unique game play, plus the town to build, a story and bonus games!

name: Last Night in Zombie Village
summary: Sometimes it's better not to wait until the sun goes down. Having decided to spend the night in an abandoned village, you could not even imagine that the rumors about the living dead would turn out to be true. You will not see the dawn, but will you be able to sell your life more dearly?

name: Labyrinths of the World: The Wild Side
summary: A vacation to India becomes a legendary adventure in the animal kingdom!

name: Last Half of Darkness: Shadows of the Servants
LazerGrrl
summary:
LazerGrrl is a fast-paced, base-combat strategy game focused on the player versus player experience. Find the right balance between building your own base, and blasting your opponent's. 
 
The nostalgia of classic local PVP games. 
 
You'll need Lazer-quick reflexes and even quicker wits to win. Take control of resource points, connect them to your base, and gather energy in order to power the strongest weapons. Counter your opponents strategy and watch with glee as their plans for victory explode in their face! 
 
Become the best!

name: Laseronium: Over the Line
summary: The entire set of levels designed specially with the intention to make it interesting for you to hit those goals with lasers. Three types of blocks as before, but used to design unique levels and paths for your lasers.

name: Last Gary
summary: it's a refreshing third-person overhead shooting game. four chapters, 10 levels in each chapter, total of 40 levels. various of weapons, enemies, BOSS battles make the level challenging. also have various props, trap mechanism. This game lets you feel refreshing and the achievement of success.

name: La Frana
summary: This is a very simple antigame. I made it to represent a situation very common in real life but absolutely impossible in videogames.

name: Last Explorer
summary: A role-playing game from museo.

name: LabTrainingVR: Biosafety Cabinet Edition
summary: LabTrainingVR: Biosafety Edition course enables learners to apply knowledge and practice setting up and working in a biological safety cabinet (BSC) in a virtual laboratory.

name: Last Minute
summary: You find yourself in a difficult situation, tired of all the city-life and decided that it’s for the best if you move into a camp in the woods with the friend you love the most – Ozzy. What adventures await you?

name: Land of Chark
summary: Text Adventure written by Fergus McNeill and Ian Willis where you travel through the mysterious land of Chark.

name: Last Minute
summary: Last Minute is a first person horrorgame.

name: Lana and the Milking Table
summary: You’ve won a free all day massage! You head to the parlor to find out if it’s legit or not and you meet your beautiful masseuse Lana. You’re about to get the most memorable massage of your life!​

name: Lavrock: Last Fortress
summary: In a world on the brink of destruction, pilot a mech to fight against various factions, battle through random generated levels, strengthen yourself, and uncover the secrets!

name: Laruaville 13
summary: Our Match 3 games are unique! A new Laruaville series game with a new story, a new town and a ton of Match 3 Puzzle levels to play plus bonus games.

name: Ladder Man
summary: Players must use their ladder to traverse levels in this puzzle game from Soleau Software.

name: Laserbreak: Esacpe
summary: A puzzle game from errorsevendev.

name: Land of Puzzles: Elven Princess
summary: In Land of Puzzles: Elven Princess the king and queen need your help. To avoid war the king has accepted a challenge of puzzles to solve. He needs you to solve 15 sets of challenging puzzles and help him secure the kingdom.

name: Last Dream: Complete Edition
summary:
This version includes:

- Last Dream
- Last Dream: World Unknown

name: L.A. Machineguns: Rage of the Machines
summary: In 2025, a militia of androids, who call themselves the "R.O.M." - "Rage Of the Machines", has suddenly materialized in Los Angeles. The androids launch a fierce offensive against the entire West Coast regions and the federal government responds by mobilizing its ace counterterrorist forces "S.I.F.A.T". Against the backdrop of the Pacific coast, a struggle of unparalleled intensity has begun.

name: Ladies
summary: In this classic board game, you will fight a battle against the computer.

name: Laserboy
summary: Help Laserboy escape The Scientist's experimental vision facility without racking up a massive bill. 13 levels of mayhem and confusion in glorious CRT vision.

name: Lamborghini
summary: Lamborghini was a cancelled racing video game that was developed by Rage Software and would have been published by Majesco Entertainment.

name: Last Friend
summary: The Last Friend is a Tower-Defence game enriched with strategic Beat’em-up elements, where players must balance their attack and defence tactics in order to defend their mobile dog shelter

name: L'Abbaye des Morts
summary:
In the 13th century, the Cathars, clerics who preached about the poverty of Christ and defended life without material aspirations, were treated as heretics by the Catholic Church and expelled out of the Languedoc region in France.
