One of them, called Jean Raymond, found an old church in which to hide from crusaders, not knowing that beneath its ruins lay buried an ancient evil.

Faith will be your only weapon in this platformer styled like a ZX Spectrum game. Black backgrounds, 1 color sprites and 1 bit sounds are a proper fit for a raw story. The lack of details turn on the player's imagination, creating a unique experience for each player.

*Look and feel of a ZX Spectrum game
*23 screens to explore
*Riddles and hints to find items
*Around 30 minutes of game length (once fully mastered)

name: Last Flip
summary:
One mission: collect more and more coins.It is a happy and exciting time.
"Last Flip" only needs one tap to control. It is easy to learn, but can you avoid all cars? Or just happy to collect coins and forget watching out... Beautiful sky with cute colors. More animals can be unlocked.

name: Laura Jones and the Secret Legacy of Nikola Tesla
summary: Help young adventurer Laura Jones and her grandmother discover Nikola Tesla's greatest invention! After receiving a mysterious package full of clues from the late Tesla, the hunt is on! Solve puzzles, collect the parts needed to start Tesla's invention, and pass the extraordinary trials.

name: Ladra
summary: Ladra is a stealth action adventure that tests your abilities as the ultimate thief. Find secret passages and tunnels to stay out of sight. Use the shadows, your speed and intelligence to always be one step ahead.

name: Labyrinth
summary: A relaxing labyrinth game.

name: Laf Pak
summary: A compilation of 4 action games of various genres: Creepy Corridors, Mine Sweep, Apple Zap and Space Race.

name: Lasting Moonlight
summary: Lasting moonlight is a walking simulator focused on story and unique minigames. As the narrator is faced with the consequences of his own actions, he reaces out to you, the player, to help him repair what is left. Learn the truth while exploring beautifull locations and game mechanics.

name: Land of the Survivors
summary: Roguelike-style survival game, enhance your character through upgrades. Survive as long as possible and fight against thousands of zombies.

name: Last Half of Darkness: Beyond the Spirit's Eye
Lands of Lorez
summary: A browser-based dungeon crawler that runs in at a 32x32 pixel resolution, made to Lowrezjam 2014.

name: Labyrinth X
summary: Explore a mystic labyrinth filled with strange and sexy creatures.

name: Layers
summary: Layers is a puzzle platformer that has a unique twist. A level is made of up the 2 different layers which can interact with each other in certain ways. Use this interaction to solve the puzzles and get all the characters to the exit doors.

name: Lash: Local Asynchronous Satellite Hookup
summary: A piece of Interactive Fiction written by Paul O'Brian. Is on the list Interactive Fiction Top 50 of all time (2011 edition).

name: LawnMower: Mortal Race
summary: Drive a lawn mower

name: La Introducción
summary: La Introducción is the first game developed by Glottoverse Inc. that revolutionizes language learning and teaches you about 20 vocab words and some basic Spanish for interaction beyond the typical 'Hello' and 'What is your name?

name: LanVodis
summary: LanVodis is an experimental treasure-hunting and overworld navigation game made in RPG Maker 2000.

name: Last Moon
summary:
Last Moon is an online animal role playing game and a custom server of the game Impressive Title.
On Last Moon you can choose between a lot of different species: wolf, lion, bear, bunny and more. Be creative, meet new friends, role play and discover a whole new world.

name: Larry the Unlucky: Part 3
summary: Help Larry find a cure for his wife and break his curse of unluckiness by solving riddles and puzzles on his adventures around the whole world.

name: Laxy Bro
summary: Laxy Bro is a "Flappy Bird" like game, but with Lacrosse graphics and gameplay.

name: Last Flame
summary: Demon slaying top down adventure!

name: Last Ops
summary: Reload your gun, turn on the flashlight and explore the darkest corners of an abandoned research station. Last Ops is a dark twin stick shooter with survival horror elements, framed in stylized low poly graphics. Upgrade your character, get new weapons, use different vehicles and uncover the mystery

name: Laser Lords
summary:
Fasten your star-belts, you're in for a bumpy ride! Aboard the Laser Lords star cruiser, you will explore Argos, a vast military/industrial complex, Woo, the idyllic Taoist garden planet, and Hive, with its famous anti-gravity chambers. Zendo is your mentor. He will guide you to build strength and skills and amass weapons, documents and information. There are seven alien worlds in all - a mind-boggling galaxy of computer graphics, computer and clay animation, and digital sound.

You'll need everything you can muster to vanquish the Star Lord Sarpendon and destroy the Voidal Implosion Engine!

name: Land of Mushrooms: Kawaii Animals - Skin Set
Land of Mushrooms: Co-Op mode - Play with Friends
Land of Mushrooms: The Front Yard - Background
Lavi Quest
summary: Play as Lavi the cat on her quest to knock precious objects from high places.

name: Lauras Tierklinik
summary: Laura loves animals more than anything else and wants to help animals in need. Slip into the role of Laura and help out at the animal hospital!

name: Lair of Goblins
summary: Casual action roguelike.

name: Landlord and the Tenants
summary: In Landlord and the Tenants, you can have a happy ending (Romance Ending or Harem Ending), a neutral ending (Sharing Ending) or a sad ending (NTR Ending) depending on how you play.

name: Land Crashers
summary: Land Crashers is an IOS game released in 2018.

name: Labarynth of Legendary Loot
summary:
Labyrinth of Legendary Loot is a simple turn-based roguelike dungeon crawler focused on tactical combat. Every room is almost like a puzzle as you try to figure out the best way to defeat all enemies without taking too much damage.

You play as an adventurer entering the Labyrinth with nothing but a dull sword. Worry not! Each loot you find will grant you a unique ability that will help you slay monsters and find even more loot!

Descend to the deepest level of the Labyrinth and defeat the evil hideous demon lord to win!

name: Last Fort
summary: Last Fort is a game where you have to capture the enemy forts. Military operations takes place both on water and inside the forts. Ships are protecting approaches to the fort. Maneuver to avoid enemy fire and fire back.

name: Laser Man
summary: One of the games released in the Digital ez LG bundle. It is an unlicensed mod of Bomberman, but goes beyond aesthetic changes, including a new running control (the player taps once in the wanted direction) and removal of the time limit.

name: Landlords & Tax Evasion
summary: Embark on a feudal adventure in Landlords & Tax Evasion! Build your empire, dodge taxes, and conquer your way to prosperity.

name: La Dimensione Interna
summary: La Dimensione Interna (The Dimension Within) is a third person 3D narrative adventure game in which you'll play as Giorgio, a journalist living in a small town in Tuscany, Italy, during his worse moment in life.

name: Lammana: The Looe Island Mystery
summary: Journey to Lammana, through the historic 'found footage' of William H Boston. Explore the cursed island off Cornwall's coast. Retrace the steps of a young man who disappeared in 1924. 'Play through' surviving footage to discover a dark mystery involving treasure, exploration and sea monsters.

name: Land of Screens
summary: When Holland’s social media is lit ablaze by a recent breakup, she embarks on a new mission to ditch the social media saturation and discover some real-world relationships among a Land of Screens.

name: Landmine Larry
summary: Landmine Larry is the challenge you've been waiting for. Clear through crazy levels with twists that make you watch your footing... Landmines, TNT and more!

name: Laser Burst
summary: Laser Burst is a logical puzzle game that requires you to methodically rotate and position double sided mirrors that direct lasers through a maze to pop balloons.

name: Labyrinth Runner
summary: You control a warrior fighting through a labyrinth against spiders and other monsters.

name: Lab2: Under Ground
summary: Lab 2 - Under Ground - is a platform type action game that gathers weapons and items while exploring. Long distance, short distance weapons will be used separately. Raise the level, collect weapons, acquire items and power up your character.

name: Layton 7
summary:
Layton 7 was a multiplayer deduction game released exclusively for mobile devices in Japan.

In June of 2018, Layton 7's official website went offline indefinitely, and the link was removed from the franchise's Japanese homepage. As of 2022, no supplementary details or updates have been announced, meaning that any form of further development and/or release at this point is highly unlikely. Whether or not the game was eventually scrapped has never been confirmed either, although the lack of news for almost seven years, sudden shutdown of the website, and removal from the main Layton site implies it very well could have been.

name: Late Night at the KWL
summary:
Years ago, I worked for a radio station. The KWL.

Strange place.
It didn't run any songs, or interviews, or news. Just stories. Any genre. Any length. So long as it was original.
I was one of the two people in charge of writing them.

We worked nights to have everything ready for the morning recording.

I still remember the night I decided to quit.

name: Lake Road
summary: Lake Road is a simple addicting hyper-casual game that anyone can play.

name: LaserReimu
summary:
LaserReimu is a vertically scrolling shooter developed by voidProc, where the player controls Reimu Hakurei in her journey to restore Marisa's magic tool.

Reimu has two primary weapons: a three-way ofuda shot that spreads all over the screen, and secondary laser, where both can be executed at once or separately in two different formations: focused or unfocused.

The game also provides 55 achievements which can be unlocked when the player fulfills certain conditions.

name: Laser Droplets
summary: Laser Droplets is a mixture of shoot ‘em up, bullet-hell, arcade styled, 2D game. It consists of 16 mini stages, each with a unique stage boss.

name: Laser Arena Online
summary: Laser Arena Online is a VR FPS. Each player has two laser cannons which are used to shoot the enemies and to move around. Improve your movement skills and become a pro player.

name: Last Days of Old Earth
summary: Last Days of Old Earth is a rich strategy game set in our far, far future where the sun is dying. Can you command the last noble tribes of humanity as they attempt to survive among the machines and marauding clans?

name: La Leyenda del Chupacabra
summary: As the legendary goat-sucker, avoid detection and feast upon your prey.

name: Laser War
summary:
The players are in the Battle Control Central at the heart of the United Planets Interstellar Galactic Empire. From there, they monitor the activity of the twin solar systems of Terien and Lorien, forty-three billion light years away. Their mission is to control to protect the planets of those solar systems from the invasion fleet with the remote controlled battle cruisers.

They'll control their ships with the joystick and fire lasers with the action button. The invasion fleet will shoot the players and the planets as well. Shot planets will have their colors changed and will be conquered when their colors match the invaders ship's colors.

If the players' ship is destroyed, a new one will be launched from one of the planets with their color. If there's no planet with their color, they'll have to wait until a planet's color change to theirs.

If the players crash into planets with a color different than theirs, both the ship and the planet will be destroyed. Destroyed planets won't come back, but the central planet at each orbit is indestructible. Players can also hide their ships in their own planets, by landing on them. Planets with ships landed will blink.

The winner is the player who first destroys ten enemy ships.

name: Laserstrike
summary: Laserstrike is a single-player, shareware, puzzle game. The object of the game is to fire a laser at a target and hit it twice to complete a level. Lasers can only travel in straight lines and so the player must use lasers and other canons to move blocks and mirrors in order to achieve the task. The full version of the game has twenty two puzzles and seven coaching or tutorial puzzles.

name: Layer Hunt
summary: Layer Hunt is a survival sandbox and dungeon game where the goal is to survive and hunt down all the bosses. To reach your goal you will have to mine, craft, build, farm, fight and explore for new abilities and resources.

name: Lapya
summary: In a ruined world where people and robots have retreated to the underground, Lapya has a mission - to keep their sun shining.

name: Layup Legends
summary: The basket-brawler for up to 4 players! Use your skills to outplay your opponents on a variety of stages. Unleash powerful super moves to destroy your enemies and become a Layup Legend. Play with your friends or CPUs in 1v1 and 2v2 matches locally or online.

name: Lazers Hurt
summary: Want to build and explore levels full of harmful lasers? Lazers Hurt is perfect for you and on its way to prove that yes, lasers do indeed hurt.

name: Laundromat Simulator
summary: Furnish, Manage, and Maintain multiple stores in Laundromat Simulator! Collect and Count your hard-earned pennies and improve your stores to keep customers happy and maximize your profits. Expand your business, improve customer experience, and make your laundromat the best in town!

name: Lab 77
summary: The game you will love to make your friends play. In Lab 77 you play as Specimen S539-77, making your way through the challenges of Lab 77's test chambers under the supervision of the Director. Place versions of yourself to bridge gaps, collect lab notes, avoid dangers and complete your training.

name: Landlady: The Lions Roar
summary: You are a kung fu master in Pig Sty Alley, use your voice to defect the enemy.

name: Lacerta
summary: Do you want to open your third eye?

name: Ladies of Sorrow: Night One
summary: Help Angela survive "night one" at her new home!

name: Labyrneath II
summary: It's one thing to find the Fountain of Youth--it's another to get out with any of it. Navigate 15 new levels of traps, obstacles, and enemies on your way out of the jungle.

name: Labyrinth of Zangetsu: Mind=.0 Collaboration - Additional Characters Pack
summary:
Atmospheric turn-based dungeon crawler with Japanese yokai folklore reimagined!
Mind=.0 characters entering the world of Labyrinth of Zangetsu.
This DLC will add 8 characters as playable characters to Labyrinth of Zangetsu from "Mind=.0".

name: LandFormer
summary:
LandFormer: A World-Changing Puzzle Game
Raise and lower terrain to solve puzzles in this unique and challenging game.

name: Labyrinth of Zangetsu: Akiba's Beat Collaboration - Additional Characters Pack
summary:
Atmospheric turn-based dungeon crawler with Japanese yokai folklore reimagined!
Akiba's Beat characters entering the world of Labyrinth of Zangetsu.
This DLC will add 8 characters as playable characters to Labyrinth of Zangetsu from "Akiba's Beat".

name: Labyrinth of Zangetsu: Adventure Academia - The Fractured Continent Collab: Additional Characters Pack
summary:
Atmospheric turn-based dungeon crawler with Japanese yokai folklore reimagined!
Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent characters entering the world of Labyrinth of Zangetsu.
This DLC will add 8 characters as playable characters to Labyrinth of Zangetsu from "Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent".

name: Late Stage Inferno
summary: Hunt down those responsible for destroying your home. Sneak through ships and kill everyone on board. Climb the ranks until you find reach the top, then take it out. Play out the short story of this alien stuck in a capitalist hell as they take on 8 unique ships.

name: Layla
summary: Teenage special forces operative Layla must rescue her girlfriend Iris from Dr. Manitoka, while exploring asteroids.

name: Land of Tales
summary: Land of Tales is an atmospheric 3D platformer with typing mechanics in which you play as Kya, a young girl who is teleported to a world where story books are scattered throughout. As Kya explores and progresses through the world, she will discover the reason for her presence there.

name: Lantern Light VR
summary: Lantern Light is a relaxing archery dungeon game. Discover enchanting worlds inside the dungeon. The dungeon is Large and you'll need to explore in order to find a way out. Master difficult puzzles. Each room gets more difficult and presents new challenges.

name: Lab Cat Escape
summary: Get ready for an action-packed adventure in "Lab Cat Escape," an exhilarating endless runner game. Guide a clever lab cat through a perilous laboratory, using gravity-switching abilities to dodge obstacles and achieve high scores. Run and switch gravity in this addictive, fast-paced runner!

name: Land of Borealia
summary: Jump, leap, glide, and build as you take on the threat of the Dark Dragon in this innovative combo of 3D puzzle platformer and tower defense. Traverse the mythical Land of Borealia, complete puzzles, and play minigames to grow your arsenal against the Dragon’s minions!

name: LandR
summary: A challenging puzzle platformer with an unconventional control scheme

name: Lantern of Worlds
summary:
Lantern of Worlds is a game of storytelling and adventure based on Arabian mythology and the tales of 1001 Nights.
It is inspired by older games like the Quest for Glory series, Eye of the Beholder and Lands of Lore.

name: Lawless Lands: Herding Hound
summary: The Herding Hound DLC for Lawless Lands unlocks the exclusive Sagerovian Herding Hound Pet Compantion to join your company and follow you on each of your adventures!

name: Lawnmower Game: Battle
summary: New part for Epic lawnmower game series. Now collect different weapons and destroy evil enemy ai lawnmowers in different arenas

name: Lamplighter
summary: It’s 1807 and you are a lamplighter, responsible for keeping the street lights of London lit. Lamplighter is a story-driven puzzle game, set amidst the magical early 1800s when gas street lamps began to turn night into day and provoke people's imaginations, hopes, and fears.

name: Last Shelter: Survival
summary: Last Shelter: Survival is a massively multiplayer, real-time strategy war game set in a post-apocalyptic world overrun by zombies. Players step into the role of a settlement leader, tasked with building and managing their own empire in the wasteland. Train troops, recruit legendary heroes, and forge alliances as you navigate the never-ending conflict, even as humanity teeters on the brink of extinction. Will you choose diplomacy or aggression? The decision is yours to make.

name: Last Blood
summary: Last Blood is a pixel-style 2D horizontal shooting game. The story takes place on the eastern front of World War II, the Korean War, and the Vietnam War, with elements of survival and horror. Take up weapons, strengthen defenses, fight evil invaders, collect survival materials and make items;

name: Lands of Languages
summary:
Lands of Languages (LoL) is a hobby project developed with the objective of learning language vocabulary in a fun way. Learning requires repetition, which is often boring. So here the repetition is embedded within the grinding tasks of a role-playing game, and the development is heavily focused on gameplay.

In LoL you explore a procedurally generated world inhabited by different beings, which you can capture and train in battles. These battles are the core gameplay, and your battle success depends on solving translation challenges. As your beings level up, you gradually encounter harder challenges and can explore new areas of the world.

name: Lazarus Trials: Trial 101
summary: A single player first person sci-fi puzzle platformer, that will teach the basics of playing video games. Trial 101 focuses on navigation through a 3D environment, coordination of movement with camera direction and some logic puzzles to get those neurons firing!

name: Last Kings
summary: Unreal, Hero MMO Strategy Game

name: Last in Orbit
summary: Last in Orbit is a Horror game with a focus on surviving a A.I. gone Crazy. Your the first to arrive on a new space station meant for human living but in the preparations ahead you found out that the A.I.

name: La Ultima Comida
summary: Zombies are everywhere and have been determined to make you their LAST FOOD. There are so many that you don't know if the slow steps and moans you hear come from the end of the hall or from the next corner.

name: L'Abbaye des Morts
summary: L’Abbaye des Morts is a game originally created by Locomalito and Gryzor87 and released in September 2010. More than 10 years later, the game has finally been ported to the NES/Famicom by Parisoft Games.

name: La Culture Generale pour les Nuls
summary: An edutainment game for the Nintendo DS.

name: Last Bus Home
summary: A short horror game where you find yourself approaching a bus stop; it is late at night and the next bus to arrive is also the last one for today, and you do not want to miss it.

name: Last Dream Fishing Arcade
summary: Fish your way across lush Gaia in this retro 2D pixel-art fishing RPG. Enjoy a relaxing day or battle for your fishing life against monsters of the deep. With 12 selectable characters, varying difficulty, equipment options, and numerous surprises, you’ll be hooked on this buried treasure of a game!

name: Laruaville 10
summary: Merlin, the mightiest wizard of antiquity, has awoke and built himself a castle. Unfortunately, ancient castles were poorly designed with high humidity, dark corridors and drafty rooms! Merlin is smart however, and he has stolen the Sun and placed it in the castle for him to enjoy alone! But what about the rest of us? Maybe a friend from Merlin’s past can convince him to return the Sun to its rightful place.

name: Laseronium: The Beam Focus
summary: Laseronium: The Beam Focus is an arcade puzzle game that tests your abstract thinking and your conceptualization. Your goal in every level is to imagine a straight line that bounces of the edges of objects causing reflection.

name: Lands of Yocta
summary: It's a Pico-8 walking simulator

name: Laserbirds
summary: Laserbirds is a shoot'em up about toxic alien birds named Ornithoids that threaten the earth and it's up to you, mankind's last line of defense, to take them down.

name: Last Knight
summary: Stop all other knights and be the only one for the Princess.

name: La Aventura De Axel
summary:
this fantastic and spectacula adventure, Get on the skin of Axel, a young man who by strange and mysterious circumstances lost his sister and took a long and incredible way to try to rescue her. 
In a journey full of magic and strange creatures you will have to help achieve your goal.

name: LaborSurviveManual
summary: 2D pixel TPS game, Through the keyboard control move and attack, Defeat the enemy gain experience to upgrade and strengthen weapons to live as much as possible.

name: Language Worm
summary: Learn foreign language vocabulary while playing an arcade game. Supports Spanish, French, German, and Latin vocabulary. Study anywhere from the most common fifty words up to the most common one thousand words.

name: Lawbringer
summary: Lawbringer is a fast-paced arena fighting roguelite. Hack, slash and shoot your way through enemy hordes to appease the Autarch. The faster you slay your enemies, the greater His favor. Pick up game changing skills and a variety of weapons. Kill fast, grow strong and cheat death.

name: Lawnmower Game: Ufo Chase
summary: Lawnmower Game series is back. Now enemy UFO with several weapons are chasing Lawnmower guy. Cut enough grass and earn stars to unlock new levels and avoid UFO

name: Labyrinth of Rage
summary: Enter the Labyrinth... at your own demise.

name: Lala Hentai
summary: Great relaxing hentai style puzzle game. Cute and beautiful anime girls for every taste. Great musical accompaniment and juicy drawings ‍♀️

name: Late Photographer 6
summary: A short love story

name: Lay of the Land
summary: Lay of the Land is a sandbox adventure game set in a fantasy world where everything is physically simulated. Use the environment to your advantage and Explore, Fight, Loot and Build your way through mysterious lands.

name: Last Hopeless
summary: Killis hundreds of zombie and get new reinforcement items for survivng. choose your best item set and upgrade them to get hidden skill. Last Hopeless is a rogue-like game with a light physics feed back, you can play with gun, hammer, kitchen knife and other hundreds of items to survival longer.

name: Lacrosse Dodge
summary: Dodge through defenders and crazy obstacles as the Lacrosse players rack up points the further they can make it. Score bonus points by picking up speed bursts, sniping goals and collecting coins.

name: Laser Ball
summary: In this fast and furious action retro game, you'll need to race against time and use a laser gun to neutralize deadly bouncing balls to make them safe to handle, then try to maneuver between bouncing deadly balls to collect the safe ball to deposit it out of harms way!

name: Lands 101
summary: A small game in which players can explore and interact with six scenes.

name: Laguna Racer
summary: An arcade racing game from Midway.

name: Land War
summary: Local 8 player strategy! Expand your territory and be the last square standing! Simple controls for casual friends and deep strategy for gamers.

name: Labyrinth Flowers
summary: Etched in your memory, only a riddle remains. You, a budding adventurer, arrive in town to conquer this dungeon. The local adventurers’ guild wastes no time in evaluating your skills, then offers you a tantalizing proposal...!

name: Laid-Back Camp: Have a nice day!
summary: The first smartphone game with all the elements of the TV anime "Laid-Back Camp" is finally here! Familiar characters such as Nadeshiko Kagamihara, Rin Shima, Chiaki Ōgaki, Aoi Inuyama, and Ena Saitō engage in rich dialogue with motion and full voice acting, as well as over 1,000 camping gear and vehicles, delicious-looking camp meals, and beautiful scenery from Yamanashi, Nagano, and Shizuoka, among other locations. More elements from the TV anime 'Laid-Back Camp' are expected to be appeared soon!

name: Laser Z
summary: Step into an 80's VaporWave inspired VR world where the goal is destroy the cubes and stay alive. Wield the laser to destroy the cubes. Easy to learn but hard to master. Laser Z pumps up the volume with it's retro 80s original soundtrack.

name: Lady Gaga Revenge 2
summary: The sequel to Lady Gaga Revenge. Features even more Lady Gaga songs.

name: Labyrinth of Wild Abyss: LayeRedux
summary: A horror game about paranoia and endurance predation. You cannot beat the monsters, you can only outrun. They are slow, they aren't smart, but they are patient, they are many, and they are powerful.

name: Lawn Invaders
summary:
The year is 2075, join everybody's favourite millennial gaming grandpa as he fends off creatures he hallucinates after doing nothing but play games his entire life.

LawnInvaders is an arcade shooter where the player must defend the lawn from a variety of falling enemies, these enemies slowly break apart the ground making it more difficult to defend.

name: Last Mortem
summary: Multiplayer FPS Game in the style of old-school browser shooters set up in the fictional Cold War battlefields! The game feature fast-paced FPS gameplay with online players or AI BOTs, a huge variety of weapons, unique maps, the progression system, and many more features!

name: Laser Squad Nemesis
summary: A turn-based strategy game, and sequel to the original 1988 Laser Squad.

name: Labyrinths of the World: Changing the Past - Collector's Edition
summary:
From Domini Games, the studio that brought you the Mystery Tales series, comes another Labyrinths of the World game! 
 
The past isn’t set in stone. Now’s your chance to change it! This time, you’re tracking down a fellow agent who seems to have gone rogue to save his beloved. But does his quest for these powerful relics mask a more insidious plot? Find out in this hidden-object puzzle adventure game full of twists and turns! Play morphing, listed, and interactive HOPs, Match-3 games, and more! 
Travel to the distant future in the bonus game. 
Three-different types of collectibles to find! 
Take a personality quiz to see which historic era you belong to! 
Earn achievements and enjoy the soundtrack, wallpapers, and more. 
Replay your favorite mini-games and HOPs.

name: Lacrosse Arcade
summary: Lacrosse Arcade 2014 is a simulation of the sport Lacrosse created by former professional Lacrosse player: Carlo Sunseri.

name: Lannath
summary: Lannath is a Horror-RPG where you accumulate insanity and watch the world plunge into madness. Generate randomized worlds with customizable features to create a totally unique experience each time you play.

name: Late Photographer 3
summary: This is a game of drawing cards and collecting cards.

name: Lands of Peace: Legends - Chapter 1
summary: Lands Of Peace: Legends is a 3D anime, hentai, adventure, adult game with sexual contents. Myths, Legends, Monsters about a place? Does it really exist? Is it really peaceful? After much research, you have arrived to the secret Lands of Peace...adventures await you!

name: Lands of Hope Redemption
summary: Lands of Hope Redemption is a massive 2D RPG with MMORPG elements, play with hundreds and even thousands of your friends OR simply play as a lone wolf. At the start of the game you are free to choose one of our template classes or build your own class and be unique!

name: Lazarus Doom
summary: Lazarus Mod 3 is a is a solo/multiplayer complete modification with Doom 4 weapons, monsters, sounds, sprites, hud style and aesthetics of Doom 2016 for Doom I & Doom II. Lazarus is a redesign of the weapon sprites created by Necronixis but using part of the original artwork created by Id & Betsheda for Doom4.

name: Ladder Box
summary: Ladder Box is a 3D puzzle game. Navigate boxes with mesmerizing mechanics, utilize the unmovable boxes to make one of the moving ones reaches the only exit!

name: Laps Fuse: Puzzle with Numbers
summary: Fuse your tiles together and play for hours with addicting puzzle mechanics in Laps!

name: Lady in tomb: Beneath the ocean
summary: A first-person adventure game. The Story continues from Lady in Tomb. Gu Jiuxun became the new Gulady. But since then, she has stepped into the curse of "die before 30 years old". In order to save her, Hu Nian determined to find the immortal medicine in the undersea tomb where Xu Fu is buried.

name: Last Joy
summary: Hand painted RPG exploring social repercussions of immortality through a deep story with puzzles and unique Match3 combat system.

name: Lawless Lands: Blood Pit
summary: The Blood Pit DLC for Lawless Lands adds a fighting arena where you can fight against foes in high-stake battles to the death!

name: Lanescape
summary: Lanescape takes the classic and familiar shifting (sliding) puzzlers into the next level with an interesting twist.

name: Last Meow Standing
summary: This lightning fast arena shooter brings you right back to the highscore hunts of the arcade era. Use your arsenal of deadly weapons wisely against the increasingly ferocious monster hordes to survive as long as you can.

name: La Vie La Rue
summary: Cartoonish 2d game made by two brothers. Unique art all around these wonderful locations. Try and go to the furthest possible to beat your highscore and maybe be the first one to reach the end.

name: Labyrinthia Nightmares: The Journey of Little Fluffypuff
summary: Unleash your courage in this epic adventure. Explore, solve, conquer the labyrinth's challenges.

name: Layers of Fear: Solitude
summary:
Layers of Fear: Solitude brings the psychedelic horror experience of the fan-favorite franchise, Layers of Fear, to Daydream.

Completely redesigned for an optimal VR experience, the player takes on the first person perspective of a psychologically disturbed painter trying to complete his magnum opus while battling ghastly visions and a crumbling psyche. To add to his growing madness, each fully immersive VR room in the Victorian Mansion constantly changes and uncovers new horrors and torturous secrets. Do you dare to delve into the unsettling insanity to finish the masterpiece he has strived so long to create?

Features:

Psychedelic horror – A sense of insanity means each turn of your head may completely change the look of your surroundings.

Victorian setting – Explore a beautifully detailed game world inspired by masterpiece paintings, architecture and décor from the 19th century.

Original and classic art – Numerous pieces of original art and music envelope your senses; sending you deep into a dark environment fraught with unyielding madness.

Story-focused exploration – Only through exploring the environment can you uncover the haunting details of the painter’s tragic past.

name: La Sfida Della Sfinge
summary: This is a collection of puzzles and crosswords made by Aenigmatica, a brand of La Settimana Enigmistica, one of the first and most important magazines in Italy. This game takes place in ancient egypt inside a pyramid. The player has to solve some crosswords and puzzles to advance to the next level.

name: Last Chance to Green
summary: Made for Ludum Dare 34. A game about gardening, old slow computers and radioactive caterpillars.

name: Lathe Safety Simulator
summary: Play Lathe Safety Simulator and learn how to operate an industrial lathe. Follow the tutorials, identify all the major lathe parts and turn a work piece.

name: Labyrinth
summary:
Dive into the depths of the ancient Labyrinth, a captivating first-person roguelike dungeon crawler that artfully blends classic RPG elements with innovative gameplay on the Playdate.

Design your character and embark on a perilous quest filled with mystery, danger, and untold treasures. Explore winding corridors, engage in strategic turn-based battles, and plunder loot from the labyrinthine depths.

Are you ready to test your skills and uncover the secrets of the Labyrinth? Prepare for an endless adventure!

name: Last Soldier
summary: The mission was a complete failure, you are the only survivor. You are trapped in a secret area where huge spiders inhabit. Now your goal is to stay alive.

name: Last Striker
summary: A cute cartoonish soccer game.

name: Labyrinth
summary: Labyrinth was a Flash game that was playable on the McDonald's Pakistan website in 2010. No details about the gameplay exist, however it is assumed from the existing image that it was a maze game.

name: LavaLoop
summary: LavaLoop is a music-driven shoot'em up, in a hand-drawn Steampunk universe. Face a mad queen and destroy the planet killing machine. Play as three musician fighters and jump from surprise to surprise in this unique fantasy universe.

name: Labyrinth: Immortal Oblivion
summary: Labyrinth: Immortal Oblivion is a singleplayer, story-driven, dante inspired, horror adventure. You'll explore a 3D Horror Maze where you'll solve puzzles and fight powerful monsters to uncover its sinister past. Escape before you too are consumed by this twisted place...

name: Labirinto 2
summary: Labirinto this is a simple game in which you need to get square to the other end of the maze.

name: Labyrinths of Atlantis
summary: Labyrinths of Atlantis will give you the opportunity to test your intuition.

name: LanguageGuessr
summary: Browser based language guessing game in which players guess off audio clips.

name: Land of Chaos Online
summary: Land of Chaos Online was a Massively Multiplayer Online Real-Time Strategy Game developed by Danal Entertainment. It combined elements of action, RPG, and strategy, featuring third-person combat and a roster of characters with distinct abilities and roles.

name: Last Memories
summary: Dark short story about a girl who went travel with her father. This a point & click adventure that includes a deep plot with several endings.

name: Last Bullet
summary: Last Bullet is a Nintendo DS adventure title published by FuRyu (as the first game of the company since its foundation in 2007) that puts players in the role of a young female sniper, Karin Hibiki.

name: Langrisser Millennium WS: The Last Century
summary: Langrisser Millennium WS: The Last Century is a Strategy game, developed and published by Bandai, which was released in Japan in 2000.

name: Last Emperor
summary: Lead a waning Empire back to its former glory in this fictional Cold War text-based RPG. As emperor, choose who to trust and who to silence. Adapt to changing times or cling to tradition. Enact reforms to revive the economy, enforce law and order, and reinforce the Empire’s place under the Sun.

name: Last Night in Tokyo
summary: Last Night in Tokyo is a short kinetic visual novel based on real life LGBTQIA+ events and establishments in Tokyo, Japan. From the eyes of a tourist on her last day in the city, you'll get to experience a small taste of what the Japanese queer scene has to offer. We hope that you'll enjoy the story and that you'll also find that it scratches your interests to learn even more about its topics.

name: Laruaville 2
summary: The moon has fallen from the sky and it needs to be fixed! To fix the moon, you need a Scientist and a Manager. And, of course, a big town to build and lots of Match 3 skills. This game includes Match 3 levels as well as some Mahjongs and Solitaires and a cool story.

name: Labyrinth Life: Limited Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following
Game: Omega Labyrinth Life
Collector's Box
3D Mousepad
Metal Case Futurepack
Alternative Art Cover
OST CD
Limited DLC: 7 Kinds of Weapon

name: Lab Remnants
summary: Lab Remnants is a monochromatic roguelike full of secrets and challenges. Play as an artificially made creature and make your way through your own creators to escape from their crazy experiments.

name: Labyrinthian: Lost 'til Dawn
summary: 'Labyrinthian: Lost 'til Dawn' is a horror maze/puzzle game where the player advances deeper into the maze-like forest to maintain survival, trying to last until day. This game uses mouse and keyboard controls (WASD), with other keys gaining functionality as the game progresses.

name: Last Hour
summary: Fight in multiplayer on small maps in a team of up to 6 players against other teams for victory in the infamous Team Deathmatch mode or use the shooting range to test your skills. Uses a selection of different modern weapons and equipment.

name: Lady Luck 750 Plus Slots Jackpot Gold
Last Lovers
summary: This is a visual novel about the doomsday zombie.This work is a multi line and multi ending eschatological love song and a visual novel of all age love.

name: Lama by Reiner Knizia
summary:
Finally, the "casual" card game with cult factor is now also playable as an app.
Every llama knows the most important rule of all: Discard all minus points!
Get rid of your cards so as not to collect any chips. Do you fold, or do you hope to draw a suitable card? Decide! At the end, the winner is the one who could most casually avoid the minus points.

name: Lamp and Vamp
summary:
Lamp and Vamp is a roguelike game where you play as a Vampire seeking the castle of his dreams.
Your Vampire is alone against the world! You will need to master the dark arts to find your way to the tomb in each level, where you will acquire new powers.

name: Late photographer 2
summary: This is a clothing matching simulator. There are five female characters in the game. Players can match various shapes by choosing different clothes.

name: Last of Humanity
summary: Welcome to Last of Humanity, an online open-world sandbox multiplayer zombie survival game. Travel the zombie wasteland as you attempt to rebuild society controlling key locations to manufacture & produce equipment for survival. Forage, Craft and shoot your way to survival from the dead and living.

name: Laden vs. USA
summary: Poor taste game developed to cash in on the 9/11 attacks.

name: Lake Facade: Director's Cut
summary: Explore, Fish and discover the mysteries hidden within Lake Facade. A short narrative puzzle/adventure game with multiple endings and secrets to find.

name: Land, Sea and Air!
summary: Compilation of three games from MicroProse. Different types of PCs (i.e. DOS or IBM) had different games packaged in the compilation.

name: Lakeview Cabin
summary: Murder RPG set in the shady town of Lakeview Valley. See how you'll do as a new home owner in the Valley, where everyone seems to have a secret. Become the toast of the town or succumb to your dark desires. The choice is yours. But however you choose to play, beware... There is something evil lurking beneath the surface...

name: Last Chance in Xollywood: Special Edition
summary: This content requires the base game Last Chance in Xollywood on Steam in order to play.

name: La Tale: Devil's garden - Rosengarten
summary: Enter the magical world of La Tale, the beautiful 2D side-scrolling fantasy MMORPG. Choose from 10 distinct Classes, over 50 potential Job Specialties, and hundreds of unique weapons, pets and gear to create your own Hero of legend. Tell your tale today!

name: Lanky Larry
summary: A platform game, where you play as a pirate stuck in a barrel, armed with a grappling hook.

name: Lawnmower Game: Space Fight
summary: Epic Lawnmower game series continue now at space. Now you control super powered lawnmower space ship and fight against enemies at different space levels.

name: Lazer Cops
summary: Lazer Cops is a retro bullet hell for up to four buddy cops. Grab your favourite buddies and sit down on the couch for some quality cooperative game-play or play alone and test your multi-tasking.

name: Last Minute Love
summary: In this Adventure Dating Sim you play an old person who doesn't want to die alone. Romance any of the 4 residents or the nurse. Bring them items they've lost or help them with their troubles. Will you be able to find Love?

name: Labyrinth Legend II
summary: A dungeon exploration action RPG with exhilarating combat, collect various equipment, and take on giant bosses!

name: Laundry Service Simulator
summary: Turn your place from a tiny laundromat into a big laundry service center! You will need to buy new machines, deliver orders fast, upgrade your equipment and keep everything clean to avoid going bankrupt. Laundry design, employees, deep dry clean and security are coming up.

name: Layer Up
summary: Arrange layers to reveal the hidden image. Merge colors and match shapes in this extraordinary art puzzle using a unique "stained glass" gameplay. Simple and intuitive controls. Collect all the beautiful art for your Layer Up Art Gallery by completing levels.

name: Language Adventure
summary: A stop motion animated language learning adventure game. Aliens have crash landed in your back garden and you must help them return home. Go on an adventure in a handmade town full of colourful characters and learn a new language on the way!

name: Lady Master of Kung Fu
summary: A sidescrolling action game by Taito, released to arcades in 1985. Unusual in that the player character was female.

name: Latish Destroyer
summary:
Latish Destroyer is the game where you dynamically and fast destroy the corporation of one man - Latish.
You will meet multiple enemy types, which Latish's laboratories made especially to kill you, The Destroyer.
This game consists of 6 levels, where you have to complete the objective of it. Simply run through level destroying enemies and do some little activities. You are playing as a cool Dota 2 player named Roman.

name: Late For Class: Variety King
summary: Use 9 different movement mechanics to overcome challenges on your way to school. Late for Class is a tribute to games that test your skills and dedication to the max. Expect lots of falling and getting back up!

name: Land it Rocket
summary: In this game your goal is to land your rocket safely, but watch out the world is full of danger like mines, lasers and turrets.

name: Lacrimal Eye
summary: This game plunges you into an epic tower defense campaign

name: Lansquenet
summary: Lansquenet is a bootleg of Shock Troopers 2 manufactured by Saurus for Arcades.

name: Lady Killers
summary: You play as a futuristic ninja girl named Ashe who joins a female mercenary group called Lady Killers. In this game you'll be fighting robots, monsters, and other PMC groups as you progress through missions and fight powerful enemies.

name: Last One Standing
summary:
Chase your opponents and knock down their dominoes - be the Last One Standing!

Local multiplayer dueling dominoes for 2-6 players

name: Law Empire Tycoon
summary: Lawyers, Judges, Criminals and Verdicts. Lead an elite law firm and win cases.

name: Laser Lightshow
summary: A board manipulation laser-bouncing puzzle game, featuring a level editor, pack editor, and hundreds of handcrafted levels!

name: Laser Quest
summary: Rotate pieces, explore different perspectives, and manipulate unique objects to establish a clear laser-beam connection and illuminate the sacred gems.

name: Land of Ramchin: Between Dimensions
summary: Land of Ramchin is an Action RPG adventure game where players will play as Vico to explore the fantastic open world of the vast land of Ramchin, travel between dimensions and seek the origin of the world.

name: LastShot
summary: Last Shot - A fast platformer shooter where you can jump, smash, blow up enemies with your own bombs.

name: Land of Warfare: Battle Maps
summary: Land of Warfare is a skirmish map war strategy game. You will need to plan a strategy to build and defend your base from enemy attacks, collect resources to booster your regiment and then defeat your enemies by infiltrating their base. No missions, no unlocks, just load and play.

name: Last Souls
summary: With its labyrinthine level-design and its souls-like gameplay, Last souls is a game where exploration and fighting are omnipresent. Last souls is a mix between Metroidvania and Souls-like.

name: Lawnmower Game: Space Race
summary: Lawnmowers are back, now at space race. Drive these super fast hovering lawnmowers race at different space tracks. 16 different tracks, with different skilled ai lawnmower racers.

name: La Statuette maudite de l'oncle Ernest
summary: You and Chipikan embark again on an adventurous journey through Asia in order to find a secret formula that is needed to save Chipikans people. Together you will unveil the mysterious discoveries of the great adventurer Uncle Albert by solving many riddles and overcoming obstacles with courage, dexterity and logic thinking. You will do this by navigating through Uncle Alberts Notebook where every new page yields a new surprise.

name: Labyrinthian Lockdown
summary: Klondor is in grave danger of being overwhelmed, enter the Labyrinth, prepare your defences, defend your Mana Crystal and annihilate the incoming waves of enemy forces that pose a threat to the Kingdom.

name: Lakatos
summary: Lakatos is an open-world RPG fantasy game focused on magical quests. Explore a beautifully crafted world filled with diverse characters, challenging combat, and rewarding crafting systems. Take on quests both big and small as you unravel a grand adventure in a world filled with wonder and danger.

name: Last Mage Standing
summary:
In Last Mage Standing you are a young mage, standing alone against a horde of undead.
Your goal is to survive as long as possible - use your fireballs and weapons to defeat the attackers!

name: Laxius Power
summary: Laxius Power is the first game of a popular trilogy of freeware roleplaying games released from 2001 to 2004. The trilogy focuses on the beginning of a long journey experienced by Random Pendragon, his girlfriend Sarah Brandolino and his best friend Luciana Vicenti, including many more characters.

name: Lalaloopsy: Carnival of Friends
summary: Peanut Big Top is throwing the biggest Silly Funhouse carnival in Lalaloopsy Land for all to enjoy, including a special treat at the end! It's up to you to find all of the Lalaloopsy friends at the carnival to reveal the BIG surprise!

name: Labyrinth of the Witch
summary: A simple dungeon exploration RPG that anyone can play! Strategically use a multitude of items to tackle ever-changing dungeons.

name: Last Man
summary: Become the Last Man on his quest to retrieve the Jade Monkey for Master. Just shoot everything that moves while sidescrolling to the right with up to 3 friends! Face endless waves of enemies that can traverse the map more or less like you do.

name: Lamp of Aladdin
summary: Aladdin has many adventures but he must find the magic lamp before all to proceed and beat the evil. He starts up in a strange place and he needs your help to find the items. Find the useful items to help him on his exciting adventure.

name: Lavender
summary: An alternate take on the classic fairytale of Rapunzel in the form of a puzzle game with horror elements.

name: Lanayxy's Landscapes
summary: A fast paced kaizo level with 7 extremely precise stars and lots of innovative and unique ideas!

name: Lamplight City mobile
summary: Can private investigator Miles Fordham find justice for his clients and track down his partner's killer before his entire world comes apart?

name: Lava Pool
summary: Lava Pool is FPS arcade. The game consists of levels, each level is a small location (room), where you need to find an exit.

name: Last Fortress: Underground
summary:
Castle, the largest community of survivors, has fallen.

Once a beacon of hope in the post-apocalypse, it now shares the same fate as the rest. Amidst the chaos, a small group of survivors managed to escape into the barren wilderness.

You are the Commander of these survivors. While escaping the zombie horde that utterly destroyed your last sanctuary, you come across a strange building jutting out from the ground. Low on supplies and left with little options, you decide to take refuge in this building. So begins your campaign of survival in this zombie-infested world.

name: Lay
summary: Immerse yourself in this adventure of poetic and contemplative exploration as Elise, a young explorer full of energy. This mysterious world awaits you to overflow with colour and life !

name: Lamp Chronicle
summary: Lamp Chronicle is an 2D platformer game that tells the story of a little hero who travels to save a kingdom in crisis. Defeat enemies against beautiful backgrounds and enjoy exciting battles with bosses.

name: Lara Gates: The Lost Talisman Hidden Object Game
Landslide
summary:
"Landslide - by Cozy Labs" takes you on an exhilarating adventure as Cozy and friends skateboard down the slopes of an erupting volcano! Strap on your skateboard, gather your courage, and prepare for a thrilling endless skater experience like no other.

Dodge obstacles, navigate treacherous paths, and collect shimmering coins as you descend through the volcanic terrain. Watch out for massive rocks that stand in your way – unleash epic power-ups to clear your path! Execute daring tricks and grind on rails to showcase your skills and boost your score to new heights.

name: Land of Dread
summary: Land of Dread is an isometric colony simulator with an emphasis on gathering resources, building resource-generating structures, and fighting hostile demons. Upgrade existing structures, assign jobs to colonists, and invest gold into resource imports.

name: Lara Croft: The Sun Obelisk
summary:
Lara Croft: The Sun Obelisk is a text based game run by ADRIFT (Adventure Development & Runner - Interactive Fiction Toolkit) tool. 
 
The story is about Lara Croft that try to search for the Sun Obelisk. There is an adult and non-adult version. It contains about 31 rooms with 5 to 6 object to take.

name: Landgrabbers
summary: A adventure through the Middle Ages awaits you in the strategy game Landgrabbers. In this thrilling game, you embrace the historic role of a great military commander who is out to rule the entire world. You'll have to fight your way across a variety of locations, each with its own special difficulties, with your mighty army. Are you prepared to go on this thrilling trip, then?

name: Last Anime boy: Saving loli
summary: 2088 year. As it turned out, the future is not that bright. Nazi Muslims came to power. In the world, everything was banned: LGBT community, miniskirts, free parking, and most importantly banned ANIME.

name: Lattice Dancer
summary: Experience the thrill of dodging lasers in this easy-to-learn, casual game. Your goal is simple. Dodge the lattice laser. Sharpen your spatial awareness and concentration skills with each round. Are you ready to dance with danger?

name: Lapis Lazuli
summary: Lapis Lazuli is a Yume Nikki fangame for Dream Diary Jam 8, where you can explore the dreams of a young boy named Yasuo.

name: Lazy Caverns Attack!!
summary: The protagonist of Lazy Caverns takes matters into his own hands by striking out and attacking his enemies this time.

name: Laydock
summary: Two jet fighters go on a mission together, each managed and controlled by a different player. The jets can be docked side-by-side or end-to-end for greater fire and fighting power. When docked one player is the pilot and the other is the weapons officer. The game can also be played by a single player. When you progress in the game you can select more advanced weapon systems to fight the over 50 different enemy characters.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8NGGZr4nxUg

name: Latte Stand Tycoon
summary: Come, join Maya and Mia as they attempt to restore an old family home, and assimilate into the town of Falling Leaves as you learn to mix the perfect latte to fit the ever-changing weather. Can you become a master barista, and change the mood of an ever-gloomy town?

name: Lame & Cheesy
summary: A maze type puzzle game where the player(s) have to navigate two mice (Lame & Cheesy) through a series of obstacles and traps. Both mice are required for solving every puzzle. The game can be played as a co-op, with each player controlling one mouse, or as a single player, where one player control both mice with one controller.

name: Lawnmower Game: Mortal Race
summary: Lawnmower game saga continues. Try to finish different tracks below the target time

name: Laseronium 2
summary: Laseronium 2 is an arcade puzzle game that tests your abstract thinking and your conceptualization. Bring up some knowledge from your physics class and the laser party can begin.

name: Laser Stallion Disco Junkie: One Hit
summary: A free to play game experience structured like an addiction. You can try your best to avoid the substances but once you get “addicted” you have to play this game once every 24 hours. If you miss a day, you can't play it anymore.

name: Last Heroes
summary: Enjoy another classic 16-bit RPG from Warfare Studios of Vagrant Hearts, Ashes of Immortality and Valiant fame, and embark on a quest with Viktor as he makes new friends, experiences dreams, and discovers his destiny.

name: Last Half of Darkness
summary: Last Half of Darkness is a remake of WRF's 1989 game with the same name. It's an horror adventure game in which you explore a mansion and it's surroundings.

name: Lazy Raiders
summary: Spin the maze and avoid traps in this Xbox Live action puzzle game.

name: La Patifferie
summary:
Lead everyone's favorite gig worker Amal as they compete to become the chef's assistant at the notoriously prestigious bakery, La Patifferie.

Go head to head against a motley crew of rascals, scoundrels, and other ne'er-do-wells for the ultimate prize of… having a job. The chef bakes the cookies and you need to pack them. But La Patifferie is known for its meticulously packed sets:

For each set, you need to match 3 or more cookies that share at least 2 traits!

name: Last Stand: Reborn
summary: Last Stand: Reborn (also known as LSR) focuses on the events after the "Project: uxUV" which takes place during the year 2029. LSR takes influence from games such as HL2 and The Hidden and Doom. There are multiple game modes which put in in either 1vX situations or against each other.

name: Lantern of Worlds - The First Quest
summary: Lantern of Worlds - The First Quest is an RPG inspired by West-European fairytales and mythology, and based on older games like Quest for Glory and Eye of the Beholder.

name: Lazy Caverns 2
summary: The sequel to Lazy Caverns has the protagonist gathering marbles.

name: Laser Circle
summary: Laser Circle - A 2D pixel top-down shooter game where you play as a spherical blob that destroys enemies with weapons that become more powerful with each level, while the blob itself also gets stronger.

name: Lamarr Goes to the Zoo
summary: Lamarr Goes to the Zoo (misspelled as "Lamar" on the title screen) is a side-scrolling platform game created by several Valve employees for a 48-hour game jam.

name: Ladybird Reflect
summary: Ladybird Reflect is a Breakout game about a ladybird on a journey to find its lost children and it needs your help to get them back.

name: Larger Than Light
summary: Traverse shadows by manipulating light in this 2.5D puzzle platform game. Escape a haunted school as the sibling duo: Skia, who can move across other shadows on the wall, and Lux, who can manipulate the size and placement of shadows for his younger sister to platform across.

name: Lady in Mystery
summary: Welcome to the detective agency in old Seoul. This visual novel provides unique mystery and lesbian romance. Players can choose which one of 4 female characters will be the closest to the main character, "Heesoo." Some of your choices might lead you to a dark and dangerous path.

name: LA Machine Guns
summary: A sequel to Gunblade NY, LA Machine Guns is a light gun game that casts the player as a machine gunner on an attack helicopter. The game runs on Sega Model 2 arcade hardware.

name: Laptick 2
summary: The sequel to Laptick was an MSX-exclusive.

name: Last Chick
summary: Last Chick is an action game depicting the majestic daily lives of chickens and their families living in a world where humanity has become a zombie.Overcome the crisis in three modes using two egg techniques developed by the parent chicken.

name: Labyrinth: Maou no Meikyuu
summary: An action-adventure game based on the Jim Henson movie Labyrinth, published in Japan in 1987 for the Famicom by Tokuma Shoten.

name: L'Abbaye des Morts
summary: Sega Genesis/Mega Drive homebrew port of L'Abbaye des Morts.

name: Last Flight
summary: Downloadable through the online Wii Shop, Last Flight is an action game in which the player fights through a comically cel-shaded plane full of the undead.

name: Lament of Kyoto: Origins
summary: Lament of Kyoto is an Action Rogue-lite with light horror elements. Fight endless waves of horrifying yokai while exploring the haunted remains of feudal Japan. Recruit unlikely allies, discover secrets and vanquish powerful bosses to upgrade your weapons and abilities.

name: LastRo
summary: LastRo is a top-down shooter roguelike where you play robot, which mission is to clear up a lot of floors against different enemies. Your enemies are "evolving", which means they become stronger with each floor and difficulty you beat. Try out different weapons, abilities and upgrades to beat them.

name: Last Night on Actaeon
summary: Can you survive the night? Your ship has crashed on the dark and hostile planet, Actaeon. You must use a variety of weapons, abilities and choose between game-changing upgrades to survive on a planet full of surprises.

name: Large PonPon
summary:
Our hero's girlfriend, Rurika, suddenly informs him that she is being transferred to Paris. However, after only a few months, she gives up her job and comes home; she is pregnant. Following an extremely hot argument, she leaves him without telling him where she is going.

Our hero goes looking for her and learns that she has checked into an obstetrics ward. Here at the hospital, he accidentally runs into Yukari, an old childhood friend from school. He also starts up a hot relationship with a married woman named Touri, who is staying in the next hospital room. His girlfriend really starts to get jealous of his other playmates. Will he fulfill his obligations to Rurika, or will he keep going after hot, new babes?

It is 0verflow's debut work and most characters belong to the core families of 0verflow's works.

name: Land of Puzzles: Knights
summary: In Land of Puzzles: Knights the king and queen need your help. To avoid war the king has accepted a challenge of puzzles to solve. He needs you to solve 15 sets of challenging puzzles and help him secure the kingdom.

name: Laser Strikers
summary: Compete with your friends or against the IA in this vertiginous 2 vs 2 local cooperative game by scoring goals with the Striker or guarding the goal with the Defender.

name: Latte Stand Tycoon +
summary: Use your barista skills and reflexes to mix the perfect latte and rebuild your family home and cafe to their former glory.

name: La Pucelle: Ragnarok
summary: For the first time in the West you can experience La Pucelle: Ragnarok, now loaded with lots of extra content including new scenarios, new recruits, and DLC characters! It even has new voices, new music, and quick travel, dood!

name: Labyrneath
summary: Explore an ancient temple. Avoid traps and solve puzzles. Claim one of the greatest treasures of all.

name: Larut
summary: A visual novel that retells the story of Nyai Roro Kidul.

name: Last Signal
summary: On a mysterious journey through space, astronaut Adam 'Echo' Winters awakens in an abandoned station with amnesia. He must unravel the dark secrets of the station, where reality and illusion are intertwined. In the Last Signal, your choices will shape the fate of Echo and humanity.

name: Las gafas nuevas del yayo Carmelo
summary:
Josemi's grandfather has been fitted with new glasses that make his eyes huge and, apparently, these glasses allow him to see far away.
A very short interactive fiction about a summer afternoon between a grandfather and a grandson.

name: Last Call
summary:
Pale Moon City is cursed, or so they say. Ghosts, demons, angels, cults, if you've seen it in a horror movie, someone has seen it in Pale Moon City. It's a city that loves horror, and horror loves Pale Moon right back.

Tonight is but one example of the odd things that can happen in this weird city. Last Call is the story of two men who meet at a bar during the night of a new moon, and a little girl who wants to play hide and seek.

name: Land of Runes
summary: You must travel to the base of a fiery volcano where you must face the challenge of ancient memorials. Using your mouse, you'll rotate the monolith in an effort to find the best match, then toss your block toward the multicolored stacks. Although you'll have to work fast to clear each board before time runs out, bombs and other power-ups are on hand to help. Bursting with strategy and suspense, Land of Runes can be played for hours on end.

name: Layerworld
summary: Solve each level, layer by layer, as the ghosts of your deaths stack up.

name: Lactea Volleyball
summary: Lactea Volleyball is a game made to be simple and fun to play, choose or create your team and aim well to beat your opponents.

name: Laruaville 7
summary: Discover the Mysteries of Ancient Egypt!

name: Lady of Bones, a Mother's Legacy
summary: It always rains, they call it The Haze. Ghosts haunt every alley, every gray corner of the city. Lady of Bones is a visual novel that explores the darkest depths of existence where Maya will discover the horrible secrets of her mother's legacy.

name: La Boîte à Bidules de l'Oncle Ernest
summary: La Boite à Bidule is an adventure game featuring a wide range of mini-games, based on reflexion, observation, dexterity and celerity. The entire story takes place in some kind of magical box created by Uncle Albert, containing living and talking toys. It's a game produced by Éric Viennot and developed by Lexis Numérique. Released in 2002, it's the first entry in a spin-off series derived from Uncle Albert's Adventures, aimed at a young demography of around 5 to 8 years old.

name: Last Hope
summary: Your ship explodes and you are left desperately clutching to a tiny planet in an attempt to power your suit until help arrives. Clutch to life in the eerily serene beauty of space with an epic orchestral soundtrack, Last Hope will have your heart racing in all the best ways.

name: Laser Panic
summary: Play as a four legged robot. Try to collect as many gold diamonds as possible. Dodge lasers and escape through the sliding doors to the next level.

name: Largo
summary: Become a security camera operator and survey creepy environments, spot the differences and report anomalies.

name: La Búsqueda del Dilmun: La Tabla de Rawls
Laws of Nadragia
summary: Become a prosecutor in the totalitarian state of Nadragia. Study the laws, use the court facts to convict the guilty or unwanted by the government... Can you keep your conscience?

name: Lay Down Your Roots
summary: Strategic plant growing simulator

name: Last of the Noticers
summary: The time for noticing is over and the time for action is now. Carry out your master-plan that involves guns, explosives and computer duster or face integration into the tedium of industrial society. What will your social credit score be when your choices come to pass and the dust has settled?

name: Lagunita
summary: Lagunita is a 1D wild west town-builder game for the Arduboy.

name: Labyrinth.os
summary: Cyber Labyrinth Dungeon Crawler.

name: Last Line VR: A Zombie Defense Game
summary: Last Line VR is a WWII based VR zombie defense shooting game that has unique events and story. Witness the struggles and stories of the survivors or stay alive as long as you can against unlimited hordes with Endless Mode | Home Defense...

name: Lazy Raise the Earth
summary: the unfinished trpg

name: Land It!
summary: Try yourself as an air traffic controller and direct planes to safe landing! Can you land airplanes without crashing them? Can you be as good as the real people who run the show when you are flying? ;)

name: Labyrinthian
summary: A simple game with no puzzles, no traps, and no enemies. Just you and a maze. Can you get to the end of it, or will you forever be trapped in the labyrinth?

name: Law Mower
summary: Law Mower is a game about one man's journey to achieve his life's purpose - to cut every blade of grass in the world.

name: Ladybugs and Storm
summary: Ladybugs and storm is open world exploration simulation, it is about ladybugs survival through the storm, the mission is explore the towers on tiny islands for some food, so the ladybugs will survive through the storm

name: Lake Of Roaches
summary: Created for the 7-day Fishing Jam. Pay a visit to the Lake of Roaches.

name: Laundry Simulator 2025
summary: Laundry Simulator 2025 is a chill, ASMR laundry cleaning, and shop management game. Open your own Laundromat, and deal with dirty clothes and customers. Clean and manage your shop, upgrade your equipment to improve your clientele to celebrities. Your laundry empire awaits!

name: Labyrinth 3
summary: A relaxing labyrinth game.

name: Lands of the Lost
summary: A 3D Action RPG with Roguelike qualities, can you stop the Demon King??

name: Last Knight
summary: Last Knight is a platforming action game by Toco Games.

name: La Camila : A VR Experience
summary: When the storms of nature threaten her very existence, the viewer must help a young shepherd girl take on the responsibilities of her deceased papá.

name: La ciudad perdida de los Kowane
summary:
La ciudad perdida de los Kowane was a Spanish educational interactive adventure that in order to advance you will have to answer basic math questions such as multiplication, addition, subtraction and others.
The story is about a secret agent named Hache who will have to rescue an important archaeologist who was going to publish his discovery of a civilization on an island that had not been discovered before.

name: Laseronium: The Reflexion
summary: Laseronium: The Reflexion is an arcade puzzle game that tests your abstract thinking and your conceptualization. You are in control of deciding where the reflection cubes will be placed.

name: LaserPoint
summary: The turn-based strategy game that requires you to use building elements to hit all the laserpoints on each level with lasertrons! In this game, you'll encounter a variety of lasertrons that can be reflected, refracted, decomposed into a spectrum of lasertrons, or change colors.

name: Last Land
summary:
Welcome to Valley Land. This Island Under Aabid. Aabid is a businessman. and the most powerful criminal man in India. The valley land is full of danger. and you have two options. first is you have to work under the Aabid. The second option is if you don't like to work under Aabid then be ready to save your ass. 
 
In this open world game, you play the role of Ajay, an undercover cop trying to take down the Aabid army. You'll have to prove yourself worthy as you fight your way up the organization, taking part in brutal criminal activities without blowing your cover.

name: LandCombat: Ren
summary: It's a strategy game that focuses on ground war. Various units (armed vehicles, tanks, self-propelled guns, anti-tank rockets!) You can also use smoke bombs, charge mines, and turbo engines. Manage resources, facilities, R&D, heroes. If the security of the city is bad, there may be a riot.

name: Last Eclipse
summary: Guardians and Gods fight for earth's balance.

name: Last Man Standing Coop
summary: Last Man Standing is a Doom 3 Coop Mod that aims to bring back the feel of the classic Dooms. Our LMS Mod gametype is survival in nature where you face swarms of attacking monsters to the adrenaline pumping energy of heavy metal soundtracks. We also fully support Doom 3 coop in the Single Player levels through the SP Coop gametype and the Doom 3 expansion pack ROE through the gametype ROE Coop. Also the Classic Doom for Doom 3 Mod has been integrated into LMS 4.0 to provide cooperative support! The monsters keep coming, and the bullets keep flying. Let the terror begin...

name: Last Blossom
summary: The last Blossom it's a short game scene, based on tabletop roleplaying games. It presents some story, and it's up to you to choose how it will go. Dice rolls and their consequences, tough negotiations, turn-based combat, adventurous atmosphere, and, of course, some dancing lights!

name: Late Night Surfing
summary: Tune in to TV straight from the dark dimension! But beware: not everything on TV is real. Late Night Surfing is a psychological horror visual novel. Demo was released on itchio on September 29, 2024.

name: La pesadilla de Illojuan
summary: Game made for Illojam, the jam of the Illojuan community.

name: La Madriguera
summary: The game takes place in a simple scene in which our character will try by all means to get a piece of cake. Sure, as long as that doesn't mean having to get out of his chair.

name: Later Daters: Part 2
summary: Choose what happens next at the Oceanview Living Domicile for the Elderly, and smooch some sexy seniors.

name: Lawin Catch The Kim
summary: Lawin Catch The Kim is a fun puzzle game~Chicken Kim never eats and runs wild outside every day. As Kim's good friend, you need to take them all back to the chicken coop and eat obediently! The game is always given 20 levels.Take all Kim home!

name: Laser Lab
summary: Laser Lab is a 3D puzzle game with the theme of exploration and interaction. The player is trapped in a locked laboratory surrounded by laser beams, and those who reroute the beams' path can escape from the chamber. It contains multiple puzzle levels, casual and challenging. Never miss it!

name: Las Vegas
summary: Las Vegas is a Japan-exclusive graphical variant of Softporn Adventure, and hence can be seen as an earlier version of Leisure Suit Larry, which was released a few months later. The gameplay is, by and large, identical to the original text-only version, with the exception of a few adjustments made to the monetary system and a few commands handled slightly differently. Like before, the player types text commands consisting of combinations of verbs and objects. The game recognizes both Japanese and English inputs.

name: Labyrinth of AO
summary: Among the cold Northern Glaciers hidden from unnecessary eyes is a mysterious structure - the local call it Labyrinth Ao. Allegedly it was built for some of its goals by the werewolf Ao, by whose name the design is named. This is Top Down Shooter- TDS. You Wizard and you can explore world for sawe you kingdoom.

name: Lazors
summary: Lazors is a puzzle game of lasers and mirrors offering more than 200 levels, ranging from easy distractions to hard challenges.

name: Last Summer
summary: “Last Summer” is a Walking Adventure Game. Walk home on a dark road. Along the way, you will experience beautiful scenery, nostalgic scenery and strange scenery. Think about what they mean. Can you arrive at home? Or will you arrive at something else?

name: Last Days of Spring 2: Deluxe Edition
Last Moor
summary: Last Moor is a horror game in which a man wakes up and escapes from a secret laboratory on the moon. You have to escape by solving various puzzles, exploring the laboratory, avoiding or fighting the monsters there.

name: Last Devil
summary: You are the Demon Lord Kuro on a mission to protect demonkind. Use your abilities and charms to capture and ensnare others. Tumble with different personalities and fetishes in this 2D rogue-lite shooter!

name: Landers: Black Moon
summary: Landers: Black Moon is a sci-fi puzzle game. After the landing of HEX-Rockets on the moon, you need to find the correct positions for the lasers to turn on all the system. What happens next will blow your mind.

name: Lanterns
summary: A co-operative platformer. Each player is able to shine a coloured ray of light to guide their path and reveal what lies unseen. Utilise lantern colours individually and combined to create a path and reveal what lies unseen, or hollow what blocks the path.

name: Last Words
summary: Last Words is a game of social deception. As a time traveler on a budget, when your improvised time machine malfunctions and you’re taken prisoner in an unknown era, you must work with another traveler to escape. Will you get home faster by working together, or through betrayal…?

name: LazyTown: Festival
summary: LazyTown: Festival is an edutainment game based on the TV show LazyTown

name: La Quête du Dentiste
summary: A French RPG

name: Last Dream
summary: Last Dream incorporates the best features of classic RPGs: replayability and complete immersion into a vast world, rich with detail.

name: Lamplight Station
summary:
Lamplight Station is a story driven exploration-crafting game. Lost on massive space station you must use your wits as you build, craft and fight for survival.
The game features a fully destructible environment and a deep crafting system, with an emphasis on player creativity and choice.

name: Land of Arxox
summary: Explore the untamed world of Arxox... Live the life of a Dwarf, Elf, or Human folk hero. Free captives and establish a household. Face hords of monsters across 8-Biomes. Hunt. Fish. Master spell runes of the ancients and defeat a powerful Arch Villain.

name: Last Rites 1347
summary: 1347 - The Black Death ravages Europe. The End of the world draws near as The Pestilence brings about supernatural events. A man seeks comfort and forgiveness in his final hours. This game has some fantasy horror themes as well as some semi fictional religious themes.

name: Las Vegas Cool Hand
summary: Las Vegas is the gambling capital of the world. Every game in the world has some kind of action in Sin City. Now you can travel to Vegas and try to win some virtual dollars in LAS VEGAS COOL HAND. Play three classic card games: Blackjack, Solitaire, and Cribbage. All of the games have four different variations to play. In Blackjack, the goal is to get as close to 21 as possible without going over, while also beating the dealer's hand. Solitaire has the player trying to place stacks of cards in order and removing the cards one by one. The goal in Cribbage is to be the first person to score 121 points. Take a trip to sin city and try to break the bank in LAS VEGAS COOL HAND.

name: Laruaville 14
summary: Touch the Oriental Wisdom from the ancient sage himself and build him a town!

name: Last Equinox: Winds of Change
summary: In this 3D isometric Roguelite, control Maeve and fight against the forces of evil that are emerging from her dimension, possessing beings to take control of her world. In each round, choose the magic of one of the 4 elements, but plan carefully because the seasons influence your attributes. Gather points, collect coins, and get ready because each round is unique and different!

name: Last Day of Spring
summary:
erika is planning a spa day for her trans friend haru.
she keeps running into different issues though...
and haru seems to be having problems of her own.

LAST DAY OF SPRING is a visual novel. play as erika, a university student, and join her as she plans a spa day for her transgender friend haru.

content warning: this game is for all ages, but it discusses issues that a transgender women in japan might face, which is a topic that can be sensitive and personal. also, please keep in mind that this takes place in japan with japanese characters.

name: Lazy Pirates
summary: Keep control of your lazy mutinous pirates' by making the right choices, blowing people up, and claiming booty

name: Labyrinth
summary: Labyrinth is a 2D platformer with pixel art graphics in which you will have to find your way through intricate labyrinths, overcome many enemies and deadly traps.

name: Laura of Reigetsu
summary: There was a girl named Laura who lived in a remote village called Hatayaki. She was close friends with a girl named Lunaroa who lived next door, and they promised to marry in Yuriscene, a country where women can marry each other.

name: Labyrinth of Legends: Roguelike Battle Quest
summary: Embark on an epic odyssey in this Labyrinth of Legends : Roguelike Battle Quest adventure where every step leads to new challenges and encounters. Traverse diverse and visually stunning locations, each presenting its own set of enemies to overcome.

name: L.A. Noire: A Slip of the Tongue
summary: "A Slip of the Tongue" is a Traffic case that focuses on a grand theft auto.

name: Last Half of Darkness 3
summary: The final chapter in the original trilogy of Last Half of Darkness, a series of point and click horror adventure games. Part 3 mixes things up a little with the inclusion of a life meter and a new interface.

name: Last warrior
summary: It's a third-person action game, played in a town filled with giant skeletons, players are free to explore the environment around the town. Players must avoid attacks by skeletons, or kill the skeletons, maintain health and survive.

name: Lantern Bearer
summary: Lantern Bearer is a tough platformer about a small bear that falls into a dark and mysterious well. Choose your own path and claw your way back to the surface.

name: La femme qui ne supportait pas les ordinateurs
summary: An early game about online harassment of women, in which a woman on the pre-Internet network Minitel is confronted with the advances of several men and her own computer.

name: Land Doctrine
