summary: Land Doctrine is a 3D strategy game focusing on military optimization. Your task is to design tanks, manage research, equip infantry, determine infantry training, optimize production and build combined arms battalions to occupy and hold cities.

name: Last King: Tower Defense
summary: Play as the King of Cards or the King of Chess in this fresh take on the tower defense genre. You can play as the enemy trying to sneak past the towers or play as the towers themselves. There are many upgrades for each side and lots of content to unlock!

name: LastCall
summary:
You play as a bartender named Felix. Felix makes cocktails for his unusual customers and converses with them. Mostly, he just listens and lets them do all the talking.

Help Felix make the right drinks to please his customers and possibly change their moods.

name: L: An Interactive Mystery
summary: Discover clues to find your daughter | Ludum Dare 42

name: Labyrinth of Galleria: The Moon Society - Great Boots Quest
summary:
Unlocks a bonus quest. Once completed, you'll receive shoes as a reward.
The quest will appear under Request Memo once you unlock it.

name: Labyrinth of Galleria: The Moon Society - Quest Set
summary: Delve into the depth of the Labyrinth of Galleria with this DLC Bundle which includes three quests: Special Soul Pact Quest, Great Hat Quest, and Great Boots Quest.

name: Last Stand
summary: Last Stand is a Strategy game, developed by Soft Machine and published by Bandai, which was released in Japan in 1999.

name: Lattice 200EC7
summary: Lattice is a high-speed abstract rail-shooter. The player constantly moves forward at a rapid pace along straight square pathways connected by junctions. Enemies and obstacles swarm from all sides, attacking or obstructing the player, which must either shoot and destroy them or avoid them by either moving to other sides of the path or jumping over them. The player can change their path through the stage at various junctions, as well as turn around and head the opposite direction if necessary.

name: Later On
summary: David lives an ordinary life in a small town called Later On. When his only friend disappears, he seeks after him, and starts to question the reality of the situation.

name: Last Gang Standing
summary: Gather up a gang of your friends, build a base, add a factory, add some turrets, add teleporters, doors, foxholes and decorations. Arm yourselves to the teeth and go forth to raze, loot and t-bag all who stand against you. Be the Last Gang Standing

name: Labyrinthe
summary: Third game from the Horror Tour series.

name: Lair Of The Dragon Ogre
summary: A beautiful id metal castle in a nice style.

name: Last Train Home
summary: This is a short horror-adventure game about being stuck on a train. Loosely based on a story of the same name I read on the internet. This game was submitted to MiniJam 47. The whole thing was written in C.

name: Laser Survivor
summary: Laser Survivor is a top-down rogue-lite shooter where you play as an astronaut stranded on a space station, you can choose one primary weapon, one jetpack which has slots for weapons and modifiers, and indeed your laser turrets which will help you during the run. Build your way to survive.

name: Labyronia Elements
summary: The five elemental worlds are in peril. Guide the protagonist "Dark One" to uncover the mysteries of the divided universe. Labyronia Elements is a JRPG delivering unprecedented, nonlinear progression, strategic battle scenes and a breathtaking story.

name: Last Hope
summary: Engage in intense 5v5 Tactical FPS battles as a skilled military operative. With One Hit Headshots and bullet penetration, precision is vital. Rise through ranks in competitive mode for exclusive rewards. Experience the rush of tactical warfare like never before. Can you be the worlds Last Hope?

name: Late Night Gas Station
summary: Relax as you work a cold, rainy night shift at a gas station. Order stock & gas, stack the shelves and serve your customers! Keep your store well stocked and clean to keep your customers satisfied. Keep entertained and spend your juicy profits on the gas station PC.

name: Last Pocket
summary:
"Welcome to the thrilling world of "Last Pocket," where your strategic prowess and quick thinking will be put to the ultimate test! Arrange the wooden planks with a tap, creating a maze of reflections and angles to guide the ball towards victory. Ten distinct elements add a twist to every level, keeping you on your toes and your mind engaged.
Are you ready to take on this pocket puzzler and immerse yourself in the world of "Last Pocket"?

name: Labyrinth Simulator
summary: Create your own levels, publish them or download levels from community. Play with your friends or play it alone. Shape the future of Labyrinth Simulator.

name: Lady Killer
summary: Its an adult puzzle game. You are a little diver and must turnaround the tilemap.

name: Lars
summary: Lars: Super Action Danger Lizard! is a full-featured platform game with hand-drawn pixel art, faithful old-school controls, classic retro soundtracks, and over 60 huge levels of jumping scrolling action. Each level has plenty of pickups and secrets to explore.

name: Labyrinth
summary: Explore a castle high in the sky. Open new paths, grow stronger and find crystals. Can you make it to the end?

name: Lab 03 Yrinth
summary:
Lab 03 Yrinth is a challenging maze game in a sci-fi scary atmosphere. It will challenge your skill and patience. 
Its a game made for speedrunners, be a guinea pig and have a taste of what it feels like...

name: Last Hope
summary: The evil empire is rushing at light-speed across the galaxies, heading towards Mother Earth. Barely 24 hours ago, they penetrated the last defence line of our galaxy, the Arsion Laser Belt. Millions of innocent people perished in outer space colonies. 70% of our fleet was destroyed during first contact. Our intelligence has now extrapolated their arrival within six days. Conventional weapons cannot stop them. Our last hope is in your hands: The Z-42 Warpstar. Warp into their territories and destroy their leader before they reach Earth.

name: Lakers versus Celtics and the NBA Playoffs
summary: The first game in EA's NBA Live franchise, Lakers vs. Celtics puts the player in the driver's seat with the team of their choice, with the goal of winning it all in the 1989-90 NBA season.

name: Lawless West
summary: Tower Defense strategic game with RPG elements about the cowboys in a Wild West setting

name: Law & Order II: Double or Nothing
summary: The second point and click adventure based upon the popular TV series. A renowned scientist is found murdered in his car. It is up to you to find the murderer and put together a good enough case to nail the guilty verdict.

name: Last Days of Spring Visual Novel
summary: Last Days of Spring is a YA (Young Adult) Otome Visual Novel following a group of high school seniors in their last week of school as they come to terms with questions about love, life and destiny. Follow the steps of Yuka Kishimoto as she navigates across her final week as a high school student and sees her life come to a complete change!

name: Lab Rags
summary:
Lab Rags is a wacky physics-based puzzle game where failure is meaningful! Use your bodies from previous attempts as pieces of the puzzle as you help yourself reach greater heights and far-away platforms.

Play as our beloved crash test dummy and pass through various levels to test the lab’s fantastic inventions! Turret in your way? Put a body in the trash compactor and now you have a shield! Can’t get to the platform above you? Jump on the trampoline bodies to reach new heights! A spike pit that’s too long and you’re lacking ammo? A sphere body is all you need to roll on the spikes with, without taking damage!

Lose yourself in this 1920’s futuristic art deco world as you wonder how to get past all the shiny and cool obstacles in your way. Shimmering gold and silky-smooth marble pave the walls and floors of these expensive labs. Within, hear the roars of the turrets decimating everything in their path, the ‘whoosh’ of wrecking balls swinging by you as you try to avoid them, the ‘ztztzt’ of the electric flooring that vaporizes all material on it, and the signature sound of the Vacuum Gun, sucking up bodies and making new ones!

“But why?” you ask. Why create this lab and these machines and these obstacles? Well, just like life, humans fail constantly. But we often forget to see the good in failing – it's meaningful. Lab Rags is built on this philosophy – that failure is good. Use your previous knowledge and past experiences to get over the next obstacle. Your past failed attempts literally help you in Lab Rags as your position, manipulate and shoot your bodies to cross, solve and advance!

We at Salt Mine Studios wish you the best and welcome you to our lab. Have fun!

name: Last Slice
summary: Last Slice is a 1-4 player party brawler. The goal is get the last slice of pizza left every round by fighting off your friends with your fists and whatever’s laying around. Whoever gets the set amount of slices first wins, but the longer the game lasts, the weirder the game gets.

name: Last Dream: World Unknown
summary: Last Dream: World Unknown incorporates the best features of classic RPGs: replayability and complete immersion into a vast world, rich with detail.

name: Late at Night
summary: This is a blasting game that fights beautiful girls, Dynamic characters, Exquisite style, It's time to show your hand speed !

name: Labyrinths of the World: Hearts of the Planet - Collector's Edition
summary: A geological adventure into a secret world inside our planet!

name: LandTraveller
summary: See a world from a new perspective in this animal-ear themed constructive action RPG!

name: Last Visit to the Shard
summary: Minimalist Mood Piece/ Walking Simulator.

name: Lakeburg Legacies: Supporter's Pack
summary: Show your support to the developers and get exclusive portraits and clothes for your villagers, as well as the OST and a digital artbook for the game!

name: L.A. Meltdown 2047
summary: A large map that reinterprets all of episode 1: L.A. Meltdown.

name: Late Fees and Damages
summary: to be but a childe with a book

name: La Dame de Monsoreau
summary:
Slovak text adventure game based on the 1846 historical novel by Alexandre Dumas.

Received an English translation in 2021 as part of an initiative by the Slovak Game Developers Association in cooperation with Slovak Design Museum, with funding by the Slovak Arts Council.

name: Lair Land Story: Remake Edition
summary: This enhanced rerelease of Lair Land Story brings all of the features of the PSP version while remastering the artwork for HD and adding new endings and other features.

name: Lair of Torment
summary: This is an indie horror game with first-person puzzles. Terror and fear have enveloped the city. The maniac Orun has returned. You sneak into his lair to try and stop him before he goes too far.....

name: Labyrinths of the World: Secrets of Easter Island
summary: What starts as a relaxing getaway quickly takes a disastrous turn as your world is attacked by an ancient god and their stone statues! Can you stop the destruction before it's too late?

name: Lacrosse 15
summary: A Lacrosse simulation game coming to PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and PC.

name: Lambs on the Road
summary: It’s inspired on the bestseller ” The Road” by Cormac McCarthy. It will be a platform survival game. We will be able to find parto of a game where the visual skill is important and on the other side the user will be able to live the story of two characters (Father and daughter) fighting to survive.

name: Last Broadcast
summary: Last Broadcast is a 3D narrative game set in a small radio station at the end of the world. Players assume the role of D-Jay, a charismatic radio host who is giving their last show as the sun turns red and the world burns down.

name: Labyrinths of the World: Secrets of Easter Island - Collector's Edition
summary: What starts as a relaxing getaway quickly takes a disastrous turn as your world is attacked by an ancient god and their stone statues! Can you stop the destruction before it's too late?

name: Last Tale
summary: A visual novel with an original story that takes place after the end of the Undertale story!

name: Laser Blast! 2: The Fight
summary: This sci-fi themed platformer is the sequel to Laser Blast! Play as the advanced robot Atom Girl and progress through a platforming level, defeating enemy forces along the way. Destroy the end boss to complete Atom Girl's mission and buy her time to repair herself so that she can escape the planet Garlock-7, where a hostile force has taken over.

name: Lawnmower Challenge
summary: Lawnmower Challenge is an isometric, lock-and-key puzzle game developed on Unity3D for the iOS and Android marketplaces. The game was selected for Penny-Arcade's PAX Boston Indie Showcase 2012.

name: Last Period
summary:
Last Period takes place in a world where the desperate souls of the dead become reincarnated monsters who seek to terrorize the world.
As the main protagonist, your job is to venture out into the world as you seek to break curse of this reincarnation!

name: Last Nuclear Darkness
summary: Nuclear Reactor Simulator, operable by a single person with the help of an AI Assistant, stalked by Bel'Uk, the third demon that invaded our world, and all the dead who support him. You must survive and keep the reactor running to light up the city.

name: Las Vegas Casino
summary: A casino game for early computer systems.

name: Last of Ass
summary: LAST OF ASS - is a horror game in which the protagonist survives horrible events by just turning the wrong way on the highway.

name: Lab Runner: X
summary: A short but fun Pixel Based Hardcore Platformer where you run around and escape your lab.

name: LazerType VR
summary: A VR typing game from New Blood Interactive.

name: Lagoda Odyssey
summary: Lagoda Odyssey is a turn-based RPG. Explore forests, caves, dungeons, and cities in this adventure. Make friends, complete quests, fight enemies, and catch some fish.

name: Laws of Attraction 2
summary: Laws of Attraction, Book 2 is the second and final book of the Laws of Attraction series. It succeeds its first book, Laws of Attraction, Book 1.

name: L'Agonie Finale
summary: L'Agonie Finale is a single-level PWAD for Doom II that was released in February 2018. It constitutes the bonus level to wrap up the French 3 heures d'agonie trilogy and is compiled of seven speedmaps designed by prominent contributors to the series: William Huber, Jean Bon (Jambon), Franck Livolant (franckFRAG), Roofi, JC Dorne, Arnaud Florian (Oxyde), and Maxime Bisiaux (Datacore). It uses the music track "Monuments of Treason" by Maxime Tondreau (Psychedelic Eyeball).

name: Laserbreak: Renegades
summary: A puzzle game from errorsevendev.

name: Land of Neverwhere
summary: Eight children who became stranded in the hidden silos around the seas of Home Base Terror must be rescued in this 2D horizontal scrolling shoot'em up published by The Power House.

name: Land of Nod
summary: Land of Nod is a low-poly art-style sci-fi shooting game. The player will fight against colonial leaders on a far beyond colony planet: The Planet Nod. And explore the secret hidden in this planet and the entire universe.

name: Landless
summary: Conquer the high seas in this post-apocalyptic infinite water world where you must fight, build, and craft to survive. Explore an endless ocean while fighting off pirates in this rogue-like adventure. Can you tame Landless?

name: Later Daters: Premium
summary: You're the newest resident at Ye OLDE retirement community, where you'll meet a cast of sexy seniors who are all dying (not literally) to meet you. It's a lot like summer camp, but with orthopedic shoes, bridge clubs, and more jell-o.

name: Laser Maze
summary: Laser Maze is a puzzle game that takes place in an abandoned space station where you solve puzzles by redirecting lasers, moving boxes, and navigating through computer terminals.

name: Lands of Devastation
summary: Lands Of Devastation is a top-down arcade shooter, with zombies, mutants, mad doctors, inspired by Crimsonland and Alien Shooter. In this game You will take control of a survivor and fight against this creatures.

name: Lady In Wading
summary: A studly prince is abducted and an Amazon takes the knight's place.

name: Laser Sphere
summary: An arcade game exclusively for the Playdate. This uses the crank to aim a giant laser across the screen at waves of enemies.

name: La Valle Magica
summary:
An ad games from the Kinder Fresh Adventures series, developed to advertise italian snacks like Kinder Pinguì e Kinder Fetta al Latte.
The other games in the series are La Giungla Tenebrosa, La Fabbrica Spaziale and La Montagna Misteriosa. They were all released as separate CDs, but are in fact reskins with very minor changes to the gameplay of the same levels, making it very difficult to classify them either as single games or expansions.

name: Lane Splitter
summary: Ride your motorcycle at insane speeds through ever changing traffic. Your reflexes will mean the difference between surviving or crashing in spectacular fashion.

name: Laruaville 5
summary: Use your Match 3 skills to build a ship and help ghosts leave an uninhabited island!

name: Last Heroes 2
summary: Find out what is ahead for Amelia and Roland, as they are headed to Odaro continent, in this new entry in the hit RPG series Last Heroes!

name: Labyrinth of Legendary Loot
summary:
Labyrinth of Legendary Loot is a simple turn-based roguelike dungeon crawler focused on tactical combat. Every room is almost like a puzzle as you try to figure out the best way to defeat all enemies without taking too much damage.
You play as an adventurer entering the Labyrinth with nothing but a dull sword. Worry not! Each loot you find will grant you a unique ability that will help you slay monsters and find even more loot!
Descend to the deepest level of the Labyrinth and defeat the evil hideous demon lord to win!

name: Landbound
summary: A refreshing fantasy RPG PvPvE action filled adventure! Delve solo or band with friends to challenge mythical islands filled with majestic treasures and treacherous monsters or you may like to take a step back, relax, build your own island and farm your lands to your hearts content!

name: Lamar: Idle Vlogger
summary: A guy who drives a rust bucket cannot repay a debt to his friend and decides to become a blogger. He is denied a loan for a cell phone and borrows it from a friend. This is his last chance to make it out of the slums.

name: Labyrinth: Derelict Abyss
summary: Labyrinth Derelict Abyss is a top-down exploration game set in an ancient aethereal place with a mysterious past.

name: Lands of Crown
summary: A rogue-like in a medieval, randomly-generated world. Fight, talk, steal, cast spells, complete quests, level up, acquire loot and conduct trades, all to take the Crown. Where Streets of Rogue meets Kenshi, choose your own play style and play as any class, if you can meet them, you can be them!

name: Laila
summary: Experience duality in 'Liala's Dreamtide': cultivate by day, decipher eerie alien dreams by night. Unveil the link between her idyllic farm life and nightmarish invaders. A fusion of farming and chilling puzzles in one captivating indie game.

name: Landwars
summary: Play as an Anti Terrorist/Terrorist and fight in a scenario full of twists where all means are good for victory. Developed by LandStudio.

name: Late for Class
summary: You have two minutes to get to your class.

name: LabyrInk
summary: LabyrInk is the result of a 5-day Game Jam. It's an exciting third person shooter where the environment starts out completely invisible. You and other Goblinks must paint it up in order to reveal a path to your opponents. Features two distinct game modes: Last One Standing and Deathmatch.

name: La Ciudad Fantasma
summary: A small city

name: Late Photographer 4
summary: A simple and easy beauty dynamic jigsaw puzzle and relaxing music can make you have a good mood

name: LA Monsters
summary: Travel through the LA wasteland with Josh and Sid in this atmospheric interactive video novel.

name: Labyrinths of the World: The Game of Minds - Collector's Edition
summary: Desperate Times Call for Desperate Measures...

name: Laser Tanks
summary: Laser Tanks is a fast-paced Top Down RPG shooter game where you battle hordes of alien monsters and bosses in various environments using advanced weapons and laser tanks. The game features unique monsters, numerous weapons, and different laser tanks to operate.

name: Labyrinth: Roll of Fate
summary: Trapped by a sinister Game Master, your only hope of escape is to play his twisted game. Blending first-person horror with turn-based strategy and inspired by classic board games, each turn, you roll the dice to determine your fate. But beware, the Game Master ensures no two games are ever the same.

name: Lazerhawk
summary: arcade-style racing game inspired by the spirit of the early 90s, endless highway and an incredible sense of speed to create an exhilarating driving experience.

name: Land Drifters
summary: Land Drifters is an incremental RPG game that can be played idle or active. Explore islands, unlock new skills and combat classes, overcome obstacles, and more! The game is jam-packed with many paths of progression intertwined throughout the game!

name: Lands of Avaronia
summary: Lands of Avaronia is an oldschool fantasy RPG in which you take a role as one of the Mercenaries. Help the Kingdom to push back the Orcish Invasion which is threatening to the Human nation. Discover the mysteries of Avaronia, a classic fantasy adventure awaits you.

name: Laufen Und Raufen
summary: Laufen Und Raufen is a chaotic multiplayer game for 2-8 players about penguins fighting over their fish. Steal the fish from the other penguins or work together as a team to gather the most fish so you could be the queens/kings of the Arctics!

name: Land Snake.io
summary:
Land Snake is a new exciting and challenging IO game with smooth controls. Are you ready to conquer the land now?

In this new addictive strategy game, grow your territory by enclosing the land with your long trail. The ultimate aim is to have the biggest kingdom in Land Snake. Your goal is pretty simple to get?

How to Play?
- Control the motion by virtual control lever. 
- Conquer and expand your base by surrounding the adjacent land.
- Eliminate your opponents by hitting their trails.
- Stay cautious! Avoid being hit by your competitors too!
- Always remember to guard your own territory.

Game Features:
- Simple & smooth controls
- Many different and cool skins for your choice
- Fully customizable - skins & base color
- 3 different play modules: Endless Mode, Props Mode and Time Mode.

Find us:
If you have any question or need any support, please email us at:
thehotgames2015@gmail.com

Download Land Snake.io now and start conquering! Enjoy!

name: Lazy Devil's game life
summary:
The demon sovereign's frontier territory was raided by brave human, and the devil king decide to deal with the threat herself. 
However, it seems that some people try to wastting time so that the devil can't find the brave human. 
The devil have to find clues himself and find the brave human to defeat him.

name: Lasertron
summary: Arkanoid with optic styled physics and different bonuses. Lasertrons can be reflected, refracted, decompose into a spectrum of lasertrons, change their colors. Clean the playing field by lasertrons!

name: Laf the game
summary: Survive, explore, live the life of your favorite furry animal.

name: Lair Hockey
summary: Lair Hockey is all about taking the smooth precision of air hockey into an adventure through many arcade worlds and many unexpected unique challenges, in a quest beyond the table.

name: Land of the Void
summary: Land Of The Void is Roguelike STG game, combined with dungeon exploration. You need to think about the battle strategy of STG & rune integration, in the meanwhile recruiting teammates, exploring the dungeon to obtain equipment and items, completing tasks and accumulating resources.

name: Lapland Solitaire
summary: Lapland Solitaire is a Christmas themed card game in which you progress through the build-up to the big day by playing through 200 levels and spending your hard earned chocolate coins on Lapland features.

name: Landy Land
summary: The reckless daughter of famous hero Randall "Randy" Land, Landyssa "Landy" Land spends most of her days terrorizing the countryside under the guise of being a hero. One day, while visiting her friend Mandy, she discovers that her brother Dandy has once again let loose a bunch of evil monsters on Mandy's hometown. Unwilling to let this aggression stand, Landy coerces--er, convinces Mandy to join her on a quest to defeat her evil brother Dandy.

name: Land of War: The Beginning
summary: Land of War is the world’s first, first-person shooter game fully dedicated to the outbreak of WWII in Poland on September 1939 as well as other episodes between 1939 and 1944. It portraits the episodes and battles fought by Poles during the German invasion.

name: Lalaloopsy Diner
summary: Time management game of the popular series

name: LainTSX
summary: LainTSX is an unofficial web-based, open-source reimplementation of the 1998 PlayStation game Serial Experiments Lain with the aim to provide multi-language support and make it more accessible.

name: La Maledizione dell'Uccello Serpente
summary: A JRPG game with a fantasy setting and retro style. Warning: the game is in Italian.

name: Larry and the Long Look for a Luscious Lover
summary: Larry and the Long Look for a Luscious Lover is an unlicensed game using the Leisure Suit Larry franchise for the NES.

name: Lake: Special Delivery
summary: Take a trip back to the 1980's and visit the beautiful lakeside town of Providence Oaks, deliver their mail, and meet its charming residence. This bundle includes the base game, Lake, and its festive holiday-themed prequel, Lake: Season's Greetings.

name: Labyrinth of Lust
summary: Part man, part bull, and horny for raw, uninhibited sex. Rumors about sexual insanity in Minotaur's labyrinth were traveling all across the kingdom... Chained, whipped, and fucked, the blonde from the North and the dark girl of far South pleasure their new master in ways no mortal man could imagine.

name: Last Island
summary:
Explore the wide-open plains and discover the secret of the beautiful island! 
A 3D battle action game set in a large open world! 
World 
The Last Island is a mysterious land where you can live an ordinary life 
while talking with others islanders, buying weapons, and falling in love… 
But despite all this, on the other side of the island there are rumors of monsters… 
Character Customization 
In addition to looks and body-part sizes, you can change the eye patterns, clothing, 
and even create custom outfits for characters! 
In addition, after game completion, you can…? 
Weapons 
From swords, daggers, magical staffs, and even cursed scrolls, 
to shields, broad swords, arrows, and hammers, a variety of weapons are introduced! 
Over 100+ items total! 
Love Simulation 
You can freely fall in love with islanders, so if you see a girl you like, talk to her! 
Once you start getting along you can go on dates, or even invite her home…? 
Battles 
Monsters will automatically pop up on the map. 
Though it’s a peaceful world, be prepared to fight at a moment’s notice! 
Character Voicing 
You can change the personality settings of your characters. 
Enjoy as the vocal tone of characters change according to their personality! 
Events 
Event animation included for boss battles. 
We guarantee that the characters’ various expression will draw you into this world!

name: Lava Golf
summary:
Dive into a new and unexpected take on golf games! In Lava Golf you do not control the golfer, instead you are the golf ball and your objective is to reach the end portal of each course without falling into the lava.

Armed with unexpected skills for a golf ball, like the ability to dash into the air or to hit the brakes to avoid falling off a platform, you will need to cross all the portal rings of a course to unlock its exit portal. Scattered across the course you'll also find precious experience spheres which will let you gain levels and grant skill points allowing you to unlock new incredible abilities and to enhance your existing ones!

Unlock unique skills, cross all the rings, and most importantly... DO NOT FALL INTO THE LAVA!

name: Larry's New Wheelchair
summary: Larry decided to buy a new wheelchair online and with it he will be settling some scores...

name: Lagoon
summary: Your mission, should you choose to accept it of course, is to eliminate the scourge from the facility, restore power in the Rosskotek Hydro-Electric station then meet up with "dude" in the escape craft waiting for you anchored in the estuary.

name: Lanterns: The Harvest Festival
summary:
Lanterns: The Harvest Festival is a beautiful, thoughtful tile-placement game set in imperial China based upon the best-selling and award-winning board game.

In Lanterns, players take turns arranging colorful floating lanterns on a ceremonial lake. Completing sets of lanterns earns Honor, and at the end of the game the player with the most Honor wins.

Vibrant visual effects, skilled AI, meditative environmental music and smooth touch play translate the delightful zen of Lanterns: The Harvest Festival to your phone or tablet.

name: Labyrinth
summary: Labyrinth is a videogame by (presumably now defunct) Wonderfling Studios. It was developed to pair with the song Labyrinth off of Joe Hawley's project Hawaii: Part II. It essentially functions as a playable version of the original music video.

name: Labyrinth
summary: Labyrinth is an intense close ranged hack n slash focused on steel vs steel action in deep and deadly battles against nightmarish demons within a mysterious labyrinth that promises to lead triumphant warriors off their dying world.

name: Land Of Chasers
summary: Land of Chasers is a roguelike action RPG set on a growing planet. Join the group as they experience this adventure over time. Take part in exciting trial games while the game is still in creation, determine the game's fate with your feedback, and create dynamic, interactive landscapes.

name: La Nuit
summary: La Nuit is a platformer representing the Art Deco art movement, with elements from Cassandre to Lempicka. Collect the glasses, and wine bottles and avoid the ghost to win!

name: Laruaville 9
summary: Use your Match 3 skills to build an empire! As usually there are also some optional bonus game and a town to build!

name: Labyrinth of Axarith
summary: Players make adventurers and challenge numerous labyrinths, and mix good old 3D exploration dungeons, real-time battles, and card-like choices in this RPG.

name: LastByteStanding
summary: Last Byte Standing takes place in a cubic universe occupied by ill-shaped invaders. Player takes the role of an elite hunter eliminating deadly enemies. Equipped with various powerful laser weapons he fights for liberation of a digital realm.

name: Last Answer
summary: You - a writer, tired of living in a big city and all the fuss, which wants to get rid of anxiety, find inner peace and return to this in a long-forgotten home. Locked in his own mind, he becomes the protagonist of his new work, which, according to the story, looking for a way out of this madness ...

name: Lady Hunt
summary: Lady Hunt is a pixel art action platformer, set in a dark gothic world, where blood has been infected. You play as a huntress, who must find a way to purify this world, inhabited by monsters and beasts.

name: La Tailor Girl
summary:
This is a weapon mod that does not touch the monsters in anyway.
Well more of armor mod, or maybe half of both?

Your armor/clothes is your main core of health and well being, your weapons are enchanted by what you wear
They are not eternal, they will break eventually, and when they do, you are in trouble as going all naked makes it hard to handle guns if you wanna stay modest.
Luckily there is plenty to choose from, but you can only wear one at a time, so sometimes you might need to strip on purpose.

All weapons except chainsaw have been replaced with counter parts.
Medikits and bonus shards give clothing scrap which repairs armor instead of restoring health
Berserk, chainsaw, armors, megaspheres, radsuits, invulnerability and invisibility spheres have cloth replacements, tho the invulnerability one can be a bit more... aggressive clothing.

All weapons have alt fires and some even have reload based specials, make sure to bind those and the mod specific strip button so you can pick up those new enchanting clothes.
Free look is recommended as some guns might not properly behave with mere autoaim.

name: Laser Blaster
summary: Space defence.

name: Last Pirate: Survival Island
summary: Welcome to the lost island, lonely survivor! You have just been shipwrecked and are stranded on the tiny island. Become the most powerful pirate in the real adventure offline game Last Pirate: Island Survival. The grim world of post-apocalypse here is full of zombies, monsters, and bosses such as Godzilla or Kraken that constantly try to murder you and break your survival plans.

name: Last One Standing: Royal Massacre
summary: Kill to live, or live to die

name: Lady Death Demonicron
summary: LADY DEATH: DEMONICRON is an all new side-scrolling, sword slicing, magic wielding, 15 level, multiplayer beat-em-up that takes the best aspects of the 1990's arcade classics - all mixed together with a killer 90's industrial-metal soundtrack!

name: Lasting Solstice
summary: After suffering from amnesia, Kazu tries his best to regain his former self. Without his memories, he has trouble remembering close friends and family. With the help of old and new friends along the way, Kazu slowly goes on to his path through self-discovery.

name: Last Warrior
summary: In this game you will be able not only to plunge into the middle ages, to feel as a brave warrior, but also to have a good time.

name: Lack of Water
summary: Lack of water is a puzzle game. You need to direct the flow of water towards an empty glass.

name: Lawless Lands: Smoking Sands
summary: The Smoking Sands DLC for Lawless Lands adds 3 primitive black powder firearms, a bayonet, various types of ammo, and a grenade to the game. It also adds new skills, a new title, new animations and sounds, and a whole new way to take your enemies down!

name: Last Mile
summary: Last mile - is a first-person car horror game. It seems that you are in a spatial anomaly, you drive through the same places from time to time, maybe your GPS navigator doesn't work? Or maybe there are really, really strange things happening here.

name: Last Walpurgis
summary:
Last Walpurgis is a tower defense battle game in which you collect witches scattered around the world to fight against humans.
Tower defense type battles involve over hundreds of dot characters. Each character fights on its own initiative, but you can also activate powerful Ultimate Skills at your command.

name: Laxius Force II: The Queen of Adretana
summary:
In this new adventure you will find dozens of hours of gameplay, more than 20 characters, countless monsters, items and quests as you follow the road of Half-Goddess Luciana and her many friends.

More will be revealed about the Grand Commendanter and his Order servants. Fans of the original game will be pleased to know that they can export their savefile from Laxius Force I to Laxius Force II, keeping their characters, equipment and so on. An amazing tale of love, passion, tragedy and fantasy is finally at hand.

name: Last Breakers
summary: A vertically scrolling shooter for the PC-98 by doujin group CO2-PRO.

name: Lamafox - Hide and Seek!
summary:
Play hide and seek with Fredfred! Can you find him in the colorful worlds? Lamafox is a creative and surprising puzzle mobile game for kids and adults.
Try out all the possibilities that come to your mind to solve the puzzles. Also use the different abilities of your smartphone or tablet. The puzzles don't always have to be solved with your finger! Have fun and try everything, because there is no game over.

name: Lava Escape Mine
summary: Escape the volcanic mine. Red hot magma is now pouring into the underground mining complex. You must escape the mine before the magma catches up to you in virtual reality.

name: Lawless Lands: Unrest
summary: Play through an all new campaign in a land torn apart by corruption and conquest. Experience a tale of defiance and devotion against a forgotten enemy that threatens the freedom of everyone in their path. Follow the story of a family's plight as vicious invaders defile their precious homeland.

name: Landlady Seduction Simulator
summary: Your goal is to seduce the landlady through carefully chosen interactions, flirty conversations, and bold moves—and to take her to bed!

name: Laxius Force III: The Last Stand
summary: The absolutely stunning finale of the trilogy! Random is finally going to meet the Grand Commendanter! What will be the outcome? Will the Laxius Force or the Order win the war? Take control of Random, Sarah, Luciana, Coryool, Wendala, Xander, Brussian and many, many more characters, and find out!

name: Last Days of Future
summary: In this single and multiplayer survival game, explore an unknown and hostile environment. Learn to survive by combining elements to craft your own items to hunt, build and defend yourself. Survive alone or with friends in this evolving post-apocalyptic world.

name: Last Neighbor
summary: You play as a young thief who broke into the wrong house, he thought the place was empty because he saw the owners leaving with suitcases, but there was still somebody in the house. It could be dangerous so you have to get out fast.

name: Last Day of Zombies
summary: The indie-casual game of Last Day of Zombies comes to confirm this principle once again.

name: Lanternia
summary: Lanternia is a survival RTS with roguelite and deckbuilding elements. Build, defend, and expand the village in a dark wood, illuminated only with lanterns.

name: Land of Zympaia
summary: You start as a homeless person in the world, alone and with nothing in hand you have to work your way up to survive.

name: Lab 83
summary: A 2.5D person puzzle game with creative puzzle solving. Use different blocks from what are available on each level to overcome to the obstacles. Complete levels quickly or with few blocks to get achievements!

name: Langort
summary: Langort is a roguelite deck-building hack-and-slash where you are a swashbuckling hero on a quest to defeat the Lich Queen. Fight endless hordes of undead, growing more powerful with every kill.

name: Laughing to Die
summary: Nannan returned to her hometown to attend her grandmother's funeral.

name: Lady & Lonely Boy: Ojou-sama to Bocchi-kun
summary: Enrolling in an all-girls school as the only boy!?A harem academy life where I'm at the mercy of a young lady with almost no knowledge of men is about to begin...!

name: Last Monarch
summary: You are the Demon Lord Kuro on a mission to protect demonkind. Use your abilities to capture and ensnare others. Tumble with different personalities in this 2D rogue-lite shooter!

name: Late Photographer 5
summary: A simple and easy beauty dynamic jigsaw puzzle and relaxing music can make you have a good mood The right mouse button can quickly complete the puzzle.

name: Lab Inspect
summary: You play as an inspector tasked with checking one of the Tepas labs. Strange things have been happening in the lab for a long time. It's time to check what's wrong with him.

name: Labyrinth of Zangetsu: Akiba's Trip Collaboration - Additional Characters Pack
summary:
Atmospheric turn-based dungeon crawler with Japanese yokai folklore reimagined!
AKIBA'S TRIP characters entering the world of Labyrinth of Zangetsu.
This DLC will add 8 characters as playable characters to Labyrinth of Zangetsu from "Akiba's Trip".

name: Last One Standing
summary: LastOneStanding is an online cooperative third-person zombie shooter game. You will play as a special force soldier, using guns, grenades and whatever you got to kill as many zombies as you can. You can play solo or create a listen server to invite two other friends to take on exciting levels.

name: Lazy Jiangshi
summary: A visual novel about lazy jiangshi Mao and her even lazier mistress.

name: Larry's Big Score
summary: Larry's Big Score is a Leisure Suit Larry-themed pinball game by Sierra.

name: Last Survivor
summary: Last Survivor is a multiplayer battle royale game with MMO features and a melee-focused, Souls-like combat system that combines skill, crafting, survival, and scavenging gameplay mechanics. It is set to push the limits of its genre with this and its detailed original post-apocalyptic punk universe!

name: Lawless Lands
summary: Lawless Lands is an old-school role-playing game featuring a unique setting and innovative mechanics that allow players to delve into a dark medieval, low-fantasy world of epic proportions. Discover and destroy the darkness that has taken hold over these Lawless Lands.

name: Lawless Lands: Witchcraft
summary: The Witchcraft DLC for Lawless Lands adds 3 new spells in a new spell class - witchcraft, which can be learned or gained through a staff or wand! Use your craft and trickery to bring your enemies down and bend the wrathful forces of nature to your will!

name: LabWatch
summary: LabWatch is an atmospheric horror / strategy / puzzle game where you must make sure every machine is working while avoiding dangerous enemies. Look through cameras to see which machines are not working and to know where enemies are currently roaming.

name: Lab Craft Survival
summary: Unique survival game with interesting mechanics: reproduction, infinite character development, diseases and treatments, evolution, herbalism, farming, building, ecosystem, flexible mechanics, ever-changing and complicating environment.

name: Last Mage Standing
summary:
Play 100 Player Fantasy Battle Royale, Co-op Tower Defense and more game modes in this fast paced action RPG brawler.

Battle solo or team up with friends in a variety of PvE and PvP modes for quick three minute rounds. Collect and upgrade a roster of Guardians and pair them up with magical and mechanical abilities to rule the day.

name: Laser Dreams
summary: A puzzle game from Ales Kocjancic.

name: Lakefront Restaurant
summary: Lakefront Restaurant is a short experimental horror game that takes gameplay events and randomizes them leaving the player to question what's going to happen next without it impacting the story or gameplay.

name: Law: Transporter
summary: LAW (pronounced Land Air Water) is an arcade transporter racing game about transporting goods and passengers by land, air and water.

name: Laundry Idle
summary:
You spend your life time saving money to open a laundry service... Now let's hire someone to start the business.
It starts as a small dream but you know one day your washing company will be come a popular franchise. Keep on working, together everyone will earn more coins.

name: Lazerball
summary: 2-8 player brawler! Whack an electric dodgeball into your opponents! Jump, dodge, counter, curve & slam your way to victory! Play in teams or solo and become the Lazerball champion!

name: Lawless Lands: Second Soul
summary: The Second Soul DLC allows you to fully customize a second character - exactly like how you can for the main character of the base game - to use as a companion! No longer will you have to face the dangers of the lawless lands alone or with premade companions!

name: Lab BreakOut
summary: Lab BreakOut is a hardcore precision gravity-shifting platformer with minimal graphics.

name: Late Night Breakfast
summary: Your wife is having a bad night. How will you help her?

name: Launch Break
summary: Launch Break is a fast-paced 4-player local party game, where you must fight over a single chance to escape a crash-imminent spaceship!Challenge your friends with all your arsenal, perks and the ability to shape the battleground to your advantage.

name: L'Angolo Di Farenz: Avventure Vampiresche
summary: "In "Avventure Vampiresche" Farenz faces morning obstacles in an epic race through Cremona at 5 o'clock in the morning! Dodge ducks, spitballs, runners, and more to close the rings in time! Get ready for a frantic and enjoyable experience!"

name: Last Half of Darkness: Society of the Serpent Moon
summary: Society of the Serpent Moon is a "Point and Click" style adventure where the player investigates and explores a mysterious small European town, uncovering the secrets behind Vampire-like murders that are plaguing its dark streets. BONUS: 3 Additional "Last Half" Games included FREE!

name: Last Survivor
summary: An arcade game released by Sega in 1988, Last Survivor is the earliest known free-roaming, three-dimensional, third-person shooter, and one of the first shooters with a network multiplayer deathmatch mode.

name: La Foret
summary: La Foret is a surreal, abstract indie walking simulator inspired by Max Ernst's paintings about mysterious forests. You plant a "tree" and then explore a landscape.

name: La Carbonara
summary: A short adventure game with multiple endings about how the iconic italian dish is made.

name: Lantern Forge
summary:
Lantern Forge is a sandbox survival game with building, crafting, and RPG elements. 
Mine and forage for resources to build a home, plant crops, and craft weapons and armor. Then venture out to explore the wilderness, find hidden dungeons and temples, fight unique monsters, and collect the treasures they guard.

name: Last Barrier
summary: Last Barrier is a tower defense game set in a zombie apocalypse setting. Defend the base with army machine guns, rocket launchers and a wall built around the perimeter. Purchase unit upgrades with kill points. Your military base is the last line of defense against the countless forces of zombies.

name: Last Chance in Xollywood
summary: You are an extraterrestrial movie director at a low-budget movie studio. In this visual novel/RPG, you'll struggle against capitalism, corruption, and your eccentric coworkers to get the movie done on time and under budget.

name: Late Night Mop
summary: Late Night Mop is a haunted house cleaning simulator.

name: Late'O'Clock
summary: Late’O’Clock is an isometric stealth game in which you play as an office employee who is always late to work and must sneak to their desk. During the game players are able to bribe, distract, or deactivate enemies to avoid being detected. Every new day will bring many obstacles for the player to experience.

name: Last Second
summary: Choose skills, find treasure chests, and survive the endless siege of enemies

name: Land of the Lost: Crystal Adventure
summary: A mediocre tie-in to the summer 2009 film Land of the Lost in which you must guide Will Ferrell through basic puzzles.

name: Late to the Party
summary: A late Cold War era RPG set in the Baltics. Arrest, interrogate, and uncover the truth as a local recruited by the KGB.

name: Land Battle
summary:
[Unreleased 1982] Land Battle is a two player war game which utilizes both strategic and tactical modes of play. Each player controls an array of forces with the objective of capturing or destroying his opponent's "flag."

PRODUCTION HISTORY
This wargame simulation took a long time in programming (officially 391 days, compared to 170 days for Night Stalker, begun at about the same time); when completed in mid-1982, Marketing was concerned that its design already looked dated.

A second concern was that, due to the complexity of the game, it required more memory than an Intellivision contained; the cartridge would have to include 256 bytes of RAM onboard. Only USCF Chess had been approved for onboard RAM, an expensive proposition.

When the Entertainment Computer System (ECS) was given the green light, Gabriel Baum, VP of Applications Software, proposed changing Land Battle to an ECS title; the ECS had an additional 2K of RAM available for cartridges. Marketing resisted this -- they still wanted Land Battle as a stand-alone game. Peggi Decarli was assigned to give the game a graphics makeover.

After the makeover, Marketing still didn't find it visually interesting enough. By that time, wargame fanatic Steve Sents, having completed Deadly Discs, had started work on an ECS wargame called Desert Fox, which Marketing liked the looks of better. The decision was made to kill Land Battle and incorporate as much of its gameplay and programming as possible into the Desert Fox design.

name: Lagnacure Legend
summary: Sequel to Lagnacure, Lagnacure Legend takes place fifteen years after the first game's events, continuing on with the son of the main character from the first game.

name: Larry Vales II: Dead Girls are Easy
Last Order
summary: Last Order is a 2D action game with pixel art style. To recover the "Last Order" in devastated world, you'll use a variety of wire actions.

name: Lacuna III
summary: I'll bring you the rom sometime. You'd like it. Have you played the first two?

name: La Douche
summary: Adult Voyeur Videogame and Virtual Reality

name: Lair of the Morlocks
summary:
In Lair of the Morlocks, you must showcase the power of wit over brawn by using the environment to outsmart your Morlock foes and retrieve your stolen Time Machine! Certain platforms and rocks can be destroyed with your handy torch, and their debris may find many uses in these dark caverns! 
 
Along the way you may encounter some captured Eloi, a peaceful but naive race of future humans whom may reward you handily for rescuing them. Exploration and ingenuity is not only encouraged, but a necessity to this adventure!

name: Lagoon Lounge 2: The Secret Roommate
summary: This is a visual novel featuring beastmen. In a lakeside village, the protagonist picks up a mysterious lion beastman and begins to lead a secret life.

name: Lair of the Titans
summary: Lair of the Titans offers a unique way for players to enjoy VR together. Play in the same room, hunting one another, choosing the right moment to strike and scare the other player.

name: Land of the Dead: Road to Fiddler's Green
summary: Based on the feature film from George A. Romero, this new chapter in the Living Dead series is a full-featured, first-person shooter video game sets players in the midst of a gruesome adventure in which they battle to save themselves – and a diminishing living population - from an army of the dead bent on spreading a zombie plague. Developed by Brainbox Games, a Digital Extremes Studio, and using the Unreal Engine, the game features terrifying zombies, frightening effects, an immersive storyline and key environments seen in the film. Gamers can also join intense, bone-chilling multiplayer battles against the dead on Xbox Live.

name: Late For Work
summary: Late For Work is an asymmetric multiplayer party game, pitting a VR giant against multiple non-VR players in a hilarious slapstick hide and seek challenge.

name: Lanota
summary: A rhythm game from Noxy Games.

name: Law & Order: Dead on the Money
summary: Law & Order: Dead on the Money is an adventure game based on the popular television show of the same name. The game is split into two segments, field work and courtroom drama. The actors lend their voices to the game.

name: Last Ride
summary: A Train Ride to ... where exactly? A short atmospheric Horror Game about an unusual Train Ride where you need to find your way through a Train to see what lies behind.

name: Lampy
summary: Lampy is a captivating puzzle-platformer where you guide the adorable cube, Lampy, through a world shrouded in darkness. Use Lampy warm glow to light up the path, solve challenging puzzles, and uncover the heartfelt story of his quest to find his way home.

name: Lazarus
summary: Lazarus is a Free to Play top-down action sci-fi mmo for thousands of players in a shared & persistent open world.

name: Lab Escape
summary: In Lab Escape, you can defeat robots and bosses while using a jet pack, a Exploding disc launcher, a blaster, and a shotgun!

name: Law of the West
summary:
The West is out of control and a new sheriff is in town. As you wander through the dusty streets of this cowboy town keeping law in order, you are encountered by many characters ranging from gunslingers to the ladies.

You must use your conversation skills to get through each character and if that's unsuccessful, you may have to use your quick draw skills and lay the law down.

name: Last Wish
summary: This is a casual simulation game where you have a very rich dad. The goal of the game is to spend all the property your father left to you by eatting, drinking, playing and etc. Besides, you also need to fight with the other three opponents of your family. While playing the game, you also need to pay attention to their behavior.

name: Lander Odyssey
summary: With limited fuel and several dangers lurking, use your skills to rescue astronauts trapped in various unique places on the strange planet. It won't be an easy rescue.

name: Last Visit
summary: Last Visit is a combination of an adventure game and survival horror. Discover a captivating story full of secrets and fear. Dark atmosphere, constant sense of danger and various puzzles will make you never forget this experience.

name: La Historia De
summary: Have you ever wanted to play a tableboard rpg with your friends, but there was no way you could match? This game is for you. It is an environment who allows you to play online Rpg tabletop games. With your characters, maps, atmospheres, music, etc. The game loads all content from the game folder on your computer.

name: Labyrinth of Touhou 2
summary: Touhou no Meikyuu: Gensokyo to Tennuki no Daiju, or also known as Touhou no Meikyuu 2, is a dungeon crawler role-playing game and the sequel to the first Touhou no Meikyuu. Similar to its predecessor, Touhou no Meikyuu 2 challenges players with exploring and mapping an hug edungeon. The game uses a team of 4 characters and 8 reserve characters, and combat is be entirely turn-based. New features are available upon game completion are: Boss Rush Mode, available after recruiting 46 characters; And Enhanced Boss Rush Mode, unlocked after finishing Boss Rush Mode; Extra Areas - can be accessed from the 12th floor- with more enemies, treasure, and bosses.

name: Labyrinth of Crete
summary: In this graphic adventure the player guides Jason and Hercules through the Labyrinth of Crete to recover the captured golden fleece of Greek myth.

name: La Tale
summary:
Welcome to the world of La Tale! Be part of an exciting story that unfolds all around you, while choosing your own unique path!

La Tale is a free-to-play, massive multi-player, online role-playing game (MMORPG), with classic 2D side-scrolling action. The game features over 40 character classes, each with unique skills and weapons. There are near-endless character customization options, pets, crafting, guilds, and much more.

name: Lawn Mowing Simulator: Dino Safari
summary: Dino Safari first opened its doors in 1994 to capitalise on the mainstream obsession with all things prehistoric, and is proudly still going strong today. There are four main zones containing eight dinosaurs whose grounds need maintaining… if you’re brave enough!

name: Lava Friends
summary: Multiplayer online video game where you avoid falling rocks and escape the rising lava

name: Last Caveman
summary: What do parachutes, augers and bazookas have in common? They help the "Cavemen", a troop of irresistible fellows with loincloths and three-day beards, to complete their search for a cozy home with as little loss as possible.

name: Lagnacure
summary: Lagnacure is a 3D isometric RPG where the player controls a group of characters.

name: Last Subway
summary: Have you ever had such a gaming experience? It’s filled with wild screams, even mocking the developers, yet you find yourself moved to tears at the end. Perhaps this game is one of those! Why? The truth lies at the last subway station.

name: Lassie
summary: Your chance to take part in a thrilling adventure as the most famous dog in the world! Lassie returns in this fun action game following on from the acclaimed movie. The story opens with the discovery that the villainous Eddie Hynes has returned to steal Lassie's litter of six pups. Through each level of the game you'll need to show bravery and determination to track down the missing pups and bring Hynes to justice!

name: Laruaville 15
summary: Help the Alien restore his crashed UFO and find the way home!

name: Lada Racing Club
summary: Lada Racing Club offers car street races in Moscow, Russia. It contains almost all models of the AvtoVAZ range of cars. Many historical monuments and locations are recreated. The game modes include career, fast arrival and freeride. The city is filled with cars and pedestrians that need to be avoided to get a fast time. There is a small mini map in the bottom left corner and the bottom right corner shows the speed as well as the damage the car has suffered. By winning races money is earned to upgrade the cars. Released only in Russia.

name: La-Mulana 1 & 2: Hidden Treasures Edition
summary:
La-Mulana 1 & 2: Hidden Treasures Edition

La-Mulana 1:
Your destiny awaits in La-Mulana! Take control of archaeologist Lemeza Kosugi and navigate through puzzles, traps, and deadly Guardians in order to claim the Secret Treasure of Life. You'll need sharp wits, quick reflexes, and most importantly, all the courage you can muster. Will you succeed in unraveling the secrets of La-Mulana, or will you fall victim to the dangers that surround you?

La-Mulana 2:
Renowned archaeologist Lemeza Kosugi has gone missing, and only his daughter Lumisa can find him! Enter Eg-Lana, an upside-down version of the legendary ruins of La-Mulana. Think fast, act fast, and whip hard in order to overcome dangerous traps and elaborate puzzles in your quest to uncover unfathomable secrets. What will you find at the end of your journey: triumph or defeat?

Treasures Edition:

The Game "La-Mulana 1" & "La-Mulana 2"
Archaeological Anthems 2-Disc Soundtrack
Artbook "Hidden Treasures The Tomb of LA-MUANA"
Siesta in The Ruins Puzzle

name: Langrisser II
summary: Elwin is a wanderer who finds himself caught in between the Descendants of Light, the army of darkness, and the Rayguard Empire in a battle for the Sacred Sword Langrisser and the Cursed Sword Alhazard. Which side will you join? Which will you deem worthy of the legendary swords, and consequently, the right to rule El Sallia itself?

name: Lakehouse
summary: Spend a year studying at the rural Stowford College in a story where your choices actually matter. Join one of the clubs, make new friends, and find love.

name: Land of Zombies
summary: Welcome to the heart-pounding adventure of Land of Zombies, where survival is your only option in a world ravaged by the undead.

name: Last Alive
summary: Last Alive is an Adventure game, developed and published by Bandai, which was released in Japan in 2001.

name: La Escalera
summary:
Conversion of the classic Board game for ZX Spectrum 48 Kb.

Dice game.

The objective of the game is to reach square 100.

3 different boards to choose from.

Up to 4 players configurable to be controlled by people or the computer.

name: Lava Fever
summary: A volcano dropping, fireball dodging, soul sacrificing ride that puts your reflexes to the test.

name: Lamunation!: International
summary: Now, this is a story all about how, Luna's life got flipped-turned upside down... Kick back at the Cherry Crown Diner with a cast of quirky heroines in this meme-tastic visual novel that's fizzing with extreme happiness.

name: Late City Riders
summary: The streets of Late City never stop, and neither do you. Cruise, leap, and fly from car to car through impossible cityscapes to make it to work on time and show your boss that you mean business.

name: Land of Mu
summary: Land of Mu is a 2D Proceduraly Generated Open-World RPG which takes place in a viking land called Mu on planet Earth. This land was ruled by many kings and destroyed by many wars, but such cycle would not last.

name: Lawn of Time: Unicorn Snow
summary: When a bad boy unicorn comes to town, it's up to Tamina to stop him from completely ruining the Lawn of Time!

name: Lazer Command
summary: Shoot all the enemy tanks before time runs out or your enemy shoots all your tanks.

name: Lab Cat
summary: A sokoban game with portals and a cat

name: LA Hollywood Zombies
summary: Survive the horror of Anubis`s army of dead with Death the Reaper spawning the dead to destroy eat the living because of the sin greed by mankind design there hell!?

name: Labyrinth Runner
summary: A game for puzzle lovers, everyone knows that there is always a way out of any trouble, also in this game we give you the opportunity to find a way out of the labyrinth.

name: Lazer Tag
summary: A futuristic sports game based on the the sports brand of the same name.

name: labyrinth Trials
summary: A game designed with the intend of speed running as the player you must fight monsters and robots and make your way through four stages and defeat all the bosses and make it to the end portal as quickly as possible

name: Lagoonia
summary: Online Browser game developed by InnoGames.

name: Laurel & Hardy
summary:
Laurel & Hardy stars the two famous comedians in their quest to throw cream cakes in each others face. The interface is divided into three horizontal parts: the middle one shows the match statistics and the possessions while the other two represent the town from the side. 
 
The first order of business is finding the cream cake shop to get ammo. For finding the way in the big city, it is recommended to purchase a map. Various items on the way may help or bring disadvantages, e.g. a bike to become faster (but are forbidden in certain parts of the city) and liquor bottles (soda is good and beer is bad). After a successful hit a point is rewarded and after one has a certain number of points (can be specified before starting the match) he wins.

name: Last Minute Shopping
summary: Last Minute Shopping is a chaotic “first-person shopper” where players must face one of mankind’s most difficult tasks: Getting lost in a legally distinct furniture store. Filled to the brim with wacky physics, procedurally generated layouts, and Swedish!

name: LA Deadzone
summary: LA Deadzone is an arcade exclusive Free Roam Experience. Players will physically walk through the environment to naturally progress through the story with no artificial locomotion. The Players experience an intense survival adventure fighting off zombies as they try to escape. Designed as a high throughput and impactful experience.

name: La Fuga
summary: Seven days to escape from prison, in this Spanish cult graphic adventure.

name: Lamp Post
summary: A mysterious case of an unknown Keter class SCP - Lamp Post.

name: Last Days
summary: Medieval souls like dark fantasy 3d third person action game with supernatural elements.

name: Laser Brain Puzzle: Classic Logic Arcade
summary: A classic puzzle game where you have to move reflective blocks to point the laser in the right direction!

name: Laser
summary: Dive into an electrifying fusion of puzzle and strategy - It's your mission to power up the battery by aligning energy sources. Find tranquility in the challenge, as you twist mirrors and steer beams of electricity.

name: Lag
summary: Our guy's father want him to find a girlfriend within 3 years. To start him off, his father build a new school and fill it with strong people, plus sealing off his fighting skills so he has to start new. Since our guy has been training all his life, he doesn't show much emotion. Can you help him get one of 4 girls within 3 years?

name: Lab Sorters
summary: Lab Sorters is a cooperative game with local multiplayer for 1-4 players. In this game, you need to search and collect items according to samples in a small location within three minutes to score as many points as possible. You can compete or work together for the best result.

name: Laser Light
summary: Laser Light is a game that challenges and teases your mind. Bending lightbeams to hit the target may sound easier said than done. You must plant your tools in the correct locations to score the highest points. But watch out for the obstacles! Some may have catastrophic results. Don't forget to keep an eye on the time counter, you're only given a specific amount of time before the laser automatically fires.

name: Lady Tut
summary:
A 2D screen-to-screen maze/platformer for the Apple II and Commodore 64 system.

In Lady Tut, you are searching underground for Lady Tut's sarcophagus. In order to do this, you must go through five mazes collecting all the rings that you can find while avoiding creatures that roam around. There are one or two doors leading to the next maze, but you must first find the key to unlock them. Later, a gun can be obtained, and can be used to shoot creatures.

name: Langrisser Tribute
summary: An anthology of the entire Langrisser series for the Sega Saturn.

name: Lamia's Plan
summary: A Lamia monster has kidnapped Pokato village chief's daughter into the forest. It's an emergency situation, Zel - a famous demon hunter has been invited over for help. A monster and a young girl in lonely forest... Will Zel able to save the girl in time?

name: Laya's Horizon
summary:
Master the art of flying. Dive off mountains, weave across forests and glide over rivers to unlock new abilities as you explore a vast, peaceful world.

Use the ancient power of the Windfolk’s enchanted capes to hone your skills, take on challenges and fly through obstacle courses that will make your heart soar. Explore an expansive island in this open world wingsuit adventure.

name: Last Defense
summary: The last defense is a unique tower defense, with special mechanics.

name: Language Learning Simulator: Alphabet
summary: Language Learning Simulator - Alphabet is an educational game that allows players to learn new alphabets easily and in a fun way!

name: Laplace M
summary:
Heart warming open world adventure mobile game, Laplace M, is now launched officially! Login now to claim exclusive rewards! Team up your friends and start the fantasy adventure!

As a new open world romantic adventure mobile game, Laplace M is based on magic in medieval settings. The BGM of the game is produced by Motoi Sakuraba, who is the main music composer of some famous console games.

name: Labyrinth 2
summary: The creators of the original iPhone Labyrinth game bring you Labyrinth 2 - the groundbreaking game taken to the next level.

name: Lair Of The Leviathan
summary: Journey through a large open world with a party of heroes exploring dungeons, villages and mysteries. Manage an adventuring party of heroes and choose the way their stories evolve as they journey through a non linear epic adventure towards the ultimate Lair of the Leviathan.

name: Last Standard
summary:
LastStandard is the 3D action game that gives you a feeling that you've never discovered before. while generating and evolving weapons for users by the Psycho Dive System that analyzes the character and thinking pattern of the user with the concept of "enjoy with your own play style". 
 
In addition to various battle-styles, there are strategic way of playing and other cool play mode are set. Player's can sometimes fighting with other and sometimes working together.

name: Larax & Zaco
summary:
An unconventional platform game. Besides collecting of bonuses, you must destroy
buildings and platforms in the playin by smartly placing bombs. You can use small,
harmless bombs or mor ones (four types are available) and enjoy yourself watching huge constructions explode in thousands of small pieces. Double screen with two simultaneous players, Italian and English language available.

name: Ladderway
summary: Ladderway is a challenging 2D arcade game where you take the position of Jim, a man trying to climb up a building through several ladders while avoiding Mr. Mica's flowerpots as well as other obstacles.

name: Lavender Link
summary: Rika is stuck in a dead-end career as the janitor of a dreary research facility in space. What do they research? She couldn't care less. Not until her concern for a co-worker pulls her into some sinister circumstances.

name: Laser Bounce
summary: Space shooter

name: Last Days of Snow
summary: Last Days of Snow is narrative adventure puzzler with a Metroidvania-style open world set in the technophobic town of Barvik in 2050 Norway. You play as a 12-year old boy named Oskar, who is one day involved in a mysterious incident that gives him the ability to hack and control machines. Using Oskar’s new abilities, you are set on a puzzle-solving adventure across the atmospheric winter town of Barvik and sunny forested dreamscapes in order to protect your hometown from a dark government force and to find out the secrets behind Oskar’s abilities.

name: LazuLight: By Your Side
summary:
Like a star pulled from the skies, a bird torn of its wings, you were bound to the Earth that day. You once ruled the skies, feeling the air rush through your hair as you flew between the clouds, clothes fluttering in the wind as you raced higher and higher. However, that's all in the past now, ever since the accident.

Now, completely opposite to what you once felt, the world is monotonous, gray, and dead. You find no meaning in life, as if frozen in time, now that your freedom was taken away from you.

However, that would all come to change with three fated encounters. The appearance of an old acquaintance from the track team, a reserved class president that seems to be hiding something, and a kindred soul seeking solace in the silence.

Faced with these new people who suddenly appeared in your life, you have to make the choice. Do you wallow in your failure in this monochrome prison, or do you take their hand and repaint this world?

By their side, the hands of the clock start ticking once more.

name: Lawmage Academy
summary: A magic school RPG where you learn spells, craft potions, make friends, and go on exciting adventures as you uncover the dark secrets of Lawmage Academy.

name: La Libertad Arrasa: Milei
summary:
Casual runner video game where you control Milei.

You must move forward and reduce unnecessary government spending to finally take down the central bank and dollarize the country, leading to a stable economy.

Dodge obstacles, destroy ministries, and face the final BOSS.

name: Labyrinth of Galleria: The Moon Society
summary:
From the creators of Labyrinth of Refrain: Coven of Dusk comes a new chapter in the dungeon-exploring adventure filled with charm and mystery! Summoned by the magnificent Madame Marta, you are but a wandering spirit awaiting your next command. With the help of Eureka, Madame Marta’s assistant, and an army of soul-infused puppets, you are tasked with delving into the depths of a mysterious underground labyrinth teeming with enchanted monsters to unearth the Curios d'art that lie within!

Labyrinth of Galleria: The Moon Society offers dungeon-crawling adventures with new quality of life improvements and 50 hours of exploration alongside a cast of fully customizable companions to do your bidding. Use a variety of pacts and puppet soldiers to customize a team of up to 40 fighters to dive into the darkness and discover the secrets with the Labyrinth of Galleria…if you dare!

name: Lavapools
summary:
Dodge death in a rising hell !
No weapons. Only dodging, pure skill and understanding regular patterns.

name: Labyrinth of the Witch DX
summary:
This work is based on "Labyrinth of the Witch" with balance adjustment and dungeon addition. This is a deluxe package that includes all the charged contents of "Labyrinth of the Witch". A simple dungeon exploration RPG that anyone can play!
Strategically use a multitude of items to tackle ever-changing dungeons.

name: Lair
summary: In a world ravaged by endless conflict and natural disaster, a call for peace turns into a bloodbath of betrayal and deceit. Playing as a warrior riding a voracious dragon trained for deadly aerial and ground combat, and capable of scorching, clawing and smashing thousands of enemies, gamers must defeat countless armies to save a civilization. Together, the gamer and the beast will attempt to change the destiny of a world on the brink of extinction.

name: Last Seen Online
summary:
Last Seen Online is the first of its kind – an award-winning real time chat story told over 7 days...and it’s FREE to download!

This fictional chat story allows you to read through the text messages of a missing girl and then start receiving real-time messages from her family and friends over 7 days as you discover what happened to her.

The app replicates a chat messenger-style experience, meaning you can delve into relationships between different characters and understand how they fit into the story. As you’re reading the messages you’ll be transported into the midst of a thrilling and sometimes scary story that'll keep you gripped to your phone.

name: Last Viking: Ragnarok Loop
summary: RPG with cats, battles, merge, deckbuilding and humor! Inspired by Loop Hero.

name: L.A. Noire: The Complete Edition
summary:
L.A. Noire is set in Los Angeles in 1947 and challenges the player, controlling a Los Angeles Police Department (LAPD) officer, to solve a range of cases across five divisions. Players must investigate crime scenes for clues, follow up leads, and interrogate suspects, and the player's success at these activities will impact how much of each case's story is revealed.

The game draws heavily from both the plot and aesthetic elements of film noir, stylistic films made popular in the 1940s and 1950s that share similar visual styles and themes, including crime and moral ambiguity. The game uses a distinctive colour palette, but in homage to film noir it includes the option to play the game in black and white. Various plot elements reference the major themes of detective and mobster stories such as Key Largo, Chinatown, The Untouchables, The Black Dahlia, and L.A. Confidential.

L.A. Noire is notable for using Depth Analysis's newly developed technology MotionScan, whereby the actors portraying the game's characters were recorded by 32 surrounding cameras to capture facial expressions from every angle. The technology is central to the game's interrogation mechanic, as players must use the suspects' reactions to questioning to judge whether or not they are lying. L.A. Noire was the first video game to be shown at the Tribeca Film Festival. Upon release, the game received wide acclaim for its advances in storytelling and facial animation technology. As of February 2012, both PC and console versions had shipped nearly 5 million copies combined.

In addition to the original full game, L.A. Noire: The Complete Edition for PC will include a multi-use code to access all the previously released downloadable content from the console versions, including the “Nicholson Electroplating” Arson case, the “Reefer Madness” Vice case, “The Consul’s Car” Traffic case, “The Naked City” Vice case and “A Slip of the Tongue” Traffic case.

name: Last Chance for Turnabout
summary: A cold case, a suicide, and a murder intersect. The man at the apex of it all takes on an impossible defence.

name: Landelver
summary: Explore this procedural generated world, gather, craft, build and fight.Try to survive and beat the final boss.

name: Ladder Larry
summary: A challenging retro arcade platformer game, where you need to clear each level in order to progress in the game. Collect items and bonuses and outwit your opponents to reach the end goal. Climb to the top of the highscore leaderboard to brag on your friends!

name: Landborne
summary: Someone's stolen the Mushroom Kingdom's entire ocean, and this Cheep-Cheep's not gonna stop dive-bombing his way across the landscape until they find out who!

name: Last Zombie
summary: LAST ZOMBIE is a Single Player Action Adventure Game taking place in the Half-Life 2 Universe.

name: La Isla de lo Mono
summary: A black humour parody of the videogame "The Secret of Monkey Island" featuring characters from the argentine web series "Alejo y Valentina".

name: Last Toon Standing
summary: A cute battle royal with low poly art, fight with 50 or more other Bots on two island settings, Last Toon Standing wins.

name: Labyrinth of Chaos
summary: Medieval first-person game with dungeons and puzzles

name: Labo Halloween Car
summary: This app comes with 30+ tutorials that walk you through the process step-by-step, or allows you to draw a car freely as you wish. You can decorate the car with thirteen different colors.Other add-ons include 25 sets of tires that can be customized in size and spacing, a lots halloween-theme stickers and lights for more flair. Once You are happy with their vehicle, you can then use it on one of 21 roads.

name: Lamina Bruise
summary: Lamina Bruise is an interactive short story narrated through imaginative technology. Hack a new path, traverse a world divided by inhospitable climate, escape the burning home.

name: Lara Croft and the Guardian of Light: All the Trappings - Challenge Pack 1
summary: Four new challenge maps filled with hordes of undead enemies and devious traps you must maneuver and exploit to survive.

name: LadyBug
summary: Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 33, LadyBug is a fast paced game about a half bug woman escaping her captors and killing everyone along the way.

name: Latmos Explorer
summary: Discover the mysteries of Latmos with block coding. Learn about the cultural heritage and history of humanity while preparing for the future.

name: LaserShotz
summary: LaserShotz is an online PvP competitive arena shooter! Compete for the best rating on the leaderboards!

name: Lake of Voices
summary: A free horror Visual Novel about an ill-fated journey across Sinnlos, a lake where awful monsters lurk just beneath the surface. With times being so dire you'll need to decide what, and who, is going to be sacrificed. Anyone can be saved, but not everyone can be.

name: Langton's Ant
summary: Based on simple inputs, amazing patterns can be achieved!

name: Laseronium
summary: Your goal in every level is to imagine a straight line that bounces of the edges of objects causing reflection. In that way, you will get that laser line to eventually hit its goal and you pass that level.

name: LaSalle Ishii no Child's Quest
summary: LaSalle Ishii no Child's Quest is a Role-Playing game, developed and published by Namco, which was released in Japan in 1989.

name: Laser Puzzle
summary: A puzzle game for the Uzebox.

name: Launch Squad
summary: Launch Squad is a multiplayer combat game for VR. Armed with a goo slingshot, you will fight for supremacy in the Launch Squad battle arena!

name: Last Duel: Inter Planet War 2012
summary: A vertically-scrolling shoot 'em up with a land-based vehicle. Players need to take down enemies while avoiding pits and the walls of the course, though they are also capable of leaping over obstacles.

name: Lanfeust de Troy
summary: Lanfeust de Troy (Lanfeust of Troy) is a DS/PSP game based on the popular French comic series.

name: Laser Kitty Pow Pow
summary: Cute? Maybe. Fast? Sure. Wild? You bet!
